Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_26.html?showComment=1532567032081#c1698069567155855391\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 26, 2018 at 6:33 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_4MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE CAN SEE THAT PARSI STAR KID ROHINGTON NARIMAN IS HELL BENT ON DESTROYING INDIA ( HOMOSEXUALITY ) AND HINDUISM ( SABARIMALA MENSTRUATING WOMEN)...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/menstruating-women-and-sabarimala.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE ASK THE LAW MINISTER/ PM AND THE PRESIDENT-- WE THE PEOPLE DO NOT WANT THIS IMMIGRANT PARSI JUDGE ON MATTERS CRITICAL TO BHARATMATA AND HER CHILDREN..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW STAR KID CHANDRACHUD TO BE CJI IN 2022 AS HIS PERSONAL LEANINGS ( HOMOSEXUALITY ETC ) ARE WELL KNOWN..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE ASK ROHINGTON NARIMAN AND HIS FATHER FALI NARIMAN.. WHY DONT YOU STOP THIS TOWER OF SILENCE CUSTOM , WHERE VULTURES EAT DEAD BODIES OF DEAD PARSIS ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Zoroastrians do NOT worship fire, as some people believe. They use Fire as a symbol, or an icon, the focus of their worship...</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">To mirror from Hinduism, Zoroaster said that cremation causes the fire to become impure ( apparently he does NOT know even a WEE bit of basic science ). ..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Fact: Unlike water or air or earth , fire can NEVER become impure. You can light off a burning corpse and have a nice barbecue. The fire tongue still reaches upwards.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">So his people had to be kept on high towers called \u201cTower of Silence \u201c( dakhmas ) , where vultures would eat of the flesh and sun would dry the bones, before it is put down to earth ...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN OLDEN DAYS THIS WOULD HAVE BEEN OK.. BUT IN MODERN TIMES THIS SPREADS DISEASE...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE ARE NO VULTURES IN THE VICINITY OF ANY OF THE TOWERS OF SILENCE ..&nbsp; &nbsp;MOST OF THE TIME,&nbsp; CROWS AND RODENTS EAT THE CHOICEST PARTS OF THE CADAVER ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A Parsi 3rd Officer who sailed with me managed to hide in the tower of silence of Mumbai at Malabar hill with two of his friends equipped with torches and cameras ... At night they went up the tower to check out the dead bodies. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">What he told me I will NOT mention here. All of the puked due to the stench..It gave me the shivers. He himself could NOT sleep for days together....This Parsi officer was a jovial but crazy guy who used to spend half his wages discussing EPL soccer with his friends via satellite ( SATCOM A ) telephone costing 5.50 USD a minute</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Dead bodies are arranged on the towers in three concentric circles... Men were placed in the outer circle, women in the middle and children in the inner-most ring... Vultures of Mumbai ate the flesh.The bones finally went into the sea by a watery tunnel...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Two decades ago almost all the vultures disappeared from Mumbai\u2019s skies, as they ate the dead bodies of dead Parsis whose bodies were loaded with ANTIBIOTCS.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Most of these the dead vultures had pasty chalk-like deposits of uric acid crystals on their internal organs. This is a terrible disease called visceral gout, and is a sign of kidney failure. The sick vultures would droop their necks severely, a week before death..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">So nowadays many Parsis prefer to be cremated, a practice Parsi priests believe is an abomination, as this is the basic pillar of their religion , that fire should NOT become impure ( sic!)..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There are a couple of skyscrapers where non-Parsis could watch the grisly scenes using telescopes \u2013bodies lying like that for months together. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When the wind blew the wrong way the stench was overpowering . .. And hence air purifiers were installed to minimize the smell- only for moral support-- it did NOT do the job..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">With hardly any vultures eating , the Parsi community in all their wisdom set up mirrors around the Towers of Silence to create something akin to solar ovens to accelerate decomposition. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">But the mirrors are ineffective during monsoon months.And the heat of the mirrors drove away even the rodents and the crows...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">If you go on Google earth you can see the three Dakhmas within a 55 acre forested area of Malabar Hill in South Mumbai, India ....</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">WE DEMAND THAT THE GOVT OF INDIA, MUST ASK PARSIS TO CREMATE THEIR DEAD BODIES...</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_4BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1475377405179604634\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_23M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_26.html?showComment=1532587170341#c1475377405179604634\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 26, 2018 at 12:09 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_23MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nAn excellent informative fwd reg the ingoing Legal case in supreme Court on Tught of Entry to Sabarimala for Women of any age..<br />\nHighlighted emphasis supplied by me:<br />\n*******<br />\nBrilliant submissions by Sr. Advocate Shri K Parasaran today before the Hon\u2019ble Supreme Court in Sabarimala matter<br />\n(Source :People for Dharma @People4Dharma)<br />\n<br />\n1. Arguments in the Petition resume. Mr. Parasaran now argues for the Nair Service Society.<br />\n2. Mr. Parasaran submits that Kerala is an educated society<br />\n3. Mr. Parasaran submits that 96% of the women in Kerala are educated. They are independent. It is a matrilineal society. Therefore to assume that the practice of the Temple is based on patriarchy is fundamentally incorrect<br />\n4. Mr. Parasaran submits that the practice of the Temple is not comparable to Sati. In fact, Sati itself has not connection to the Hindu faith.<br />\n5. Mr. Parasaran cites the examples of the wives of Dasaratha and Kunti to prove that they did not commit Sati after their husbands' death.<br />\n6. Therefore Mr. Parasaran submits that we should not approach the issue of with notions of patriarchy<br />\n7. *Mr. Parasaran says that a right question will lead to the right answer, a wrong question will lead to the wrong answer*.<br />\n8. Mr. Parasaran submits that *if a person asks \"can I smoke when I pray?\" he will get a slap. But if he asks \"can I pray as I smoke?\" he will be appreciated*.<br />\n<br />\n9. Therefore, Mr. Parasaran says the *right questions must be asked in this case for the Court to get the right answers*.<br />\n10. Mr. Parasaran further submits that in this case he has to be even more careful and prepared because he is answerable not just to the Lordships but also the Lord above.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n11. Mr. Parasaran is now reading out portions from the Shirur Mutt decision of the Supreme Court.<br />\n<br />\n12. Mr. Parasaran submits that even democracies, especially democracies, must protect religion and tradition.<br />\n13. Mr. Parasaran submits that Hindu religion respects merit and wisdom wherever it comes from. He says for neeti, it is still Vidura neeti which is cited. That is the greatness of the faith.<br />\n14. Mr. Parasaran submits that while the court must listen to activist voices, it must equally listen to voices which seek to protect tradition.<br />\n15. Mr. Parasaran submits that the Legislature is Brahma, Executive is Vishnu and Shiva is judiciary because only Shiva's ardhanarishwara form epifies Article 14, equal treatment of both sexes.<br />\n16. Mr. Parasaran submits that Shiva is no Brahmachari, but even when his meditative state was sought to be disturbed by Kama Deva, he was reduced to ash because he failed to respect that state of Shiva.<br />\n17. Mr. Parasaran submits that we must not proceed with the presumption that the ancients knew nothing and that we know better in all aspects of life.<br />\n18. Mr. Parasaran that Lord Ayyappa's character as a Naishtika Brahmachari is protected by the Constitution.<br />\n19. Mr. Parasaran is placing reliance on the judgment of the Court in Tilkayat Govindaji Maharaj (1964).<br />\n20. Mr. Parasaran refutes the argument of the Petitioner that some women may die before they reach the age of 50, Mr. Parasaran says that a person carries her or his fate with him. That's not a legal consideration to reverse the tradition<br />\n21. Mr. Parasaran points out that there are thousands of ppl who register for Padi Pooja at , the consequence being that the pooja will be conducted in their name only long after their deaths.<br />\n22. Mr. Parasaran therefore submits that using death as an argument to upset the tradition is neither here nor there.<br />\n23. Mr. Parasaran submits that the basis of the practice is the celibate nature of the Deity, not misogyny. Devotees who visit the Temple too are expected to observe celibacy in letter and spirit. Hence, during the journey, company of women must be avoided.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_23BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_21T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_21TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_21B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedFeWD\" kind=\"d\">\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6116119558079815623\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_21M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_26.html?showComment=1532587284459#c6116119558079815623\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 26, 2018 at 12:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_21MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\n24. Mr. Parasaran is reading out portions from the Sundarakanda of the Ramayana to explain the concept of Naishtika Brahmacharya.<br />\n25. Mr. Parasaran submits that Lord Ayyappa is a yogi. To define who a Yogi is, Mr. Parasaran is quoting Adi Sankara.<br />\n26. *Mr. Parasaran submits that misogyny is not supported by Hindu Shastras nor is chastity the sole obligation of the woman. In fact, chastity is a greater obligation on the man and he is duty bound under the Shastras to give a pride of place to the woman*<br />\n27. Mr. Parasaran submits that the practice in Sabarimala by no stretch of imagination is informed by misogyny. The only consideration is the nature of the Deity.<br />\n28. Mr. Parasaran now proceeds to address Article 25.<br />\n29. Mr. Parasaran submits that Article 25(2)(b) applies only to social reform, it still does not apply to matters of religion covered by Article 26 (b).<br />\n30. Justice Chandrachud wonders if Article 25(2)(b) applies to only Hindu institutions. Mr. Parasaran responds that the practice sought to be addressed by the said Article is peculiar only to Hindu institutions.<br />\n32. Mr. Parasaran resumes submissions post lunch. Mr. Parasaran submits that women do not fall under the protection of Article 25(2)<br />\n33. Justice Nariman asks- will not scheduled caste women be protected by Article 25(2)? Mr. Parasaran disagrees and says 25(2) treats the community as a class, not on the basis of gender.<br />\n34. Mr. Parasaran submits that even Article 15 does not apply to religious institutions which is evident from the language of the Article itself. This was a conscious exclusion since an amendment to include religious institutions was rejected.<br />\n35. *Justice Chandrachud observes that perhaps Article 25(2) may not apply to the rule under challenge*. But asks what provision acts as a limitation on the rights of religious denominations under Article 26.<br />\n36. Mr. Parasaran submits that Article 25(2) deals only with secular aspects and right of entry of classes or sections. It does not therefore apply to religious aspects or right of entry based on gender.<br />\n<br />\n37. The CJI asks Mr. Parasaran to shed light on the Constituent Assembly debates on the relevant Articles of the Constitution. Mr. Parasaran is now walking the Court through the debates.<br />\n<br />\n38. Justice Nariman asks - \"Therefore Mr. Parasaran, are you saying that the core object of Article 25(2)(b) is connected to the object of Article 17?\" Mr. Parasaran answers in the affirmative.<br />\n39. Justice Nariman asks - \"why do we need two provisions for the same object?\" *Mr. Parasaran submits that while Article 17 applies generally, Article 25(2) applies specifically to Temples.*<br />\n40. Mr. Parasaran further submits that Article 25(2) reiterates the object of Article 17 in the specific context of Temples and Hindus to send a loud and clear message.<br />\n41. Mr. Parasaran submits that if the intention of the Constituent Assembly was to include religion in Article 15, they would have.<br />\n42. *Justice Nariman agrees with Mr. Parasaran's interpretation of Articles 15(2) and 25(2)*<br />\n43. Justice Nariman agrees that the object of Article 25(2) and Article 17 are the same i.e. *To address caste based untouchability and not gender*.<br />\n44. Mr. Parasaran says that he does not even need to make his case under Article 26 because he has a solid case under Article 25 itself.<br />\n45. Justice Nariman says - \"assume that we agree with your submissions, then pls explain to us why can't the state fall back on 25(2) citing religious reform? Also what about the rights of women under Article 25(1)?\u201c<br />\n46. Mr Parasaran submits that the present case does not involve a social issue but a religious issue. By using 25(2), u will reform a religion out of its identity.<br />\n47. *Justice Nariman AGREES with the submission of Mr. Parasaran on the inapplicability of Article 25(2) to the issue at hand*<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_21BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_21B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</span></li>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedFeWD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_22B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8260423093199319233\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_22M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_26.html?showComment=1532587325790#c8260423093199319233\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 26, 2018 at 12:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\n48. Mr. Parasaran is now taking the Court through judgements on rights of religious denominations.<br />\n49. Mr. Parasaran submits that by abolishing the practice, the very character of the religious institution will be irreparably altered which affects the rights of devotees under Article 25(1).<br />\n50. Mr. Parasaran digresses and *submits that Constitutional law is his first love and that it is his privilege to argue in this matter when he has otherwise stopped taking up matters*.<br />\n51. Mr. Parasaran is placing reliance on the Jantia Hills District case.<br />\n52. The citation of the judgement is 2006(4) SCC 748<br />\n53. Mr. Parasaran is citing the creation of another heaven for Trishanku by Vishwamitra as an example of the consequence of over activism. And submits that the Petition at hand is a case in point.<br />\n54. Mr. Parasaran is now taking the Bench through the Travancore Cochin Hindu Religious Institutions Act, 1951.<br />\n55. Mr. Parasaran is citing Section 15A(1) of the 1951 Act which deals with duties of the Travancore Devaswom Board.<br />\n56. Mr. Parasaran points out that the said provision requires the Board to observe and maintain the practices of Temples under its administration.<br />\n57. Mr. Parasaran is now going through the Constituent Assembly debates to show the history of Articles 14, 15 &amp; 25.<br />\n58. Mr. Parasaran is reading portions of the debates which relate to Article 17, which clearly show that the Article deals only with caste-based untouchability.<br />\n59. Mr. Parasaran is reading out extracts from the Interim Report on Fundamental Rights with respect to Articles 15, 17 and 25(2)(b).<br />\n60. *Mr. Parasaran specifically shows the REJECTION of the amendment of Article 15 by the Constituent Assembly with respect to inclusion of religious places*.<br />\n61. Mr. Parasaran is reading out portions from debate of November 29,1948 to support his position on Article 17 that it relates only to religion and caste based untouchability<br />\n62. Mr. Parasaran submits that even if Article 25(2) applies to women, it is only with respect to social issues but not religious issues.<br />\n63. Mr. Parasaran further submits that Article 25(2)(b) *is at best an enabling provision for the Legislature, it doesn't enable the judiciary*.<br />\n64. Mr. Parasaran submits that there are several other famous Ayyappa Temples in Kerala itself which allow entry of women without age restrictions. Therefore, the Temple is not a case of discrimination.<br />\n65. Mr. Parasaran is thanking the Bench for a patient hearing.He has concluded his submissions.</div>\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedFeWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedFeWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-thread\" id=\"bc_0_21T_box\" style=\"margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedFeWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedFeWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_23B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_26B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6531001180231640748\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_26M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_26.html?showComment=1532589382804#c6531001180231640748\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 26, 2018 at 12:46 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_26MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nARGUMENTS TO AND FRO FROM PARASARAN TO CHANDRACHUD / ROHINGTON NARIMAN IS AN AFFRONT TO THE VERY SUBJECT OF DHARMA AND NATURAL JUSTICE..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WILL BE A PERMANENT BLOT / SLUR TO THE SYSTEM OF INDIAN JUSTICE...<br />\n<br />\nTHIS SEALS THE NEED TO DISMANTLE OUR JUDICIAL SYSTEM-- DISMISS ALL \"LOSER LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES\" WHO ARE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL AND CREATE A FRESH SYSTEM WITH INTELLIGENT JUDGES ( SELECTED BY ENTRANCE TESTS LIKE IIT ) ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/menstruating-women-and-sabarimala.html<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE ( LIKE LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES ) AND STARKID JUDGES WHO CANT THINK-- MUST KEEP AWAY FROM SABARIMALA SPIRITUALITY.<br />\n<br />\nALL ARGUMENTS IN A COURT ARE OBJECTIVE...VETO POWER ON MATTERS OF SPIRITUALITY ( NOT RELIGION ) CAN NEVER BE GIVEN TO THE OBJECTIVE..<br />\n<br />\nLaws of Karma and Dharma has guided the Hindu since time immemorial . There was never any DOGMA lumped down the Hindu\u2019s throat...<br />\n<br />\nMoral subjectivity leads a society to embrace diversity by seeing that a particular worldview isn't the only right one.<br />\n<br />\nA subjective morality is one rooted in human feelings and conscience ...<br />\n<br />\nNatural justice is inherent. These are the things that are most important to us, indeed the only things important to us!..<br />\n<br />\nOBJECTIVE IS OUTSIDE OF HUMAN BEINGS. WHEN A SHIP INCPECTOR INSPECTS THE SHIP, HE MUST BE OBJECTIVE. HE MUST NOT ALLOW HIS EMOTIONS TO RULE.<br />\n<br />\nSAME WITH A JUDGE IN A COURT. NATURAL JUSTICE AND CONSCIENCE IS LOCKED UP AND THROWN AWAY.<br />\n<br />\nOBJECTIVE MORALITY IGNORED CONTEXT ..<br />\n<br />\nIN THE CASE OF SABARIMALA THE PATROLS DEITIES ARE AYYAPPA ( NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU ) AND GRANDSIRE BHISHMA.. BOTH SWORN BACHELORS , WHO TOOK AN OATH NOT TO MARRY, TO PROTECT THE INTERESTS OF THEIR FATHERS.. A HUGE SACRIFICE INDEED.<br />\n<br />\nTHE THREE FLASHES HAPPEN AT THE EXACT MOMENT OF BHISHMAs SOUL LEAVING HIS MORTAL COIL FROM A BED OF ARROWS ON THE BATTLE FIELD OF KURUKSHETRA..<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA IS SUBJECTIVE. SUBJECTIVE IS STRICTLY WITHIN HUMANS BEINGS \u2013IT DERIVES FROM OUR INTANGIBLE CONSCIENCE ALONE.<br />\n<br />\nHINDUS MUST NECESSARILY USE THEIR OWN CONSCIENCE AND ARRIVE AT OWN ANSWERS..NI OTHER RELIGION AFFORDS THIS GREAT LIBERTY\u2026<br />\n<br />\nDO YOU EXPECT PARSI IMMIGRANT STAR KID ROHINGTON NARIMAN TO UNDERSTAND ALL THIS..<br />\n<br />\nIN SUBJECTIVE MORALITY PERCEPTION WITHIN PERIMETER OF CONTEXT IS PARAMOUNT... SUBJECTIVE IS DEPENDENT ON PEOPLEs OPINIONS NOT THE CONSTITUTION..<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA IS BASED ON CONSCIOUS HUMAN CONSCIENCE. NO MAN CAN MANIPULATE OR SILENCE HIS CONSCIENCE. WE ARE NOT THE SOURCE OF OUR OWN CONSCIENCE...<br />\n<br />\nSPIRITUALLY SOAKED HINDUS ARE SUBJECTIVE WITH MORALITY. ONLY THIS WORKS..<br />\n<br />\nMORALITY IS DOING WHAT IS RIGHT, REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOUR ARE TOLD...<br />\n<br />\nSUBJECTIVE MORALITY HAS NO SCOPE FOR EXCUSES OR MAN MADE OBJECTIVE LAW... LOVE , COMPASSION AND FAIRNESS MAKE US MORAL..<br />\n<br />\nHinduism was developed along spiritual lines, NOT religious lines\u2014the reason why 800 years of slavery could NOT stamp out this amazing way of life..<br />\n<br />\nHinduism is NOT a religion, it is the practice of spirituality by elevating human consciousness in the personal quest for truth..<br />\n<br />\nLoaded truth is delivered or revealed from a divine source and enters the world through a single agent: for example, Abraham in Judaism, Jesus Christ in Christianity, and Muhammad in Islam.<br />\n<br />\nThe Hindu spirituality tradition , unlike other religions -- has always concerned itself with the \u201chuman\u201d situation rather than the \u201cour religion \u201c situation...<br />\n<br />\nUnder the doctrine of karma, the ability to make choices remains with the individual-and NOT what is being told as gospel in a holy book -- OR some objective rules in the constitution..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Ask the Jews\u2014they will say India is the only place where they never got persecuted over thousands of years\u2014 they always ran here for refuge...this PARAMOUNT TRUTH must never be forgotten.</span></div>\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_26BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_26b+seedFeZD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_24T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_26b+seedFeZD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_24TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_24TN\"></span></span></span><br /></div>\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_24TD\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_26b+seedFeZD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_24TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_24TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_26b+seedFeZD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_24TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_24TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span></div>\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_24TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_26b+seedFeZD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_24B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6049023033949367621\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_24M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THEY WANT JUSTICE IS BLIND SYSTEM WITHOUT CONTEXT..<br />\n<br />\nSpirituality cannot be explored using scientific methods because it involves deeply personal, subjective experiences, and in this it differs from the over-riding ambition of science pushed by the NEW WORLD ORDER to be objective. ..<br />\n<br />\nI WAS A SHIP CAPTAIN FOR 30 YEARS ..I WAS A LEADER, NOT A ANGER.. LEADERSHIP IS SUBJECTIVE..<br />\n<br />\nLeadership is subjective: we need your experience, expertise, and judgment; we need your relationships, initiative, and innovation; we need your thoughts, opinions, and instincts. We need core values. If we didn\u2019t, you would be replaced by a calculator.<br />\n<br />\nTANGIBLE LAW IS THE OBJECTIVE FORM OF MORALITY. ARE WE MISSING THE FUCKIN' BUS </span></b>? \"<br />\n<br />\nWILL SKY FALL DOWN IF WE DONT DO THIS NOW -- AND NOT IN THE NEXT HOUR..<br />\n<br />\nDECISIONS ON \"ABANDON SHIP\" OR \"GENERAL AVERAGE \" IS BASED ON HIS..<br />\n<br />\nThere are three requisite elements to prove a general average sacrifice: (1) the vessel must be in IMMINENT DANGER ; (2) there must be an intentional, voluntary sacrifice of property by the crew or owners to avert that peril; and (3) by that intentional sacrifice, the safety of the vessel, the remaining cargo, or the voyage must be secured.<br />\n<br />\nPAKISTANIS WERE SURPRISED AT THE WAY PAWNS ( INDIAN FOOT SOLDIERS AND JUNIOR OFFICERS ) WERE SACRIFICED AT KARGIL BY THE KING-- JUST TO GET MEDALS..<br />\n<br />\nDONT MAKE ME WRITE A BLOGPOST ABOUT THIS SHAMEFUL EPISODE TAKING NAMES-- HEADS WILL ROLL.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/jettison-of-cargo-chemical-tankers-capt.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/abandon-ship-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTRY<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nALL 3 ARMED FORCE CHIEFS<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nARMED FORCES TRAINING INSTITUTES<br />\nNITI AYOG</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7766793215898167451\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_43M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/12333354635999003839\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Sangeetha</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_26.html?showComment=1532596257558#c7766793215898167451\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 26, 2018 at 2:40 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_43MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nShabarimala case exposes too many issues with judicial system<br />\n<br />\n1. Are our judges qualified to judge matters of religion ? Are they trained ? Should not judges be trained in various subjects and if they don't know the subject, shouldn't they refer to experts<br />\n<br />\n2. Shouldnt the judge examine first the petitioner is a genuine stakeholder and petition is genuine before calling in defendants ? No one should be allowed to waste time of court and other people. Courts are capable of doing it if influential people are impacted. In Sukanyadevi case, Rahul Gandhi was not summoned. Instead, court asked to prove allegation first. In case of Amir Khan's cyber crime case, court should have first called him to prove there was a cyber case, only after that court should have wasted your time. If this is done, people won't file cases for ego boost.<br />\n<br />\nWho filed this case and what is their stake in Shabarimala? If they are not devotees of Ayyappa , why they are allowed to waste time and effort of honorable court, Devaswam board , Kerala govt and many others<br />\n3. Shouldn't court get the view of stakeholders outside ? In a divorce case, children are not petitioner or defendant. But court checks whether there are children and ask their opinion whom they want to stay with because they are stakeholders. In Shabarimala case, devotees and deity are stakeholders. There should be devaprashnam as well as referendum before changing practices.<br />\n<br />\nForest department, ministry who has responsibility for nature conservation these are also stakeholders. Court should have sought their views<br />\n<br />\n4. Should court limit itself to information presented in the case ? Should it not make its own inquiries. All the informations presented by defendants was available in Internet.<br />\n<br />\n5. If petitioners have willfully misleaded court and thereby wasted court's time , should they not be punished ? In this case, petitioners willfully mislead that women are not allowed when the truth is women never went in the first place.<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_43BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today we all know that\nAmerica\u2019s Jews are driving America\u2019s wars<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">POOR LUTYENS LOBBYISTS\n\u2014&nbsp; HOLDING GLITZY PARTIES AND THEIR COCKY\nSWAGGER ( HUMAARA KOI NAHIN BIGAD SAKTA ) WAS THEIR UNDOING..&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The American Deep State\nas a hybrid association of elements of government and top-level finance and\nindustry that is able, through campaign financing of elected officials,\ninfluence networks and co-option via the promise of lucrative post-government\ncareers, to govern the United States in spite of elections and without reference\nto the consent of the governed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These operatives use\ntheir proximity to power and ability to offer high-paying / HIGH power jobs to\ngovernment officials to achieve outcomes foreclosed to ordinary citizens<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">America\u2019s growing\nincome disparity is not the inevitable result of impersonal forces like\nglobalization or automation. It is the outcome of hundreds of trade, tax and\nregulatory measures that achieved the preferred outcome \u2013 enrichment \u2013 of\neconomic elites who contribute to politicians. Over half the money given to\npresidential candidates in the 2016 campaign comes from just 158 families.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">POLITICAL DONORS ARE\nPART OF THE DEEP STATE \u2013ESPECIALLY THE ONES WHO DONATE TO BOTH RULING AND\nOPPOSITION PARTIES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PM MODI, INDIANS&nbsp; ARE NOT ASLEEP ANY MORE.. &nbsp;BE WARNED !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/03/treason-from-within-biggest-cut-on.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/03/treason-from-within-biggest-cut-on.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7384289673884560432\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_69M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_26.html?showComment=1532608505989#c7384289673884560432\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 26, 2018 at 6:05 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_69MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://twitter.com/Swamy39?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">SUBRAMANIAN SWAMY GIVING BULL AS USUAL...</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/mahabharata-and-bhagawat-gita-4000-bc.html</span><br />\n<br />\nDWARAKA SANK INTO THE SEA 6000 YEARS AGO..SEVEN DAYS AFTER THE DEATH OF KRISHNA<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Krishna knew that the time for him to shed his earthly avatar had come. Krishna knew the only way for someone to kill him was by wounding his foot. He remembered the curse of Maharishi Durvasa, which left his foot vulnerable. Krishna laid down under a tree and went into Yoga Samadhi. At that time a hunter Jara ( VALI IN HIS PREVIOUS BIRTH ) entered that forest.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/10/king-vali-and-queen-tara-of-ramayana.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThat hunter misunderstood the moving foot of Krishna as a lurking deer and shot a lethal arrow that pierced into Krishna\u2019s feet.<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as the hunter reached Krishna, he realised his mistake and pleaded the lord for forgiveness. Lord Krishna consoles him and tells him how his death was inevitable and things are going as per divine plan .<br />\n<br />\nSuch was the Dharma that, even for the Ruler of the Universe, the laws of Karma remain the same. Hence, lord Krishna left the mortal world<br />\n<br />\nOn hearing this, Pandavas plunged into great grief. After taking suitable instructions from Dharmaja, Arjuna reached Dwarka. Dwarka was destined to be flooded within seven days of Krishna\u2019s death; hence, Arjuna decided to take the survivors and the Vishnu idol to Indraprastha. Krishna's father left for heavenly abode while being in deep meditation. Arjuna performed the last rites for Krishna and his kinsman. All the ladies and children started moving towards Indraprastha along with Arjuna.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">As the people walked away from the Dwaraka city, and they looked back for the last time, the city sank into the sea.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">THE VISHNU IDOL IN GURUVAYUR TEMPLE ( 2 HRS DRIVE FROM CALICUT ) WAS IN THE HANDS OF ARJUNA</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_69BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Greed is the prerogative of American elites.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2008, Federal\nReserve chairman JEW Ben Bernanke helped panic Congress into approving a\nvirtual no-strings bailout of Wall Street by claiming that if it didn\u2019t approve\nthe measure immediately, there would be no economy left. Since he left the Fed,\nBernanke has made a profitable career giving speeches, mainly to financial\nservices firms, at around $200,000 a talk.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When there are economic\nincentives for war, fear becomes the Deep State\u2019s weapon of choice. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_26.html?showComment=1532614148079#c526618366350528887\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 26, 2018 at 7:39 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_76MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.thenewsminute.com/article/hindu-outfits-call-hartal-against-kerala-govt-s-support-women-s-entry-sabarimala-85403</span><br />\n<br />\nALL COMMIE TOP LEADERS OF KERALA HAVE BEEN IN THE PAYROLL OF FOREIGN WHITE COMMIES ( JEWS ) EVEN BEFORE INDEPENDENCE...<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />LIKE JNU OF TODAY, BRENNAN COLLEGE OF KANNUR WAS THE FOUNTAINHEAD OF WHITE COMMIE ROTHSCHILDs IDEOLOGY.. KERALA CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN IS FROM BRENNAN COLLEGE...</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThe Supreme Court is currently hearing oral arguments in Indian Young Lawyers Association v. State of Kerala, in which rules that bar the entry of women aged between 10 and 50 years into the Sabarimala temple in Kerala ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE LAWYER WHO FILED THE CASE IS A MUSLIM NAMED NAUSHAD AHMED KHAN WHO IS THE PRESIDENT OF \"YOUNG LAWYERS ASSOCIATION\".. WE KNOW IF THIS FELLOW KHAN ( PRODUCT OF AMU ) IS A MUSLIM OR A JEW..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE HAVE DEEP STATE LAWYERS/ JUDGES HOLDING HINDUS TO RANSOM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWE WATCH..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF --<br />\n<br />\nPARASARAN<br />\nFALI NARIMAN<br />\nROHINGTON NARIMAN<br />\nCHANDRACHUD<br />\nSOLI SORABJEE<br />\nSALVE BABY<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nSUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nCM OF MAHARASHTRA FADNAVIS<br />\nJP NADDA<br />\nHEALTH MINISTRY<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES OF INDIA<br />\nHEALTH MINISTERs OF ALL STATES OF INDIA<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES OF INDIA<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nCOL RATHORE<br />\nI&amp;B MINISTRY<br />\nNGT<br />\nNHRC<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nALL 3 ARMED FORCE CHIEFS<br />\nCLOSET COMMIE ARNAB GOSWAMI<br />\nVINEET JAIN<br />\nAROON PURIE<br />\nPRANNOY JAMES ROY<br />\nN RAM<br />\nRAGHAV BAHL<br />\nBARKHA DUTT<br />\nSHEKHAR GUPTA<br />\nRAJDEEP SARDESAI<br />\nSAGARIKA GHOSE<br />\nRANA AYYUB<br />\nNAVIKA KUMAR<br />\nRAHUL KANWAL<br />\nJAKKA JACOB<br />\nFAYE DSOUZA<br />\nNIDHI RAZDAN<br />\nVIKRAM CHANDRA<br />\nPRAKASH KARAT<br />\nSITARAM YECHURY<br />\nDANIEL RAJA<br />\nSUNEET VERMA<br />\nDINESH VARSHNEY<br />\nCHETAN BHAGAT<br />\nDEVDUTT PATTANAIL<br />\nAMISH TRIPATI<br />\nARUNDHATI ROY<br />\nSHOBHAA DE<br />\nSIDDHARTH VARADARAJAN<br />\nRAMACHANDRA GUHA<br />\nSHEKHAR GUPTA<br />\nNCW MAIN<br />\nNCW STATES<br />\nSWATI MALLIWAL<br />\n<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the United States ,\na political action committee (PAC) is an organization that pools campaign\ncontributions from members and donates those funds to campaign for or against\ncandidates, ballot initiatives, or legislation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The legal term PAC has\nbeen created in pursuit of campaign finance reform in the United States. This\nterm is quite specific to all activities of campaign finance in the United\nStates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the U.S. federal\nlevel, an organization becomes a PAC when it receives or spends more than\n$1,000 for the purpose of influencing a federal election, and registers with the\nFederal Election Commission<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u201cSuper-PACs,\u201d which are legally required to\ndisclose their donors, but (get this) can accept unlimited contributions from\nother political non-profits and \u201cshell\u201d corporations that have not disclosed\ntheir donors\u2019 names.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s the deep-deep\nstate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NY04eUe2-b4/W1naAQlPR3I/AAAAAAABdFo/_TmBRwJlpiMPOlKNiz8VbQ5yKdPRBKAQwCLcBGAs/s1600/3wwac.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"390\" data-original-width=\"600\" height=\"416\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NY04eUe2-b4/W1naAQlPR3I/AAAAAAABdFo/_TmBRwJlpiMPOlKNiz8VbQ5yKdPRBKAQwCLcBGAs/s640/3wwac.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Federal law formally\nallows for two types of PACs: connected and non-connected. Judicial decisions\nadded a third classification, independent-expenditure only committees, which\nare colloquially known as \"Super PACs\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Super PACs, officially\nknown as \"independent-expenditure only committees\", may not make contributions\nto candidate campaigns or parties, but may engage in unlimited political\nspending independently of the campaigns. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike traditional\nPACs, they can raise funds from individuals, corporations, unions, and other\ngroups without any legal limit on donation size<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before Super PACs\nbecame \"super,\" they were just PACs, or Political Action Committees.\nThe groups could support a candidate or a cause, but were heavily regulated\nunder the terms of campaign finance law. Individuals were allowed to give $2,500\n-- no more -- and corporations and unions were strictly forbidden from making\ndonations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2010, that all\nchanged. Two court cases decided in the space of two months re-wrote the book\non campaign spending and ushered in the era of the Super PAC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Trump/ Hillary\nelections , BlackPAC \u2014 then a little-known, liberal super PAC led by a longtime\npolitical organizer&nbsp; \u2014 swept into\nAlabama\u2019s special US Senate race and began spending hundreds of thousands of\ndollars to great effect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The New York-based BlackPAC\nknocked on more than 520,000 doors, sent mail to 271,000 homes and made 72,000\nphone calls to Alabamians. The effort helped organize black volunteers en\nmasse, who in turn urged prospective voters to the polls.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the end, the\ncandidate BlackPAC backed, Democrat Doug Jones, notched one of the most notable\nelectoral victories in modern congressional history, defeating Republican Roy\nMoore in a state that hadn\u2019t elected a Democrat to the US Senate since 1992.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BlackPAC\u2019s financial\nresources, for one, do not come from an army of small-dollar, \u201cgrassroots\u201d\ndonors in the style of a politician such as Bernie Sanders. Instead, its\nprimary bankrollers are a coterie of well-heeled organizations with deep ties to\nthe national Democratic Party, such as the pro-Hillary Clinton super PAC\nPriorities USA Action.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These groups, in turn,\nare funded in large part by wealthy, white men. Liberal, \u201cdark money\u201d nonprofit\ngroups that don\u2019t publicly disclose the identities of their own contributors\nare also among BlackPAC\u2019s bankrollers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Which leaves some to\nwonder: Is BlackPAC little more than a convenient rent-a-group for wealthy KOSHER\nDemocratic interests struggling to connect with black voters in a post-Barack\nObama political era?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So part of the deep\nstate is simply that which is funded by dark money (and the money itself); a\nquid-pro-quo in which results are expected in exchange for electoral support.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s the oldest form of\ngraft and corruption \u2014 and the only way to rid our system of it is to publicly\nfund our elections.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But as long as dark\nmoney is greasing the skids in Washington and Lansing, there\u2019s no way lawmakers\nare going to turn off those spigots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are a lot of\nelected officials at the national, state and local levels who are outstanding\npublic servants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But as long as dark\nmoney is part of the process, they get trapped in the net.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How did this happen?\nEasy, six mega-corporates own the US media.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">* News Corporation owns\nFox, Barron\u2019s, the Wall Street Journal, the New York Post, and HarperCollins\nPublishing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">* Comcast owns NBC,\nCNBC, MSNBC, Bravo, USA, and Universal Pictures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">* Disney owns ABC,\nESPN, A&amp;E, Pixar, Marvel Studios, and Lifetime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">* Time Warner owns CNN,\nWarner Brothers, HBO, Cinemax, TNT, and Time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">* CBS owns CBS, and\nSimon and Schuster.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">* Viacom owns MTV,\nComedy Central, and Paramount Pictures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Get the picture? &nbsp;It\u2019s simple. Too much media power is\nconcentrated in the hands of far too few.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bFTCz7k-4Qo/W1naQ9H_6-I/AAAAAAABdFw/7y4Wlet7o-k_5zVAHaOCeSih3Dju0ZW7wCLcBGAs/s1600/1_a_Jzuwugvmt4O77XDdUUgOMBQ%25402x.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"616\" data-original-width=\"616\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bFTCz7k-4Qo/W1naQ9H_6-I/AAAAAAABdFw/7y4Wlet7o-k_5zVAHaOCeSih3Dju0ZW7wCLcBGAs/s640/1_a_Jzuwugvmt4O77XDdUUgOMBQ%25402x.jpeg\" width=\"638\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/murky-truths-of-inflation-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/murky-truths-of-inflation-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; FOR THIS lying EFFORT HE WAS KNIGHTED.<br />\n<br />\nHe published \u201cThe Ancient Geography of India\u201d in 1871, which was the first collection of the edicts of the 3rd-Century-BC Indian emperor Ashoka, and \u201cThe Stupa of Bharhut\u201d in 1879-- all kosher LIES ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">ALEXANDER CUNNINGHAM GAVE AWAY TAXILA AND NALANDA UNIVERSITIES TO BUDDHISTS... THESE UNIVERSITIES EXISTED THOUSANDS OF YEARS BEFORE BUDDHA WAS BORN..</span></b></div>\n<br />\n4700 YEARS AGO , KERALA MATHEMATICIAN ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPPAD ( ARYABHATTA ) WAS A VISITING MATH / ASTRONOMY PROFESSOR FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY, AT MUZIRIS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING ( MY HOMETOWN ) TO NALANDA UNIVERISTY ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nALL OVER THE PLANET WHITE JEWS HAVE REPLACED AYYAPPA WITH BUDDHA AS THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU...BUDDHISM WAS REVIVED TO MAKE THE HINDU SELF LOATHING...<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD OE EMPEROR ASHOKA BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nIN THE MOST ANCIENT VISHNU TEMPLES-- ALEXANDER CUNNINGHAM EMPLOYED SCULPTORS TO CHIP AWAY AYYAPPA AND INSERT BUDDHA.. BUDDHA WAS A MERE MORTAL WHO STRUGGLED FOR SALVATION...<br />\n<br />\nThis is a passage from my social studies book while at school<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE : The great Buddhist Stupa of Amaravati, the Maha chaitya, is one of the greatest architectural achievement of ancient India. The monument was situated on the outskirts of the town of Amaravati near the ancient ruined city of Dharanikota. It was founded in the 3rd-2nd centuries BC during Ashoka Maurya' reign UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE STUPA NEVER EXISTED AT THE SPOT IN AMARAVATI \u2013IT WAS JUST A FIGMENT OF ROTHSCHILDs SLIMY IMAGINATION.. ALL DIAGRAMS ARE FAKE..</span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">I HAVE SEEN THE AMARAVATI BUDDHIST RELICS IN THE BRITISH MUSEUM\u2014 THEY ARE ALL FAKE\u2014JUST LIKE THE ASHOKA ROCK EDICTS .</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/british-museum-house-of-stolen.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI have seen the Colin Mackenzie album of maps, plans and drawings of sculpture from the stupa at Amaravati at the British Library\u2014all FAKE...<br />\n<br />\nBlind as a bat , SIR Walter Elliot when he was in Madras was assigned with the task of reviving and propagating Buddhism which was dead in India...<br />\n<br />\nHe wrote a false report about the DELIBERATE famine ( created by collector CP Brown ) in Guntur district in 1833 which drove desperate starving entire Telugu families abroad as indentured labour ..<br />\n<br />\nRothschild planned two years in advance as in 1834 Black slavery was abolished and replaced by Indian Indentured labour...<br />\n<br />\nBoth Vemana and Basava are creations of CP Brown , the agent of Jew Rothschild\u2014who created the BURIAL Lingayath religion and backdated it..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/cp-brown-and-yogi-vemana-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/indentured-coolie-slavery-reinvented.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSINCE HYDERABAD HAS GONE TO TELENGANA AMARAVATI IS THE NEW CAPITAL OF ANDHRA PRADESH...<br />\n<br />\nTHE NAME OF THIS NEW CAPITAL IS DERIVED FROM AN OLDER VILLAGE IN GUNTUR NAMED AMARAWATHI ON THE BANKS OF THE KRISHNA RIVER..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_135BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1532341865885#c8091526193745317110\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 23, 2018 at 4:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.thenewsminute.com/article/shigella-infection-kills-toddler-kozhikode-taking-death-toll-4-85241</span><br />\n<br />\nI HAVE SEND \" GROUND WATER CONTAMINATION FROM MUSLIM/ CHRISTIAN CEMETRIES\" INFORMATION TO PMO AND HEALTH MINISTRY DOZENS OF TIMES..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS IGNORED..<br />\n<br />\nFACEBOOK CENSORED IT...<br />\n<br />\nNOW I SAY AGAIN..<br />\n<br />\nSHIGELLA BACTERIA IS NOTHING NEW IN KERALA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Shigella infection (shigellosis) is an intestinal disease caused by a family of bacteria known as Shigella. The main sign of shigella infection is ACUTE diarrhea, which often is bloody..</span><br />\nDURING RAINY SEASON FLOOD ALL WELLS , LAKES AND RIVERS GET CONTAMINATED\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">KERALA IS NOT A SUITABLE PLACE FOR BURIAL OF DEAD BODIES DUE TO HEAVY RAINFALL AND LEACHING THAT FOLLOWS... GRAVEYARDS AND CEMETERIES MUST BE CHOSEN BY GROUND WATER EXPERTS ..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nNO RELIGIOUS CONSIDERATION IS MORE IMPORTANT THAN HEALTH OF FUTURE HUMAN GENERATIONS..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Microorganisms associated with decomposition of interred bodies ( and feces in intestines ) cause bacterial dysentery (Shigella dysenteriae)..</span></div>\n<br />\nThese leachates from cemeteries contain microorganisms that pollute substrates, surface water and groundwater. The microorganisms chiefly include bacteria, viruses, intestinal fungi and protozoa\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe corpses of healthy humans and animals release bacteria, for example, those which form the group classified as total coliform bacteria: Escherichia coli, Enterobacter, Klebsiella, Citrobacter, Streptococcus faecalis, Clostridium perfringens, Clostridium welchii and Salmonella typhi, and human-hosted viruses, e.g., enterovirus . In most cases, the contamination of the environment comes from pathogenic intestinal bacteria..<br />\n<br />\nSome microorganisms are long-living and, in appropriate environmental conditions, can survive in soil profile or in groundwater for some time, some microorganisms can survive even up to 5 years and, in this time, they can migrate and reach the groundwater..<br />\n<br />\nDecomposition of interred bodies causes an increase in microbial activity in the surrounding substrate, associated with the release of persistent organic compounds..<br />\n<br />\nThese compounds can cause highly dangerous infectious disease such as liver inflammation (hepatitis C virus) and typhoid fever (S. typhi) . Microorganisms associated with decomposition of interred bodies can also cause other diseases such as tetanus (Clostridium tetani), gaseous gangrene (C. perfringens), toxic contamination of food (E. coli), tuberculosis (Mycobacterium tuberculosis), paratyphoid fever (Salmonella paratyphi), bacterial dysentery (Shigella dysenteriae) and cholera (V. cholerae)..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">PRIONS IN WATER CAUSES DEMENTIA AND LOSS OF BRAIN POWER.</span></b>.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">BURIAL CAUSES SOULS TO GET TRAPPED ON EARTH FOREVER ON EARTH-- MISERABLE --FOR ENDLESS SUFFERING ..IN ANOTHER TEN YEARS 98% OF CHRISTIANS WILL BE CREMATED --NOT BURIED..<br /><br />MUSLIMS ARE STUCK DUE TO APOSTASY LAWS\u2026.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">CHINA HAS DIPPED INTO THIS BLOGSITE AND HAS RECENTLY BANNED ALL BURIAL FOR ATHEIST COMMIES / MUSLIMS/ CHRISTIANS ...BECAUSE OF PRIONS IN GROUNDWATER..&nbsp; &nbsp; CREMATION CAUSES ZERO POLLUTION\u2026</span></b>.<br />\n<br />\nPRIONS FROM DEAD BURIED BODIES INVADE WATER AQUIFERS AND CAUSE PRION DISEASES LIKE SPONGIFORM ENCEPHALOPATHIES. (TSEs)\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWE HAVE TO LEARN FROM TRUE HISTORY -- NOT FAKE HISTORY WRITTEN BY ROTHSCHILDs COMMIE HISTORIANS\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nKuru is not caused by a bacteria, virus, or fungus. Infectious, abnormal proteins known as prions cause kuru. \u2026. Prions are not living organisms and do not reproduce. \u2026They are inanimate, misshapen proteins that multiply in the brain and form clumps, hindering normal brain processes\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nCreutzfeldt-Jakob, Gerstmann-Str\u00e4ussler-Scheinker disease, and fatal familial insomnia are other degenerative diseases caused by prions. These spongiform diseases, as well as kuru, create sponge-like holes in your brain \u2026 Prions that cause kuru can\u2019t be easily destroyed\u2026 Brains contaminated with prions remain infectious even when preserved in formaldehyde for years\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_3B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6649907494320464324\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_3M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1532341951097#c6649907494320464324\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 23, 2018 at 4:02 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_3MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The incubation period of kuru \u2014 the time between initial infection and the appearance of symptoms \u2014 can be as long as 35 years. Cases have been reported long after the practice of cannibalism has ceased\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN INDIA LAKHS OF PEOPLE HAVE DIED BECAUSE OF GROUNDWATER CONTAMINATED BY PRIONS.. WE MUST NEVER EVER HAVE BURIAL GROUNDS IN UNSUITABLE PLACES--WHICH CONTAMINATE AQUIFERS BY GROUND WATER SEEPAGE..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Graveyards \u2013 both new and existing must not have groundwater closer than THREE METRES below ground level..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Republican Patriots: Where are you???\"<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">DONALD TRUMP<br /><br />ARE YOUR BALLS SHRIVELED TO THE SIZE OF A RAISIN ?</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">DONALD TRUMP--DONT YOU KNOW THAT RULES OF CONDUCT OF AN EX-CIA DIRECTOR DOES NOT PERMIT THIS CALL TO REVOLT ?</span></div>\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The goal of the\nwars is to enable the economy to be kept going for the benefit of the High, its\nmilitary, and its bureaucracy and control personnel, but at the same time to\nassure that any excess production capacity is prevented from producing consumer\ngoods for the lower classes. That excess capacity is instead directed to\nproducing excess military goods which will ultimately rust away or be destroyed\nin warfare; that is, the excess capacity is deliberately wasted in order to\nturn it away from the production of goods which would result in added leisure\nor well-being for the lower classes. Those classes are instead continually\nforced into group activities expressing hatred toward the current enemy and\ndependency upon and love toward their benevolent rulers for protecting them\nfrom that enemy. They are thereby led to accept the consumer shortages, the\npoverty, and the other privations to which they are subjected. Their economic\nstatus is kept at the subsistence level, forcing their priorities to be focused\non simply acquiring basic food, clothing, and shelter. They are thus denied\neither the time or the inclination to question the fairness or permanence of\ntheir societal condition, or to otherwise evolve into a threat to the\nestablished hierarchy.\"---&nbsp; George Orwell in his book \"1984\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;
