SINCE THEN VENEZUELA IS THE EVIL COUNTRY WHO MUST BE TAUGHT A KOSHER LESSON..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nIsrael and DEEP STATE got upset with Hugo Chavez Ch\u00e1vez mushroomed in 2007, when he entered into $20 billion worth of joint ventures with Iran's Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, including a shared bank and an airline. Chavez supported Syria\u2019s President Assad.<br />\n<br />\nIn a Christmas Eve speech several years ago, Ch\u00e1vez said the Jews have been gobbling up wealth and causing poverty and injustice in his nation and worldwide ..<br />\n<br />\nIn 2018 Venezuela's GDP is expected to contract by double digits for the third straight consecutive year.. Venezuela's currency has lost 99.9% of its dollar value over the past two years.<br />\n<br />\nHyperinflation has set in, with this year\u2019s inflation rate projected to hit 13,000 percent. Venezuelans are fleeing their home country in large numbers due to the economic failure<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">BUT HEY\u2014&nbsp; EVERYTHING WILL BECOME HUNKY DORY AS SOON AS THE KOSHER DEEP STATE BRINGS IN REGIME CHANGE AND INSTALLS A PUPPET JEW AS PRESIDENT</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">YES\u2014VENEZUELA WILL GO THE ZIMBABWE WAY.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThe destruction of the purchasing power of wages has been combined with the collapse of all basic infrastructure (water, electricity and public transport). Workers in different sectors have started to organise and protest, demanding higher wages..<br />\n<br />\nThe scarcity of banknotes forces many workers to spend long hours queuing at bank branch offices and cashpoints to withdraw the necessary amount of money to pay for transport. The owners of buses operating on the regular lines are demanding steep fare increases to cover the exorbitant prices of spare parts, tyres, motor oil and so on..<br />\n<br />\nPeople have to queue for long hours before they can get onto any form of transport. In the barrios (shantytowns) on the hills of Caracas, transport has almost disappeared and people have to walk up and down the steep slopes that separate their homes from the Metro stations..<br />\n<br />\nLarge parts of the country, including the capital Caracas, now suffer from regular water cut-offs, with some areas only getting running water once or twice a week, and in some cases every 10 days. Electricity blackouts are also frequent, and in places like Maracaibo have led to street protests as people cannot bear the heat and the ruining of food in their freezers and fridges.<br />\n<br />\nThe main reasons for this collapse in infrastructure are corruption, mismanagement and a lack of maintenance, resources and workers. Many workers are still employed in factories where nothing is produced.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_40BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; They hunt and catch whatever they feel\nlike eating. <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">They don't suffer from indigestion and are not punished by Heaven.</span></span>\nI want Israel to join that club. Maybe the world will then at last begin to\nfear us instead of feeling sorry. Maybe they will start to tremble, to fear our\nmadness instead of admiring our nobility. Let them tremble; let them call us a\nmad state. Let them understand that we are a savage country, dangerous to our\nsurroundings, not normal, that we might go wild, that we might start World War\nThree just like that, or that we might one day go crazy and burn all the oil\nfields in the Middle East. Even if you'll prove to me that the present war is a\ndirty immoral war, I don't care. We shall start another war, kill and destroy\nmore and more. And do you know why it is all worth it? Because it seems that\nthis war has made us more unpopular among the civilized world. We'll hear no\nmore of that nonsense about the unique Jewish morality. No more talk about a\nunique people being a light upon the nations. No more uniqueness and no more\nsweetness and light. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/10/every-breath-you-take-ill-be-watching.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/10/every-breath-you-take-ill-be-watching.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BELOW IS AN EXTRACT OF\nTHE POST ABOVE , I WROTE 6 YEARS AGO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the people of USA\nand UK think they are free.&nbsp; They must\nfirst digest this--and may be consult people who understand law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1213, King John was\nexcommunicated by the Pope Innocent III, as he refused to accept the pope's\nappointee Stephen Langton as Archbishop of Canterbury.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It frightened poor John\nbaby so much that he went on his knees to the Pope and swore loyalty towards\nhim by kissing his hand. Two months later King John was forced to sign a\ncontract with the Pope known as the&nbsp; \u201c\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">TREATY OF VERONA 1213</b>\u201d . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This&nbsp; undertook to introduce Rome\u2019s canon law to\nEngland, which made Archbishop Stephan Langton, the effective ruler of all of\nthe country. The contract was supposed to give the Pope ownership of all of the\nlands, people, animals, etc. of all of King John\u2019s kingdom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;According to this contract, the Vatican nay\nthe Pope as the Vicar of Christ owns all of England and of course everything on\nplanet earth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King John&nbsp; made his Charter of Submission, submission,\nin the House of the Knights Templar, with the knights as witness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John, by the grace of\nGod king of England, lord of Ireland, Duke of Normandy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; \"By this charter attested by our golden\nseal we wish it to be known to you all that...we offer and freely yield to God\nand to SS Peter and Paul...and to the Holy Roman Church our mother, and to our\nlord Pope Innocent III and his Catholic successors, the whole kingdom of England\nand the whole kingdom of Ireland with all their rights and appurtenences for\nthe remission of our sins and the sins of our whole family.... And now,\nreceiving back these kingdoms from God and the Roman Church, and holding them\nas a feudatory vassal...we have pledged and sworn our fealty hencefort to our\nlord aforesaid, Pope Innocent III...and we bind in perpetuity our successors\nand legitimate heirs that without question they must similarly render fealty\nand acknowledge homage to the Supreme Pontiff holding office at the time...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">...in lieu of all\nservice and payment which we should render for them [the fiefs], the Roman\nChurch is to receive annually...one thousand marks sterling....\"UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1215, the Barons of\nEngland reacted to the loss of their rights and privileges they once enjoyed\nbefore the 1213 Treaty, and so they revolted against King John and stormed his\ncastle. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under the threat of\ndeath, they forced him to sign a document that recognized their stature and\nspelled out their individual rights! The document was named the Magna Carta.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Pope Innocent III\nwas informed by King John about the Barons revolt and the Magna Carta; the Pope\ngot pissed off, condemned the document and declared it null and void. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his written\ndeclaration to the Barons, the Pope stated that, \u201cThe Declaration of Human\nRights embodied in the Magna Carta, violated the tenets of the church.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magna Carta was the\nfirst document forced onto a King of England by a group of his subjects, the\nfeudal barons, in an attempt to limit his powers by law and protect their\nprivileges.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the support of\nPrince Louis the French Heir and of King Alexander II of the Scots, when they\nentered London in force on 10 June 1215, with the city showing its sympathy\nwith their cause by opening its gates to them.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When King John signed\nthe Magna Carta on 15th June 1215, he broke the terms of the Verona charter\nwith the Pope and therefore lost the right to his Kingdom.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From that time, the\n\u2018Crown\u2019 passed from the Monarch to the Knights Templar who to this day, govern\nBritain on behalf of the Roman Illuminati Church. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.spirituallysmart.com/lincoln1.htm\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.spirituallysmart.com/lincoln1.htm</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SPEECH IN THE LINK\nBELOW WAS MADE BY GERMAN JEW ADAM WEISHAUPT, THE AGENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO\nHAD MURDERED THE REAL PRESIDENT GEORGE WASHINTON AND STEPPED INTO HIS SHOWS\nWITHOUT ANY HILLYBILLY YANK GETTING A WHIFF.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; \"The great rule of conduct for us, in\nregard to foreign nations, is in extending our commercial relations, to have\nwith them as little political connection as possible. Europe has a set of\nprimary interests, which to us have none, or a very remote relation. Hence she\nmust be engaged in frequent controversies the causes of which are essentially\nforeign to our concerns. Hence, therefore, it must be unwise in us to implicate\nourselves, by artificial ties, in the ordinary vicissitudes of her politics, or\nthe ordinary combinations and collisions of her friendships or enmities.\"\nUNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Washington%27s_Farewell_Address\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Washington%27s_Farewell_Address</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The United States\nsought a policy of isolationism and neutrality with regards to the internal\naffairs of other nations-- with the exception of free trade, self-defense and\nhumanitarian emergencies, the U.S. would do best to avoid permanent alliances\nthat do not serve American interests ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Monroe Doctrine was\na United States policy that the U.S. would recognize and not interfere with\nexisting European colonies nor meddle in the internal concerns of European\ncountries. The Doctrine was issued on December 2, 1823<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Monroe's declaration\nwas seen as a defining moment in the foreign policy of the United States and\none of its longest-standing tenets. It would be invoked by many U.S. statesmen\nand several U.S. presidents, including Ulysses S. Grant, Theodore Roosevelt, John\nF. Kennedy, and Ronald Reagan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Monroe Doctrine IN\nNAKED REALITY &nbsp;has been used as a\ndeclaration of hegemony and a right of unilateral intervention over the\nAmericas.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OrQz6RSl8QU/W1cUsbxyYwI/AAAAAAABc-4/Nyp_auUfZP8TfndnM0K0ORfJ1ekbcRzqgCLcBGAs/s1600/utfimages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1532437741764#c4131919766106504304\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 24, 2018 at 6:39 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_96MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWE ASK NORTH KOREA NOT TO DISMANTLE NUKES TILL THERE IS A PROPER TREATY SIGNED TO OFFICIALLY END THE KOREAN WAR..<br />\n<br />\nPUT A FINAL END TO THE ARMISTRICE AGREEMENT.<br />\n<br />\nThe current armistice is however only a cease-fire between military forces, rather than an agreement between governments. No peace treaty was signed which means that the Korean War has not officially ended. The US secretary of state, John Foster Dulles, did NOT allow a proper peace treaty should be implemented on the Korean peninsula.<br />\n<br />\nThe Korean Armistice Agreement brought about a complete cessation of hostilities of the Korean War. It was signed by U.S. Army Lieutenant General William Harrison, Jr. representing the United Nations Command (UNC), North Korean General Nam Il representing the Korean People's Army (KPA), and the Chinese People's Volunteer Army (PVA).<br />\n<br />\nThe Armistice was signed on July 27, 1953, and was designed to \"ensure a complete cessation of hostilities and of all acts of armed force in Korea until a final peaceful settlement is achieved.\"<br />\n<br />\nEven in 2018, 65 years after the signing of the Armistice Agreement, and despite a meeting of North Korean ruler Kim with US President Trump, these issues have not been settled; there is no peace agreement; and American troops are still based in South Korea.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2016, when North Korea proposed formal peace talks, the U.S. adjusted its position from a pre-condition that North Korea should have already taken \"irreversible steps toward denuclearization\", to the negotiations including curbing the nuclear program. The discussions did not take place.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">NORTH KOREA MUST NOT DE-NUCLEARISE TILL 100% US SANCTIONS HAVE BEEN WITHDRAWN AND PEOPLE OF NORTH KOREA FEEL THE BENEFITS FOR A FULL YEAR..<br /><br />THERE IS NO IMMINENT NEED AS NORTH KOREA HAS THE SUPPORT OF RUSSIA ( MILITARY MIGHT) , CHINA ( ECONOMIC MIGHT ) AND INDIA ( MORAL MIGHT </span></b>) .<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The deep state can also\ntake the form of entrenched unelected career civil servants acting in a\nnon-conspiratorial manner, to further their own interests (e.g. continuity of\nthe state as distinct from the administration, job security, enhanced power and\nauthority, pursuit of ideological goals and objectives, and the general growth\nof their agency) and in opposition to the policies of elected officials, by\nobstructing, resisting, and subverting the policies and directives of elected\nofficials.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Article 95 of the Constitution, which empowered the Deputy Speaker to act as the Speaker in case the post of Speaker was vacant used the term \u201cduties of the office of Speaker\u201d. The word \u201cpower\u201d was missing. But Article 65(3) used the word \u201cpowers\u201d in the context of the office of the President.<br /><br />So, it can be construed that \u201cthe Speaker does not have any penal power to punish a member by way of suspension or expulsion\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\nIT TAKES A REAL IDIOT NAY TRAITOR DEEP STATE JUDGE ( IN THE PAYROLL OF FOREIGN FORCES ) TO INTERPRET A RULE THIS WAY..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS ALL THIS ?<br />\n<br />\nTHE SPEAKER HAS BEEN AFFORDED VAST DISCRETIONARY POWERS. WHEN IT COMES TO MAINTAINING DISCIPLINE..<br />\n<br />\nENFORCE RULE 374 A , EVERY TIME A MP MISBEHAVES..<br />\n<br />\nDISCRETIONARY POWER OF THE SPEAKER FOR RUNNING THE BUSINESS OF THE HOUSE CANNOT BE MISUSED.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/treason-from-within-biggest-cut-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTwo recent instances where discretionary power applied by speakers recently erupted controversies are-<br />\n<br />\nPermitting the Aadhaar Bill, to be introduced in the House as a money Bill by Speaker of the Lok Sabha.<br />\n<br />\nRefusing to allow a division of votes (the counting of legislators' votes) on the state budget by the Speaker of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly.<br />\n<br />\nWE WATCH<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES F--<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nSUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nMINISTER OF PARLIAMENTARY AFFAIRS</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deep beneath desert\nsands,&nbsp; Israel has built a covert nuclear\nbomb, using technology and materials provided by DEEP STATE controlled powers\nor stolen by a clandestine network of agents.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2009, when a veteran\nWashington reporter, Helen Thomas, asked Barack Obama in the first month of his\npresidency if he knew of any country in the Middle East with nuclear weapons,\nhe dodged the trapdoor by saying only that he did not wish to\n\"speculate\".&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Israel's nuclear-weapons project could never have got\noff the ground, though, without an enormous contribution from France whose crypto\nJew rulers have always been chosen by French Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">France took the\ntoughest line on counter-proliferation when it came to Iran helped lay the\nfoundations of Israel's nuclear weapons programme..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Dimona, French engineers\npoured in to help build Israel a nuclear reactor and a far more secret\nreprocessing plant capable of separating plutonium from spent reactor fuel.\nThis was the real giveaway that Israel's nuclear programme was aimed at\nproducing weapons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the end of the 50s,\nthere were 2,500 French citizens living in Dimona, transforming it from a\nvillage to a cosmopolitan town, complete with French lyc\u00e9es and streets full of\nRenaults, and yet the whole endeavour was conducted under a thick veil of\nsecrecy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The American investigative journalist Seymour Hersh wrote in his book\nThe Samson Option: \"French workers at Dimona were forbidden to write\ndirectly to relatives and friends in France and elsewhere, but sent mail to a\nphony post-office box in Latin America.\"&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Israel refused to countenance\nvisits by the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA), so in the early 1960s\nPresident Kennedy demanded they accept American inspectors<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lead American\ninspector, Floyd Culler, an expert on plutonium extraction, noted in his\nreports that there were newly plastered and painted walls in one of the buildings.\nIt turned out that before each American visit, the Israelis had built false\nwalls around the row of lifts that descended six levels to the subterranean\nreprocessing plant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negev Nuclear Research\nCenter ( Dimona reactor) is an Israeli nuclear installation located in the\nNegev desert. Construction of the facility began in 1958 and its heavy-water\nnuclear reactor went active sometime between 1962-1964.&nbsp; The purpose of the reactor was the production\nof nuclear materials that would be used in Israel's nuclear weapons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Israel maintained a\npolicy known as nuclear ambiguity\u2014refusing either to confirm or deny their\npossession. Israel had produced its first nuclear weapons by 1967 and it has\nbeen estimated to possess anywhere more than 400 nuclear weapons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Construction commenced\nin 1958, with French assistance according to the Protocol of S\u00e8vres agreements.\nThe complex was constructed in secret, and outside the International Atomic\nEnergy Agency inspection regime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN THE CASE OF IRAQ,\nTHE KOSHER INSPECTORS PAINTED THEIR TARGETS AND WITHIN A FEW DAYS ALL IRAQI FACILITIES\n&nbsp;WERE PULVERISED BY BOMBS FROM THE AIR..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY HOPE TO DO THE SAME TO NORTH KOREAN NUCLEAR FACILITIES.. BUT KIM IS NOT AN\nIDIOT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;To maintain secrecy, French customs officials\nwere told that the largest of the reactor components, such as the reactor tank,\nwere part of a desalination plant bound for Latin America.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was worldwide demand &nbsp;that Israel agree to international\ninspections. Israel agreed, but on the condition that U.S ( DEEP STATE ) .,\nrather than International Atomic Energy Agency, inspectors be used, and that\nIsrael would receive advance notice of all inspections. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Israel knew the\nschedule of the inspectors' visits, it was able to hide the illegal manufacture\nof nuclear weapons, thereby deceiving the inspectors, by installing temporary\nfalse walls and other devices before each inspection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The inspectors eventually informed the U.S.\ngovernment that their inspections were useless, due to Israeli restrictions on\nwhat areas of the facility they could inspect. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By 1969 the U.S. knew lieved\nthat Israel had a nuclear weapon, and terminated inspections that year. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1986, Mordechai\nVanunu, a former technician at Dimona, fled to the United Kingdom and revealed\nto the media some evidence of Israel's nuclear program and explained the\npurposes of each building, also revealing a top-secret underground facility\ndirectly below the installation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Mossad, Israel's\nsecret service, sent a female agent named Cheryl Bentov who lured Vanunu to\nItaly, where he was kidnapped by Mossad agents and smuggled to Israel aboard a\nfreighter. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: x-large;\">MOSSAD EXCELS IN USING\nHONEY TRAPS..</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/01/of-honey-traps-and-pots-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/01/of-honey-traps-and-pots-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An Israeli court then\ntried him in secret on charges of treason and espionage, and sentenced him to\neighteen years imprisonment. At the time of Vanunu's kidnapping Israel had\nmaterial for approximately 20 hydrogen bombs and 200 fission bombs by 1986. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the spring of 2004,\nVanunu was released from prison, and placed under several strict restrictions,\nsuch as the denial of a passport, freedom of movement limitations and\nrestrictions on communications with the press. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since his release, he\nhas been rearrested and charged multiple times for violations of the terms of\nhis release<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2004, Mordechai\nVanunu stated that the assassination of President John F. Kennedy was Israel's\nresponse to \"pressure Kennedy exerted on...Ben-Gurion, to shed light on\nDimona's nuclear reactor in Israel\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Libyan leader\nMuammar Gaddafi claimed during a United Nations General Assembly speech in 2009\nthat Israel had ordered the killing of President John F. Kennedy because\nKennedy had wanted to investigate the Negev Nuclear Plant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/10/ethnic-cleansing-of-blackskinned-people.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/10/ethnic-cleansing-of-blackskinned-people.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally, Kennedy had\nenough, and in a personal letter dated May 18, 1963, the president warned that\nunless American inspectors were allowed into Dimona (meaning the end of any\nmilitary activities), Israel would find itself totally isolated.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rather than\nanswering, Ben-Gurion abruptly resigned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cJethro said to Moses, What you are doing is\nnot good\u2026 Now obey my voice; I will give you advice, and God be with you\u201d\u2026 &nbsp;&nbsp;So Moses listened to the voice of his\nfather-in-law and did all that he had said. (Exodus 18:17, 19, 24)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BIBLE ADMITS THAT MOSES HAD BRAWN BUT NO\nBRAINS \u2013AND THAT GOD USED JETHRO AS THE MIDDLEMAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MOSES WOUD KNEEL WHEN JETHRO SPOKE TO HIM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>JETHRO ( UNCIRCUMCISED KERALA NAMBOODIRI ) GAVE MOSES HIS DAUGHTER ZIPPORAH ON\nTHE CONDITION THAT HIS FIRST SON WOULD BE A PAGAN HINDU WITH UNCIRCUMCISED\nPENIS..&nbsp; &nbsp;MOSES PROMISED HIM THAT ..</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">PEOPLE ASK WHY WAS JETHRO SO COMMITTED TO THE\nLAND OF PALESTINE?&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;BECAUSE HE WAS FROM THE LAND OF PUNT, WHO\nCREATED JUDAISM AND THE LANGUAGE HEBREW.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ZIPPORAH WOULD LATER CIRCUMCISE HER SON\nGERSHOM USING A SHARP FLINT ( </span><span style=\"color: red;\">WITH COPPER ELEMENT- SECRETS OF AYURVEDA</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp; ) \u2014 THE WAY THE YOUNGER BROTHERS OF KERALA\nNAMBOODIRIS DID, TO PREVENT INFECTION. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">SHE THREW THE FORESKIN OF HER SONs PENIS , ON\nTHE FEET OF MOSES IN DISGUST FOR BREAKING HIS PROMISE TO HER FATHER JETHRO.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SAGES FROM PUNT WERE\nCALLED MELCHIZEDEK \u2013 AND THEY WERE UNCIRCUMCISED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">APOLLONIUS OF TYANA WAS\nA MELCHIZEDEK.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JESUS CHRIST NEVER\nEXISTED. &nbsp;&nbsp;JESUS WAS COOKED UP IN 325 AD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesus Christ is &nbsp;identified as a priest forever in the order of\nMelchizedek quoting from Ps. 110:4.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Melchizedek is Jesus\u2014NAY\u2014Apollonius\nof Tyana<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DEAD SEA SCROLLS TELL\nCLEARLY THAT PAGAN ESSENES WERE UNCIRCUMCISED AND MELCHIZEDEK<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reference between the\nmessiah and Melchizedek appears in subsequent biblical verses: Genesis\n14:18-20; Psalm 110:1-7 Matthew 22:44; 26:26-28 Luke 22:19; Mark 14:22 John\n6:53 Acts 2:34 I Corinthians 11:23-25 Hebrews 4:14-15; 5:6; 5:10; 6:19-20;\n7:1-21. Revelation 1:6.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Melchizedek is\nmentioned twice in the Hebrew Bible, the first in Genesis and the second in\nPsalms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genesis 14:18\nintroduces Melchizedek a \"Priest of the Most High God\" (El Elyon), a\nterm which is re-used in 14:19, 20, 22.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second and final\nHebrew Bible mention of Melchizedek is in Psalm 110:4. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Lord hath sworn,\nand will not repent: 'Thou art a priest for ever after the manner of\nMelchizedek.'. (JPS 1917)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">11Q13 (11QMelch) is a\nfragment (that can be dated to the end of the 2nd or start of the 1st century\nBC) of a text about Melchizedek found in Cave 11 at Qumran in the Israeli Dead\nSea area and which comprises part of the Dead Sea Scrolls.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In this eschatological text, Melchizedek is\nseen as a divine being and Hebrew titles such as Elohim are applied to him.\nAccording to this text Melchizedek will proclaim the \"Day of\nAtonement\" and he will atone for the people who are predestined to him. He\nalso will judge the peoples<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The association or\nidentification of Melchizedek with the Messiah predates Christianity,\ndeveloping in Jewish messianism of the Second Temple period<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The association or\nidentification of Melchizedek with the Messiah predates Christianity, developing\nin Jewish messianism of the Second Temple period.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to\nEncyclop\u00e6dia Britannica, Joseph Smith ( MORMON ) &nbsp;\"appointed his male followers to\npriesthoods, named for the biblical figures Melchizedek and Aaron, that were\noverseen by the office of High Priest\"</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kOuSYUNaGWg/W1hyUVavMeI/AAAAAAABdCs/71o_gbhe9nM9tJHhrxjRI02tDBLZoImjgCLcBGAs/s1600/rrMelchiz-Abe.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">IT IS TIME FOR THE ABRAHAMIC RELIGION HISTORIANS --&nbsp; JUDAISM, CHRISTIANITY AND ISLAM TO GO BACK TO\nTHE DRAWING BOARD..</span><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The followers of Apollonius of Tyana were\nEssenes ( Ishanis ) and the hands on healer sub sect whom he initiated were\nNAZARENES.&nbsp; &nbsp;In Kerala we call them NASRANIS.. They are pagan Hindus.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">COLLOSSEUM OF ROME WAS BUILT ON A DRIED UP\nLAKE.. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">DURING FLOODING CAUSED BY HEAVY RAINS , THE\nINSIDES OF THE COLLOSEUM USED TO LOOK LIKE A LAKE.. THIS DOES NOT MEAN THERE\nWERE SHIPS INSIDE FIGHTING MOCK BATTLES TO ENTERTAIN PUBLIC..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1532528659811#c8724849678389275045\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 25, 2018 at 7:54 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_182MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nWHY THE WIFE OF MOSES, ZIPPORAH ( DAUGHTER OF HINDU SAGE JETHRO ) CUT HER SONs PRICKs FORESKIN WITH A STONE RATHER THAN A METAL KNIFE.<br />\n<br />\nWELL IN 6200 YEAR OLD SUSRUTA SANHITA, SOME SURGERIES WERE DONE BY A STONE WITH COPPER INHERENT, TO PREVENT FESTERING LATER.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html<br />\n<br />\nNOT MANY PEOPLE KNOW THAT ATP WAS DISCOVERED BY AN INDIAN NAMED YELLAPRAGADA<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html<br />\n<br />\nCOPPER IS OF THREE TYPES--<br />\n<br />\nCOPPER 0 ( 29 ELECTRONS- HARD, NOT EDIBLE )<br />\n<br />\nCOPPER 1 ( 28 ELECTRONS -- WITH AN ELECTRON TO SPARE --FOOD)<br />\n<br />\nCOPPER 2 ( 27 ELECTRONS-- THIS OXIDISED TOXIC COPPER CAUSED THE GLORIOUS ROMAN CIVILIZATION TO END. )<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/the-rotating-statue-on-nemi-ship-on.html<br />\n<br />\nCOPPER 1 FOODS WERE RECOMMENDED IN AYURVEDA ... COPPER 1 IS FOUND IN FOODS GROWN HUMUS LADEN SOILS.. OUR SNAKE GROVES OF KERALA HAS COPPER 1 INHERENT HERBS<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html<br />\n<br />\nCopper 1 has 28 electrons which means it has an electron to spare.<br />\n<br />\nOnce it is transported inside the cell it donates it's electron to the electron transport chain where ATP, cellular energy, is created.<br />\n<br />\nWithout ATP your cells struggle with bringing in nutrition and in taking out the trash. Also, if a cell is not making ATP it's making Lactic acid.<br />\n<br />\nIt's either making one or the other. So if cells are not getting enough Copper 1 you're probably going to feel fatigue, foggy headed, painful joints, all things so common today.<br />\n<br />\nNo ATP, No Energy. It's that simple. In addition, Copper is a very good antibacterial!<br />\n<br />\nEverything going in and out of the cell membrane does this through active transport or passive transport. Passive transport requires no ATP, only oxygen and water can get through cell membrane.<br />\n<br />\nActive transport requires ATP - everything else that travels in and out of the cell membrane for example nutrition, toxins, and Nero transmitters must have ATP. If toxins or neurotransmitters are stuck in the cell the cell is stuck in survival mode, neither toxins nor neurotransmitters can come out of the cell since ATP must come from within the cell to release the toxins.<br />\n<br />\nMolecular Electron Nutrition simplest explanation is the ability to easily donate electrons. The opposite of Electron Nutrition would be Electron Stealing or scavenging.<br />\n<br />\nCopper is number 29 on the periodic table therefore 29 electrons and 29 protons. Stable copper would be copper (0) like a penny. Copper in plants or Mother Nature is copper (1), oxidative state. Therefore 28 electrons, 29 protons and all copper supplements other than Cunermuspir is copper (2), 27 electrons 29 protons.<br />\n<br />\nThere are 29 isotopes of copper.<br />\n<br />\nCopper and Mercury are the only two elements in the Universe which have a +1 +2 oxidative state.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_182BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1532528702180#c1710240760448319270\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 25, 2018 at 7:55 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_181MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nWould any of you lick the blue/green color corrosion off a copper pipe? Copper (2) can only reduce therefore it can only steal an electron and by definition a free radical is missing one electron.<br />\n<br />\nCopper is essential to all living organisms as a trace dietary mineral because it is a key constituent of the respiratory enzyme complex cytochrome c oxidase.<br />\n<br />\nIn humans, copper is found mainly in the liver, muscle, and bone. The adult body contains between 1.4 and 2.1 mg of copper per kilogram of body weight<br />\n<br />\nCHEMICAL LADEN SOIL ( GREEN REVOLUTION ) DESTROYS COPPER ..AND THE FOOD GROWN IS TOXIC.<br />\n<br />\nThe two factors that commonly influence copper are the soil pH and organic matter. Peaty and acidic soils are most likely to be deficient in copper. Soils that already have high alkaline content (above 7.5), as well as soils that have had pH levels increased, result in lower copper availability.<br />\n<br />\nCopper is an essential nutrient, responsible for producing blood cells, staving off anemia, and strengthening our bones.<br />\n<br />\nVegetables high in copper include kale, mushrooms, potatoes (with skin), beans, beet greens, spinach, asparagus, sweet potatoes (with skin), and parsley. The current daily value (DV) for copper is 2mg.<br />\n<br />\nEstrogen raises copper. And copper raises estrogen. As copper increases to excess levels in the body's tissues, calcium levels also increase, but the excess calcium tends to deposit more and more in soft tissues and joints rather than in bones and teeth.<br />\n<br />\nThere is usually also an increase in the Calcium/ Magnesium ratio. This will contribute to increasing problems with blood sugar regulation. Zinc antagonizes copper, so if you have an excess of copper, you have a deficiency of zinc.<br />\n<br />\nIN KERALA OUR TEMPLE FIREWORKS HAD COPPER\u2014SHOWING BLUE.. ALL THESE WESTERN FIREWORKD ARE CHEAP\u2014THEY HAVE NO COPPER<br />\n<br />\nSAALA , LODA SE CHOOT TAK PAHUNCH GAYA !<br />\n<br />\nIPPIDI NAAN PAAKKAVAI ILLAI !<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEEE !<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_182b+seedTwND\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_182b+seedTwND\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; This serves two purposes:--<br />\njustification to themselves \u2013 as a way of dealing with the cognitive dissonance that results from inconsistencies between the way they treat others and what they believe about themselves.<br />\njustification to others \u2013 as a way of escaping harsh judgment or condemnation they may fear from others.<br />\n<br />\nManipulators often play the victim role (\"poor me\") by portraying themselves as victims of circumstances or someone else's behavior in order to gain pity or sympathy or to evoke compassion and thereby get something from someone..<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><br />JEWISH VICTIM PLAYING IS NOW UNDERSTOOD BY ALL.<br /><br />THIS IS WHY WHEN TRUMP SAID HE WILL SHIFT THE US EMBASSY TO JERUSALEM\u2014 HE HAD THE SUPPORT OF JUST 4 NATIONS NAARULAND , SHAARULAND , GAANDULAND AND PAANDULAND..</span></b><br />\nPeople worldwide now understand thus truth.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: red; Cambodia has the\nhighest undetected landmines on this planet as of today\u2014estimated to be more\nthan 320 mines per person.&nbsp; Land mines\nare cheap, ranging from 3 dollars to 20 dollars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One Cambodian one human\nin every 189 has lost an eye or a limb to a US land air dropped mine this is\nthe highest on the planet . font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to a report\nby the House Select Committee on Crime, the armed forces used 225 million\ntablets of stimulants between 1966 and 1969.&nbsp;\nIt reality the nuber is 306 million tablets of hardcore Opioid\nStimulants<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition to those\namphetamines, which were used to boost endurance on long missions, sedatives\nwere prescribed to help relieve anxiety and prevent mental breakdowns. G.I.s\nshifted their drug use to heroin, which was odorless and thus harder to detect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A 1968 survey of unit\ncommanders unanimously concluded that Opiod &nbsp;drugs had NOT degraded the military\u2019s combat\neffectiveness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">SAME HAPPENED IN\nAFGHANISTAN.. OPIOD DRUGS WERE SMUGLED TO USA IN BODY BAGS.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE ASK \u2013WHY HAS NOBODY\nWRITTEN ABOUT THIS?</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/GhL4mz8kIT8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/GhL4mz8kIT8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">March 15, 2018 at 6:34\nPM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">XXXXX<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">In MIG 21 heavier added\non weights with every CHOOT local upgrade meant that the plane requires\nadditional after burner engine thrust to even take off..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Tejas Mk 2 will have a\nGeneral Electric F414 afterburning turbofan engine with 98 kN thrust.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">High-G training is done\nby aviators and astronauts who are subject to high levels of acceleration\n('G'). It is designed to prevent a g-induced loss of consciousness (G-LOC), a\nsituation when the action of g-forces move the blood away from the brain to the\nextent that consciousness is lost.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">TAKING UPPER DRUGS (\nOFFICIALLY GIVEN TO CHICKEN INDIAN POLITS WHO HAVE NO GAAND MEIN TATTI \u2013&nbsp; &nbsp;IMAGINE\nWE NOW HAVE FEMALE FIGHTER JET PILOTS ) AFFECTS HUMAN PERFORMANCE AND THIS IS\nTHE REASON WE MANGED TO CREATE A WORLD RECORD OF MORE THAN 500 MIG 21 CRASHES\nIN PEACE TIME. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE CAN HARDLY CONGRATULATE\nOURSELF.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">OUR PILOTS ARE NOT\nTRAINED PROPERLY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LPg9Tm4L9nk\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LPg9Tm4L9nk</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">A MODERN Russian\nfighter jet eight Gs, so you become eight times heavier than your normal weight\n- so your head becomes eight times heavier on your shoulders<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">As g-forces increase,\nvisual effects include loss of colour vision (\"grey-out\"), followed\nby tunnel vision (where peripheral vision is lost, retaining only the centre\nvision). If g-forces increase further, complete loss of vision will occur,\nwhile consciousness remains. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">These effects are due\nto a reduction of blood flow to the eyes before blood flow to the brain is\nlost, because the extra pressure within the eye (intraocular pressure) counters\nthe blood pressure. The reverse effect is experienced in advanced aerobatic\nmaneuvers under negative g-forces, where excess blood moves towards the brain\nand eyes \"red out\". <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Humans can withstand a\npositive acceleration forward at higher g-forces than they can withstand a\npositive acceleration upwards at the same g-force. This is because when the\nbody accelerates up at such high rates the blood rushes from the brain which\ncauses loss of vision. A further increase in g-forces will cause G-LOC where\nconsciousness is lost.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">A G-suit is worn by\naviators and astronauts who are subject to high levels of acceleration ('G').\nIt is designed to prevent a black-out and g-LOC (gravity-induced Loss Of\nConsciousness), due to the blood pooling in the lower part of the body when\nunder G, thus depriving the brain of blood. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">A G-suit has a blow up\nbladder clamped to the pilots legs , and it forces blood back up through your\nbody. Some pilots pass out but aren't sure what's happened, and they can forget\nwhere they are and what they're doing - flying an aircraft<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NWBMYV6S5gA\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NWBMYV6S5gA</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHAT I WRITE HERE HAS\nBEEN SENT TO GOI SEVERAL TIMES..THEY DONT CARE... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: x-large;\">WE THE PEOPLE HOLD THE\nAIRFORCE CHIEF, DEFENCE MINISTER AND PRIME MINISTER RESPONSIBLE FOR MORE THAN\n500 MIG 21 CRASHES... </span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE GOVT AUTHORIZED THE\nIAF PILOTS TO TAKE \"</span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">UPPER DRUGS</span></b><span style=\"color: purple;\">\" -- WHICH IS A CRIME AND NOW\nMANSLAUGHTER CHARGES MUST BE SLAPPED --ALBEIT A BIT TOO LATE... THESE PILLS\nIMPAIR JUDGEMENT IN REAL SITUATIONS ( NOT DRILL ) \u2013 </span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">AS A SHIP CAPTAIN ON\nCHEMICAL TANKERS WE ARE TRAINED IN THIS... IT IS A FOUL LIE THAT AIR FORCES\nAROUND THE WORLD USE IT.... <b><span style=\"color: red;\">UPPER EUGEROIC , MODAFINIL CAUSES CONFUSION - AND\nTHE FIGHTER JET PILOT BECOMES A LIABILITY..HE COULD START A WORLD WAR.... </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">DOWNER SEDATIVE\nZOLPIDEM CAUSES SADNESS AND CO-ORDINATION DISORDERS... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHOEVER AUTHORISED\nTHIS, SACK HIM. WHOEVER USED THESE DRUGS CENSURE THEM AND PUT AN ENTRY IN THEIR\nCONFIDENTIAL FILES WHICH WILL AFFECT THEIR PROMOTIONS... . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\">IN HIGH SPEED MACHINES\nYOU DO NOT NEED AN UPPER-- THE BODY PROVIDES THE ADRENALINE...
