, &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ATTORNEY GENERAL.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CMs OF ALL STATES&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GOVERNORs OF ALL STATES.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ARUN JAITTLEY</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SPREAD ON SOCAL MEDIA</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The DEEP STATE\nwants&nbsp; a massive military buildup to\ncrush an enemy that does not really exist. Putting it all together, the cost of\nthe US secret government constitutes the greatest rip off in the history of the\nworld.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Huge (and illegal) data collection projects\nmean that no one\u2019s personal information or activities once protected by law and\nregarded as \u201cprivate\u201d are any longer safe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Washington seeks both omnipotence and\nomniscience, but in fact it achieves neither. It can destroy any conventional\narmy that any adversary might field or destabilize and regime change any\ncountry, but clusters of lightly armed and highly motivated tribesmen elude its\ngrasp.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Washington policy making elite\nfail again and again because they have no learning curve and repeat their\nmistakes over and over again.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be sure countless billions of phone intercepts\nsit in an enormous data base in Utah, but if no one can read them or figure out\nwhat they mean it has all been a waste of time- mere activity traps.. So the\nkey question becomes, \u201cHas the national security state actually accomplished\nanything?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1935, the FBI had\ngrown into an independent agency under the direction of J. Edgar Hoover whose\nstaff, through the use of wire taps, cable taps, mail tampering, garbage\nfiltering and infiltrators, prepared secret FBI Index Lists on more than 10\nmillion people by 1939.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following the September\n11th attacks of 2001, domestic and international mass surveillance capabilities\nescalated far beyond the levels permitted by the US Constitution and the Bill\nof Rights..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c We will come together\nto strengthen our intelligence capabilities to know the plans of terrorists\nbefore they act and to find them before they strike \u201c\u2014\u2009President Bush speaking\nin Congress on September 20, 2001<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2002, \"Total\nInformation Awareness\" was established by the U.S. government in order to\n\"revolutionize the ability of the United States to detect, classify and\nidentify foreign terrorists\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Utah Data Center,\nalso known as the Intelligence Community Comprehensive National Cybersecurity\nInitiative Data Center, is a data storage facility for the United States\nIntelligence Community that is designed to store data estimated to be on the\norder of exabytes or larger.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its purpose\nis to support the Comprehensive National Cybersecurity Initiative (CNCI),\nthough its precise mission is classified..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The data center is\nalleged to be able to process \"all forms of communication, including the\ncomplete contents of private emails, cell phone calls, and Internet searches,\nas well as all types of personal data trails \u2014 parking receipts, travel\nitineraries, bookstore purchases, and other digital 'pocket litter'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 6 June 2013,\nBritain's The Guardian newspaper began publishing a series of revelations by an\nunnamed American whistleblower, revealed several days later to be former CIA\nand NSA-contracted systems analyst Edward Snowden.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Snowden gave a cache of\ninternal documents in support of his claims to two journalists: Glenn Greenwald\nand Laura Poitras, Greenwald later estimated that the cache contains 15,000 \u2013\n20,000 documents, some very large and very detailed, and some very small. This\nwas one of the largest news leaks in the modern history of the United States.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In over two months of publications, it became clear that the NSA operates a\ncomplex web of spying programs which allow it to intercept internet and\ntelephone conversations from over a billion users from dozens of countries\naround the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 19 June 2013, deep\nstate operative, FBI Director Robert Mueller told the United States Senate\nCommittee on the Judiciary that the federal government had been employing\nsurveillance drones on U.S. soil in \"particular incidents\". By 2020,\nabout 30,000 unmanned drones are expected to be deployed in the United States\nfor the purpose of surveillance and law enforcement</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In an interview with\nDer Spiegel published on 12 August 2013, former NSA Director Michael Hayden\nadmitted that \"We the NSA steal secrets. We're number one in it\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/zFdxGE77vvD2w5xHy6jkVuElKv-U9_9qLkRYK8OnbDeJPtjSZ82UPq5w6hJ-SA=s35\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2087745394291131748\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_63M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/03515649322352795115\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">abcindiagogo</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_21.html?showComment=1532182656990#c2087745394291131748\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 21, 2018 at 7:47 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_63MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain, is it possible that the Queen-of-Engl@nd consumes organic food from India and undergoes Genuine-Ayurvedic treatments ?<br />\n<br />\nBecause for someone of her age, especially in the West, to be so healthy and sprightly after consuming Big-Pharma medicines is not possible. Geographically, Pandharpur is on the border of Maharashtra and Karnataka. The ancient name of Pandharpur was Pandarage.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild created a saint by the name of Pundalik, to be closely associated with this shrine, and called it Pundarika Pura.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild got his Chitpavan Brahmin stooges to inject into Skanda Purana , the name \u2018Panduranga\u2019 as a synonym for \u2018Vitthala\u2019.<br />\n<br />\nNobody ever heard of Vitthala and Pandharpur before the Chitpavan Jews started re-writing local history\u2014back dating every thing by several centuries. Every Maharashtrian is now familiar with the term \u2018Varkari\u2019 .<br />\n<br />\nA Varkari is one who religiously performs the vari (pilgrimage) to Pandharpur on foot, especially during the months of Ashadha (mid June to mid July) and Kartika (mid October to mid November).<br />\n<br />\nMany people go on pilgrimages, but the term \u2018Varkari\u2019 has got exclusively associated with the pilgrimage to Pandharpur\u2014as it was made famous by Rothschild stooges .<br />\n<br />\nRothschild even got his stooges to write a back dated Panduranga-shataka-stotra composed by Adi Shankaracharya ( 2000 BC ) ..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Specifically, Obama\u2019s plan involves seizing\ncontrol of:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">*&nbsp; \u201cAll commodities and products that are\ncapable of being ingested by either human beings or animals\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moreover, federal\nofficials would \u201cissue regulations to prioritize and allocate resources.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each government\nbureaucracy \u201cshall act as necessary and appropriate.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be sure, much of this\nlanguage has appeared in national security executive orders that previous\npresidents have issued periodically since the beginning of the Cold War.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But more than previous\nnational security executive orders, Obama\u2019s 13603 seems to describe a\npotentially totalitarian regime obsessed with control over everything.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama\u2019s executive order\nmakes no effort to justify the destruction of liberty, no effort to explain how\namassing totalitarian control would enable government to deal effectively with\ncyber sabotage, suicide bombings, chemical warfare, nuclear missiles or other\npossible threats.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There\u2019s nothing in\nexecutive order 13603 about upholding the Constitution or protecting civil\nliberties. Executive order 13603 says with ominous ambiguity: during \u201cthe full spectrum\nof emergencies.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well, the United States\nis already in a state of national emergency declared by President George W.\nBush on September 14, 2001 and extended last year by President Obama.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Language buried deep\ninside Executive Order 13603, which Barack Obama signed into law on March 16th\n2012 that gives the Federal government the legal authority to force any person\ninto de facto slavery. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to this\nExecutive Order the President, or those he designates, can conscript \u201cpersons\nof outstanding experience and ability without compensation,\u201d in \u201cpeacetime and\ntimes of national emergency.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a nutshell, that\nmeans that Barack Obama, and those he designates, can seize any resource,\nproperty, or person at any time for any reason, including forcing that person\nwith labor without being paid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is only ONE word\nfor forced, \u201cuncompensated employment.\u201d That word is slavery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like the NDAA, the new\nExecutive Order puts the government completely above the law, which, in a\ndemocracy, is never supposed to happen. The United States is essentially now\nunder martial law without the exigencies of a national emergency. The 2012 NDAA\ndeemed the United States a \u201cbattlefield\u201d..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It gave the president\nand his agents the right to seize and arrest any U.S. citizen, detain them\nindefinitely without charge or trial, and do so only on suspicion, without any\njudicial oversight or due process. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The new Executive Order\nstates that the president and his secretaries have the authority to commandeer\nall U.S. domestic resources, including food and water, as well as seize all\nenergy and transportation infrastructure inside the borders of the United\nStates. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Government can also\nforcibly draft U.S. citizens into the military and force U.S. citizens to\nfulfill \u201clabor requirements\u201d for the purposes of \u201cnational defense.\u201d There is\nnot even any Congressional oversight allowed, only briefings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the NDAA, only the\npresident had the authority to abrogate legitimate freedoms of U.S. citizens.\nWhat is extraordinary in the new Executive Order is that this supreme power is\ndesignated through the president to the secretaries that run the Government\nitself:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The Secretary of\nDefense has power over all water resources;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The Secretary of\nCommerce has power over all material services and facilities, including\nconstruction materials;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The Secretary of\nTransportation has power over all forms of civilian transportation;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The Secretary of\nAgriculture has power over food resources and facilities, livestock plant\nhealth resources, and the domestic distribution of farm equipment;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The Secretary of\nHealth and Human Services has power over all health resources;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The Secretary of\nEnergy has power over all forms of energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Executive Order\neven stipulates that in the event of conflict between the secretaries in using\nthese powers, the president will determine the resolution through his national\nsecurity team.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 2012 NDAA gave the\nGovernment the right to abrogate any due process against a U.S. citizen. The\nnew Executive Order gives the government, through the Secretary of Labor, the\nright to proactively mobilize U.S. citizens for \u201clabor\u201d as the government deems\nnecessary and to coordinate with the Secretary of Defense to maintain data to\ncoordinate the nation\u2019s work needs in relation to national defense.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is extraordinary\nabout the Executive Order is that, like the NDAA, this can all be done in\npeacetime without any national emergency to justify it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The language of the\nOrder does not state that all these extraordinary measures will be done in the\nevent of \u201cnational security\u201d or a \u201cnational emergency.\u201d They can simply be done\nfor \u201cpurposes of national defense,\u201d clearly a broader remit that allows the\ngovernment to do what it wants, when it wants, how it wants, to whomever it\nwants, all without any judicial restraint or due process. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As Orwell famously said\nin 1984, \u201cWar is peace. Peace is war.\u201d This is now the reality on the ground in\nAmerica.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally, the 2012 NDAA\nwas hurried through the House and Senate almost like a covert op with minimal\npublic attention or debate. It was then signed by the president at 9:00 PM on\nNew Year\u2019s Eve while virtually nobody was paying attention to much other than\nthe approaching new year.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS IS A DEEP STATE\nSIGNATURE.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WOODROW WILSON WAS MADE\nPRESIDENT BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ON THE SINGULAR CONDITION THAT HE MUST SIGN THE\nFEDERAL RESERVE ACT INTO LAW....!!!! <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WOODROW WILSON DID IT\nIN A CUNNING MANNER ON THE NIGHT OF DEC 23RD 1913, WHEN ALL WHO MATTERED IN US\nCONGRESS WERE ON CHRISTMAS EVE HOLIDAY..</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">This new Executive Order was written and\nsigned in complete secret and then quietly released by the White House on its\nwebsite without comment. All this was done under a president who studied\nconstitutional law at Harvard.</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--dsWzFMh0BM/W1UZdRBjB2I/AAAAAAABc8s/t6q78z8k4XY0nJgoyZEcZIXaUJVpyJZHgCLcBGAs/s1600/5ee64089aec9c3723e1f0b66a715900a8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"661\" data-original-width=\"474\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--dsWzFMh0BM/W1UZdRBjB2I/AAAAAAABc8s/t6q78z8k4XY0nJgoyZEcZIXaUJVpyJZHgCLcBGAs/s640/5ee64089aec9c3723e1f0b66a715900a8.jpg\" width=\"458\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-urWvyZN7nro/W1UZ7fQ-aOI/AAAAAAABc80/twpIb_A620IPRB_kzVyGO4bRc9VaNHf7wCLcBGAs/s1600/bb39c85f171ed83drrra9f84c22220a7236.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"500\" data-original-width=\"410\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-urWvyZN7nro/W1UZ7fQ-aOI/AAAAAAABc80/twpIb_A620IPRB_kzVyGO4bRc9VaNHf7wCLcBGAs/s640/bb39c85f171ed83drrra9f84c22220a7236.jpg\" width=\"524\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Obama\nbrought America to the edge of failure and collapse. He made America\nindifferent to its failure. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Obama\ntrained in NLP was the near-perfect Deep State servant as he told the American\npeople to go to hell and actually made many of us look forward to the trip!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-RzdtZ2Y4dig/W1UcuGOiS-I/AAAAAAABc9U/Sc938GfFSHM-S663x1NiSbfSM7-LGBlVgCLcBGAs/s1600/imagKes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"186\" data-original-width=\"271\" height=\"274\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-RzdtZ2Y4dig/W1UcuGOiS-I/AAAAAAABc9U/Sc938GfFSHM-S663x1NiSbfSM7-LGBlVgCLcBGAs/s400/imagKes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Obama\nset the table for Hillary. He was magnificent in his role as a setup man. With\nHillary Clinton waiting in the wings, her mission was to complete the job that\nObama started.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hillary,\nthe most evil woman USA has produced &nbsp;was\nsupposed to start World War III, imprison dissenters and take the guns so the\npeople could not rise up against DEEP STATE JEWS..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rjSNsNzOgjc/W1UbNUzDTrI/AAAAAAABc9A/tFpkiFfBi2gYwvZ9iOMv1iB8IWawPcXFQCLcBGAs/s1600/ObFama-Deep-State-Get-Trump.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-27I9fFByNBg/W1UbbMZXpHI/AAAAAAABc9E/vBGjJxiDj-AUec7aqmj8tbpAgvsv6ZWEwCLcBGAs/s1600/2nd-amIUVGendment-800x594.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; OOOH WE ARE SO BRAVE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY DO NOT KNOW THAT PESHWAS WERE CHITPAVAN JEWS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LATER PESHAWAS HANDED OVER THE CONQUERED LANDS TO ROTHSCHILD ON A GOLDEN PLATTER-- AND HAPPILY RETIRED..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHOOH CHWEEET.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">WHEN INDIRA GANDI WAS GUNNED DOWN, WE KNOW HOW MANY CRORES OF HAFTA FRIGHTENED SIKH BUSINESSMEN IN MUMBAI GAVE TO THE MARATHA MANOOS PARTY FOR PROTECTION .</span><span style=\"color: blue; line-height: 200%;\">IS THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">MOHINI OF SAMUDRAMANTHAN EPISODE BELONGS TO <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KURMA\nAVATAR</span></b> OF VISHNU, WHEN EARTH WAS BARELY INHABITTED ,&nbsp; HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS OF YEARS BEFORE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">VISHNU AS VARAHA BOAR AVATAR TILTED EARTHs\nAXIS TO 23.4 DEGRESS SO THAT LIFE COULD BEGIN ON PLANET EARTH .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">The ten Vishnu Avatars are:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">1. Matsya (the fish) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">2. Koorma (the tortoise)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">3. Varaha (the boar)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">4. Narasimha (the human-lion)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">5. Vamana (the dwarf)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">6. Parasurama (the angry man, Rama with an\naxe)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">7. Lord Rama (the perfect man, king of\nAyodha)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">8. Lord Krishna (the divine statesman) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">9. Lord Ayyappa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">10. Kalki (the mighty warrior)--the FINAL\navatar<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">DON\u2019T EVER THINK OUR PURANAS CONTAINED\nSUPERSTITION OR RIDICULOUS STORIES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR WITH GIRLY VOICE AND\nSLENDER FINGERS TOLD A LIE THAT SHIVA AND VISHNU ( MOHINI)&nbsp; HAD ANAL SEX TOPRODUCE AYAPPA.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/05/vishnu-avatar-varaha-boar-fixing-planet.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/05/vishnu-avatar-varaha-boar-fixing-planet.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">AYYAPPA DISAPPEARED FROM INDIA AS A CHILD, (\nSO THAT HIS FATHERs BLOODLINE COULD CONTINUE&nbsp; --HE SWORE NOT TO MARRY AND PRODUCE KIDS ) &nbsp;AND THEN RESURFACED AS IMHOTEP.</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">October 9, 2017 at 7:29\nAM</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.speakingtree.in/blog/this-unnoticed-transgender-from-maharabharat-was-arjunas-son?utm_source=special-email&amp;utm_medium=emailer&amp;utm_campaign=09oct\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.speakingtree.in/blog/this-unnoticed-transgender-from-maharabharat-was-arjunas-son?utm_source=special-email&amp;utm_medium=emailer&amp;utm_campaign=09oct</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE ASK THE MODI GOVT TO\nJAIL ANTI-HINDU STORY TELLERS , FAKE COMMIE HISTORIANS AND DESH DROHI LITERARY\nFEST PARTICIPANTS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>IRAVAN</b></span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"> IS JUST A SIDE\nCHARACTER IN MAHABHARATA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the 8th day of\nKurukshetra war Arjuna\u2019s son Iravan was killed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This son of Arjuna by\nhis Naga wife had come and joined the Pandava forces at Kurukshetra. Duryodhana\nsent his friend, the Rakshasa Alambasa, to oppose the Naga warrior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Iravan was slain after\na fierce fight. When Arjuna heard this, he broke down completely<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Seeing Iravan killed,\nGhatotkacha ( son of the Pandava Bhima and the Rakshasi Hidimbi ) uttered a\nloud war-cry which made all the assembled soldiers tremble. And with his\ndivision, he fell upon the Kaurava army ferociously. So great was the\ndestruction he wrought that at many points the Kaurava formation was broken<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS SIDE STORY HAS\nBEEN USED BY JEW ROTHSCHILDs FAKE MUTTS TO CREATE BULLSHIT STORIES TO MAKE THE\nHINDU SELF LOATHING<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MUCH WORSE THAN WHAT\nWIKIPEDIA HAS SAID IS DONE TODAY, USING CROSS DRESSED TAMIL DALITS TO RIDICULE\nHINDUISM..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE BENAMI MEDIA, JNU\nCOMMIES AND LITERARY FEST DROHIS LOVE THIS DENEGRATION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">JNU commie professors\ncome out with new new stories every years--stating we have done research in\nMalaysia / Indonesia etc ---all lies</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROTHSCHILD USED HIS\nFAKE KANCHI MUTT TO DO PROPAGANDA--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HERE IS TOTAL BULLSHIT\nBY WIKIPEDIA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE--Aravan (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;latha&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0b85\u0bb0\u0bb5\u0bbe\u0ba9\u0bcd</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\nArav\u0101\u1e47). He is also a patron god of well-known transgender communities called\nThiruNangai (also Aravani in South India, and Hijra throughout South Asia).\nAravan is worshipped in the form of his severed head and is believed to cure\ndisease and induce pregnancy in childless women. . Some paintings also depict\nthe sacrifice of Aravan. In these scenes, he is often depicted bowing to Kali,\nwhile his head is about to be severed; or, as in one Sowcarpet painting, a\nself-decapitated Aravan holds both a sword and his own severed head, offering\nthe latter to the goddess.[16][17] the Tamil versions discuss Aravan's (Tamil\nname) ritual self-sacrifice to Kali before the war. Hiltebeitel relates this to\nthe South Indian glorification of \"heroic\" self-mutilation and\nself-decapitation before a goddess.[24][25] .. In Villiputuralvar's\n14th-century version, Krishna first offers himself as the sacrificial victim,\nbut Aravan volunteers to replace him. Krishna tricks the gods Surya (the Sun)\nand Chandra (the Moon) to co-ordinate their movements so that the day of the\nnew moon will fall one day earlier\u2014the current day. Another version, popular\nwith transsexuals, cites the reason behind Aravan's wish to be \"coital\nbliss\" and tells explicitly about consummation of the marriage.[54][55]\n..The Kuttantavar cult ritualizes both the heroic death and the marriage\nceremony\u2014enacted by ThiruNangais (officially, \"eunuchs\" in Tamil\nNadu)..Sometimes a chicken is sacrificed on stage in a terukuttu performance to\nsignify the sacrifice.[56][59] In Villiputuralvar's retelling, an elephant is\nsacrificed to the goddess, complementing Aravan's own self-sacrifice.[49 Krishna\nasks Aravan\u2014the sole witness of the entire war, \"who was truly responsible\nfor winning this war?\"Aravan replies that he saw two things: Krishna's\ndiscus decapitating the enemy, and his conch shell collecting their blood. ]\nAbout 25,000 transvestites, including the Aravanis, visit the festival.[75]\n..During the first six days of the Kuttantavar festival, Aravan's head (cami)\nis \"danced\" around the streets of Kuvagam.. Traditionally, goats and\nchickens are sacrificed. On the 13th day, Aravan's \"soul\" is ritually\ntransferred from his head to a pot..Even married men and men afflicted with\ndiseases, all dressed as women, are described as ritually \"marrying\"\nAravan in the festival, to please the deity.[79]..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2---</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. Ajit\nVadakayil</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">October 9, 2017 at 7:30 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">After this dance, the\npriest marries the Aravanis to Aravan through the traditional thali-tying\nceremony. The Aravanis then conduct sex work, symbolic of consummating their\nritual marriage. A \"night of wild revelry and sexual promiscuity\"\nfollows for the Aravanis.[55][72] THIS FUCKING STILL TAKES PLACE AND EVR\nPERIYAR PARTY POLICE DO NOT ARREST.. The head is then paraded around the\nvillage on a portable platform called a ketayam. The ceremony ends with a\nsacrificial offering of roosters. The \"widowed\" Aravanis, with their\nhair dishevelled, lament the death of their \"husband\" as he performs\nthe kalappali. The garlands from Aravan's image are thrown at devotees one by\none, symbolizing his gradual loss of vitality. At this \"weeping\nground\", the Aravanis mourn Aravan's death by breaking their bangles,\nbeating their breasts and discarding their bridal finery, like the legendary\nMohini-Krishna. They cut their thalis, which are flung at a post erected for\nthe ceremony (vellikkal). After bathing, they put on white saris as a mark of\ntheir widowhood. The Aravanis bear these signs of widowhood for a month before\nre-adorning themselves with bangles and coloured saris again.[77]Also at the\nalukalam, a symbolic sacrifice of cooked \"blood rice\" is distributed\nin honour of the deceased Aravan. This rice is believed to make childless women\nconceive. After the death rites at dusk, the chariot is now considered a\n\"house of death\", and the lifeless head is removed from the frame of\nits skeletal body, then covered by a cloth, and finally paraded around the\nvillage as though at a funeral. The head is taken to the temple of Kali, where\nis it \"revived\". On the 18th and final day, the head is decorated and\nparaded around the village a final time. In the evening, the pujari (\"priest\")\nas Yudhishthira (Dharmaraja) crowns Aravan's head in a coronation ceremony held\nin the inner sanctum of his temple.[77][81].. The officiating priest first\ntakes a sword, striking pieces from the head. Then, a pumpkin is sliced into 32\npieces, symbolizing 32 pieces of Aravan's sacrificed body. Next, Aravan is fed\nhis own \"blood\", represented by the blood of goat, sacrificed to\nAravan beforehand. Aravan's body from the neck downwards is then covered with a\nbloodstained white cloth. Finally, blood-soaked rice is sprinkled on Aravan's\nface. Devotees, as in the Kuttantavar cult, believe eating this rice from\nAravan's face, recovered after the ceremony, can induce pregnancy.[86]...one of\nthe actors, believed to be possessed by Kali, kills a rooster over the statue's\nneck, symbolizing the sacrifice. Again, blood-soaked rice is distributed to\ndevotees, especially childless women.[87] Similar rituals associated with a\nsymbolic sacrifice and blood-soaked rice are performed in Melaccari,[88]\nAlantur, Punamalli and Villupuram. At Alantur and Punamalli, a goat is\nsacrificed, in Cuddalore, Patirikkuppam and Villupuram, a cock is\nsacrificed.[89]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As he fell, the gods,\nwho looked on from above, folded their hands in reverent salutation and a gentle\nbreeze, laden with fragrance and cool raindrops, swept over the battlefield.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus fell the great and\ngood Bhishma, the son of Ganga, who came on earth to hallow it and all it\nbears.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The blameless hero who,\nunasked, made the great renunciation ( of not marrying ) to give joy to his\nfather.&nbsp; The undefeated bowman who had\nhumbled the pride of Rama of the axe&nbsp;\n(Parshuram ) . The selfless worker for righteousness' sake, thus repaid\nhis debt to Duryodhana, and lay wounded to death sanctifying with his life-blood\nthe battlefield. As the grandsire fell, the hearts of the Kauravas also fell\nalong with him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhishma's body did not\ntouch the ground, on account of the arrows sticking out all over his body. His\nbody shone more brightly than ever before, as it lay as on a bed of honor,\nsupported by the shafts that had pierced his flesh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both armies ceased\nfighting and all the warriors came running and crowded round the great hero,\nwho lay on his bed of arrows. The kings of the earth stood with bowed heads\nround him, as the gods round Brahma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"My head hangs\ndown unsupported,\" said the grandsire. The princes who stood near, ran and\nbrought cushions. The old warrior rejected them with a smile and, turning\ntowards Arjuna said: \"Dear son Partha, give me a cushion befitting a\nwarrior.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Arjuna, whose\narrows were just then burning the grandsire's flesh, heard those words\naddressed to him, he took three arrows from out of his quiver and so placed\nthem that the grandsire's head found support on their points.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Princes,\"\nsaid Bhishma addressing the assembled chiefs, \"Arjuna's arrows were indeed\nwhat my head required to be supported on. This pillow gives me satisfaction.\nNow, I must lie thus until the sun turns north. My soul will not depart till\nthen. ( THIS IS THE ICHAMRIYTHYU DATE OF MAKARAVILAKKU AT SABARIMALA , KERALA &nbsp;) When I pass away, those of you who may be\nalive then may come and see me.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then the grandsire\nturned again to Arjuna and said: \"I am tormented with thirst. Get me some\ndrinking water.\" At once, Arjuna raised his bow, and drawing, it to the\near, shot a shaft down into the earth near the grandsire on his right side.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upon the opening made\nby the arrow, there gushed a stream of pure sweet water to the very lips of the\ndying man. Ganga came up, says the poet, to quench her dear son's burning\nthirst. Bhishma drank and was happy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Duryodhana, may\nyou be wise!\" said Bhishma, addressing the Kaurava prince. \"Did you\nsee how Arjuna brought me water to quench my thirst? Who else in this world can\ndo such a deed? Make peace with him without further delay. May the war cease\nwith my exit. Listen to me, son, make peace with the Pandavas.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-n6pgA8xWdYY/WTOjXL_7rTI/AAAAAAABUEo/IzmmzvME5RcG7rBDoc-GSWRlImVgi-MCQCLcB/s640/Mahabharata-eeBhishma-Pitamah.jpg.jpeg\" /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">THE THREE FLASHES AT\nSABARIMALA OCCURS AT THE EXACT TIME WHEN BHISHMAs SOUL LEAVES HIS MORTAL COIL\nFOR MOKSHA.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/sabarimala-makara-vilakku-makara.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/sabarimala-makara-vilakku-makara.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">ARDHNARISHWAR</span></b> IS BEING\nUSED TO REGULARISE HOM0SEXUALITY ( STRIKE DOWN SEC 377 ) BY COLLEGIUM JUDGES ..\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE THE PEOPLE WONT\nALLOW THIS CRIMINAL MISUSE OF POWERS \u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ardhanarishvara, the\nAndrogynous One, is an aspect of Lord Shiva, whose form is half man and half\nwoman..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARDHNARISHWAR IS A\nCOSMIC ALLEGORY.... SHIVA IS NOT A LGBT TRANSGENDER. . THIS AMAZING CONCEPT\nCANNOT BE USED TO PROPAGATE DEPRAVED AN#L SEX..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHIVA HAS TO BE\nARDHANARISHWARA TO DEVELOP HIS FULL POTENTIAL..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Tantric cosmology,\nthe whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by\ntwo fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible\nUNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and\nShakti ( Prakriti). ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The concept of\nArdhanarishvara clearly brings out the fact that Prakriti (Shakti) and Purusha\n(Shiva) are nothing without each other and one cannot exist and function in the\nabsence of the other...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purusha and Pragati is\nexpressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or\na transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MIND YOU --SHIVA AND\nHIS CONSORT SHAKTI ( PARVATI/ DEVI/ KALI/ DURGA ) ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purusha is the\nembodiment of pure consciousness, and Prakriti is the embodiment of pure\nenergy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and\ncreated the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not\nstreet side an#l sex as figured out by small minds)\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the insentient Prakriti\ncomes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purusha symbolizes\nconsciousness, the masculine principle. Prakriti symbolizes the feminine\nprinciple, the activating energy. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The eternal and\nindestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole\nMacrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not only is Shakti\nresponsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change.Shakti is\nmanifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the\nend of creation. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern science repeats\nfrom our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does\nconsciousness and energy . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the highest planes\nthey are interchangeable, which is why we see a great incongruence between our\nspiritual experiences and the external reality. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The union of Shakti\nwith Shiva by Kundalini rise is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of\nendless birth and death\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT\nALLOW SHIVA TO BE DENIGRATED BY DEEP STATE JUDGES AND LAWYERS IN THE PAYROLL OF\nFOREIGN FORCES ANYMORE\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;
