font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHO ELSE ON THIS PLANET HAS SUCH AN UNIQUE ADVANTAGE ?</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9Cv6Ql_DcfA/W1BUXGowl1I/AAAAAAABc5A/WKiotVmShNw8X5JkonKsAHFDKGQTy7xVACLcBGAs/s1600/mqqaxresdefault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"1280\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9Cv6Ql_DcfA/W1BUXGowl1I/AAAAAAABc5A/WKiotVmShNw8X5JkonKsAHFDKGQTy7xVACLcBGAs/s640/mqqaxresdefault.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not many Americans know\nthat German Jew Carl Schurz created the first civil service which he packed\nwith Rothschild\u2019s agents.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carl Schurz, a Union\nArmy general, proposed the idea of a nonpolitical civil service. It would be\nboth a meritocracy and a technocracy. Civil servants would be selected by\ncompetitive exams measuring their skills for the job. And the job of civil\nservants would be to implement laws passed by Congress in the manner the\npresident wanted them enforced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Previously, all\ngovernment employees \u2013 save those from the two other branches of government \u2013\nserved at the pleasure of the president. This was no longer true, and it meant\nthat a civil servant could not be fired on political whim, but rather with\ncause, such as failing to do his job competently or refusing to obey\ninstructions from the office of the president.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The intent was to limit\nthe president\u2019s power<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The reason given to the\nHilly Billy Yank was that a presidential term lasted four years; policies could\nlast for generations. If administrators were replaced every time a president\nleft office, as previously had been the case, there would be no continuity in\ngovernment. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">New administrators\nwould constantly have to learn the complexities of their jobs, and by the time\nthey mastered it, they would have to leave. Government operations had outgrown\na president\u2019s term.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A deeper concept was at\nwork here that went beyond the United States, originating in Europe. That idea\nmandated a separation between the political state and the administrative state.\nAs the state acquired more responsibility and its tasks became more complex,\ngovernment administration had to be taken away from the politicians, who were\nunskilled at the job. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was in many ways\nthe origins of technocracy, a doctrine that stated that a government run by\nexperts broadly guided by their political masters was the only way to correct a\ndemocratic republic\u2019s shortcomings. Elected politicians provided direction,\nwhile technocrats provided expertise, advice and continuity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-L3-qcsNL8Hw/W1BU7e3uYjI/AAAAAAABc5Q/GVyyK9bUUAMlMc1DdM6FCiM2GL9jOTwdACLcBGAs/s1600/dDZwW7QvpX0AEK4Do.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"285\" data-original-width=\"505\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-L3-qcsNL8Hw/W1BU7e3uYjI/AAAAAAABc5Q/GVyyK9bUUAMlMc1DdM6FCiM2GL9jOTwdACLcBGAs/s640/dDZwW7QvpX0AEK4Do.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the surface, this\nwas reasonable. It anticipated the dramatic growth of the federal government\nand created a structure to cope with its complexity. While this evolution was\nnot included in the Constitution, it was not unconstitutional because the\npresident and Congress remained in charge. But like all things, it had\nunexpected consequences. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By stripping the\npresident of the right to fire those whose performance did not meet his\nstandards, the solution posed a problem: If a civil servant could only be fired\nfor cause and did not serve at the pleasure of the president, how could the\npresident be certain that the policies being followed were legislated and\nordered by him?</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A \u201csuper\u201d civil service\nwas created that served at the president\u2019s pleasure and sought to control a civil\nservice that could not easily be dismissed for insubordination without a\nbreathtakingly complex process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OdPgvriHag8/W1BUnStwmeI/AAAAAAABc5I/CMG_rRdP60ohrkc97nnOyIkoQY8FBCXYACLcBGAs/s1600/dowesnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"168\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"223\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OdPgvriHag8/W1BUnStwmeI/AAAAAAABc5I/CMG_rRdP60ohrkc97nnOyIkoQY8FBCXYACLcBGAs/s400/dowesnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This super civil\nservice, known as C-List appointees, was answerable to the president. But\nbecause there were thousands of them, they rarely met with the president and\ntook their marching orders via a chain of command.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That chain of command began\nwith the president and continued through the ranks of the Cabinet, C-List, and\nfinally, civil servants. If you have ever played the game \u201cTelephone,\u201d you know\nhow garbled messages can become.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition, C-List\nmembers, who could and would be fired if an opposing party won the election,\nwere constantly engaged in maneuvers to secure different jobs, promote\nreputations, and above all, avoid blame for failures and gain fame for\nsuccesses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was further\ncompounded by the rise of independent agencies like the Federal Reserve, the\nCIA, and countless other autonomous and semi-autonomous agencies created to\nprotect not only their permanent staff from political pressure but also the\nentire agency.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The desire to limit political pressure \u2013 also known as the power\nof the president \u2013 was intellectually defensible, but in practice created a\nsystem that could not be readily controlled or even understood.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among the\nindependent agencies, even decision-making was opaque. Between the entities\nreporting to the president, there was a layer of political appointees, which\ncreated turbulence between the president and the civil service.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the most part,\ngovernment civil service personnel are cautious people, like our own Lutyens\nbabus... . Their form of resistance is built around passive resistance. Demands\nfor change manifest not in an uprising, but in delay, complexity and confusion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\">The issue is not that there is a deep government, but that the deep government\nis no secret. It was created with the purpose of limiting presidential power,\nand in part, the will of the people-and for KOSHER BIG BROTHER to control from\nthe shadows.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In separating politics\nfrom administration, the creation of the civil service weakened the political\nsystem and strengthened the administrative one. That is what was quite openly\nintended.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a layer of\nemployees in the turbulent boundary who have ambitions far beyond their jobs.\nThis layer of employees, particularly those approaching retirement, also exists\nin the independent agencies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The former are bright young men and women who\nwreak havoc with ambition; the latter are men and women who have spent their\ncareers struggling to do their jobs against a political system they regard as\nincapable of understanding what they do. This is natural given that they also\nhave spent their careers making what they do mysterious and incomprehensible.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As they age, they become more conservative (in the sense of preserving what is)\nand see themselves as the guardians of ancient verities. They frequently face a\npresident who believes that the DEEP STATE experts are the problem, not the\nsolution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A serious issue arises\nwhen an elected president faces a revolt of those who putatively serve him.\nWhatever those people may think, they serve the president, who is elected\naccording to the Constitution.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The problem is that not serving at the will of\nthe president and failing to respect election results \u2013 including leaking\nunverified claims about the president to the media \u2013 is inappropriate. Most\npresidents have been cowed by this, but Donald Trump gives as much nonsense as\nhe gets.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DEEP STATE operative\nJEW Obama has an army of agitators \u2014 numbering more than 30,000 \u2014 who will\nfight his Republican successor at every turn of his historic presidency. And\nObama will command them from a bunker less than two miles from the White House.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He\u2019s working behind the\nscenes to set up what will effectively be a shadow government to not only\nprotect his threatened legacy, but to sabotage the incoming administration and\nits popular \u201cAmerica First\u201d agenda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It features a mansion,\nwhich he\u2019s fortifying with construction of a tall brick perimeter, and a nearby\ntaxpayer-funded office with his own chief of staff and press secretary.\nMichelle Obama will also open an office there, along with the Obama Foundation.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This \u2018shadow\ngovernment\u2019 operates without the consent of the governed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_82TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_81B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3443224040201638567\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_81M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 19, 2018 at 6:09 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_81MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SOMEBODY ASKED ME</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HOW DOES GOOGLE SINK AND RAISE POSTS WITH ALGORITHMS</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WELL GOOGLE FOR \" DEEP STATE SHADOW GOVERNMENT\"</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IDEALLY MY POST SHOULD COME ON PAGE ONE , ITEM ONE --AS I AM NO 1 ONE ON THE INTERNET.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BUT NOW YOU WILL SEE THAT IT COMES ONLY ON PAGE SEVEN -- AMONG 25.9 MILLION POSTS.</span></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOBODY GOES BEYOND THE FIRST 5 PAGES OF A SEARCH..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOW GOOGLE \"<b><span style=\"color: red;\">IDIOT</span></b>\" AND THEN GO TO IMAGES..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHOSE FACE DO YOU SEE?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IS THIS ACCIDENTAL ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OR&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IS IT DELIBERATE?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS IS HOW IT WAS DONE--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MraZgJWklzg</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">An algorithms is a set of rules for solving a problem in a finite number of steps.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Google ranking systems sort through the hundreds of billions of webpages in their Search index to give you useful and relevant results in a fraction of a second.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">These ranking systems are made up of a series of algorithms that analyze what it is you are looking for and what information to return to you.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Usually, the top spots are held by KOSHER businesses that do search engine optimization, or SEO, on their sites.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SEO is an acronym for \"search engine optimization\" or \"search engine optimizer.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Search engine optimization, or SEO, is the marketing practice of building web pages that get more visitor referrals from search engines.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Unthical SEOs manipulate search engine results in unfair ways..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">During Trump/ Hillary POTUS elections \u2013all google search results favored Rothschild\u2019s candidate Hillary .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE ASK YOU TO CHECK OUT HOW \u201cFIRST POST\u201d CHEATS .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u201c FIRST POST \u201c ARTICLES DELIBERATELY PUT FRESH DATES ( AUTOMATICALLY ) WHILE THE ARTICLE MAY BE FIVE YEARS OLD. YOU MAY THINK THAT YOU ARE READING AN TAAZA ARTICLE WRITTEN TODAY\u2014BUT ACTUALLY IT WILL BE FIVE YEARS OLD.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">KOSHER WIKIPEDIA always shows up as No 1 on page one \u2013 why?</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"color: blue; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 20, 2018 at 12:39 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_150MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://thehill.com/hilltv/rising/397427-buck-wild-is-president-trump-paranoid-or-is-the-deep-state-out-to-get-him<br />\n<br />\nDONALD TRUMP<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN UP<br />\n<br />\nAND LISTEN GOOD..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DEEP STATE IN USA IS REAL..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN DEEP STATE ATTACKS THE POTUS FROM THE SHADOWS -- THE BEST RESPONSE IS COUNTER ATTACK-- NOT LAME DEFENCE..<br />\n<br />\nWARN THE DEEP STATE OPERATIVES -- IF THEY GO OUT OF CONTROL, PEOPLE OF USA WILL INVOKE THE <b><span style=\"color: red;\">SECOND AMENDMENT</span></b>..<br />\n<br />\nGIVE OUT THIS WARNING IN A MASSIVE RALLY..<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br />IT IS NOW TIME TO HAVE \"TRUMP TV\"..</span><br />\n<br />\nREWARD WHISTLE BLOWERS..<br />\n<br />\nCURRENTLY THE LEADER OF DEEP STATE IN USA IS PAST PRESIDENT JEW OBAMA..<br />\n<br />\nMONEY IS BEING STOLEN..<br />\n<br />\nIt is ironic that the U.S. should be fighting monstrously expensive wars allegedly to bring democracy to some countries, when it itself can no longer claim to be called a democracy when trillions, have been spent on projects which both congress and the commander in chief no nothing about..<br />\n<br />\nTrillions of dollars that have gone missing from the federal reserve system DELIBERATELY.<br />\n<br />\nOn July 16, 2001, in front of the house appropriations committee, Secretary of Defense Donald Rumsfeld stated:-- The financial systems of the department of defence are so snarled up that we can\u2019t account for some $2.6 trillion in transactions that exist, if that\u2019s believable..<br />\n<br />\nThe United States has a history of government agencies existing in secret for years. The National Security Agency (NSA) was founded in 1952, its existence was hidden until the mid 1960\u2019s. Even more secretive is the National Reconnaissance Office, which was founded in 1960 but remained completely secret for 30 years.<br />\n<br />\nFBI DIRECTOR EDGAR HOOVER WAS ROTHSCHILDs MAN FRIDAY..<br />\n<br />\nthe US government alone has classified up to 500 million pages of documents every single year, for the purpose of protecting \u2018national security.\u2019 Our world is drenched in secrecy, and it\u2019s reached a point where we don\u2019t really know what\u2019s happening on our planet. Our main source of information is DEEP STATE corporate media, this is a big problem...<br />\n<br />\nA black budget is the governments budget that is allocated for classified and other secret operations of a nation. The black budget is an account expenses and spending related to military research and covert operations. The black budget is mostly classified due to security reasons.<br />\n<br />\nDONALD TRUMP-- WE KNOW YOU ARE FAMILIAR WITH THE \"BLACK BUDGET\" AS YOU YOURSELF ASKED FOR 81.1 BILLION USA.<br />\n<br />\nThe request includes $59.9 billion for the National Intelligence Program, this will cover non-military programs and activities. Also 21.2 billion for the Military Intelligence Program which covers Intelligence activities by the Department of Defense.<br />\n<br />\nThe black budget has been known to hide multiple types of projects from elected officials. With secret code names and hidden figures, the details of the black budget are revealed only to certain people of congress, if at all.<br />\n<br />\nWhen government organizations can implement operations in secrecy without public oversight, they are effectively circumventing a democracy.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">WHAT TYPE OF DEMOCRAY DOES USA HAVE WHEN THE FIRST US PRESIDENT GEORGE WASHINGTON WAS MURDERED AND HIS PLACE TAKEN OVER BY GERMAN JEW ADAM WEISHAUPT ?..</span></div>\n<br />\nA \u201cdeep state\u201d can exist in a democracy that lacks control over government economic, military and intelligence organizations. Such secrecy is destructive to a democracy that is supposed to be under an elected civilian political leadership.<br />\n<br />\nThe deep state in most countries is very much like the cartoon bureaucracy in Yes Minister. It wants to carry on doing what it likes to do, with as little political scrutiny as possible.<br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA THE LUTYENS DEEP STATE OPERATIVES ARE ALL SHITTING IN THEIR PANTS AND PANTIES --AS THE CASE MAY BE..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_152M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. It says: there shall be freedom of speech in parliament. Clause (2) further provides that no member of Parliament shall be liable to any proceedings in any court in respect of anything said or any vote given by him in parliament or any committee thereof.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">LYING DELIBERATELY INSIDE THE LOK SABHA , IS A SLUR ON \"WE THE PEOPLE\" WHO HAVE OUR RIGHTS --OF NOT BEING LIED TO AND MISLED.</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nMINSTER OF PARLIAMENTARY AFFAIRS<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">HEART WARMING VIDEO</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/the-indian-constitution-does-not-allow.html?showComment=1541402414156#c3218814970497086894\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 5, 2018 at 12:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_10MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMOST IMPORTANT COMMENT:<br />MOST IMPORTANT COMMENT:<br />MOST IMPORTANT COMMENT:<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/judiciary-in-contempt-of-we-people-capt.html<br /><br />THE ATHEIST COMMIE CM OF KERALA PINARAYI VIJAYAN IS HELL BENT OF BREAKING THE SPINE OF SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE..<br /><br />THE MOST IMPORTANT ASPECT IS \u201cNEY ABHISHEKHAM\u201d. ( GHEE SACRIFICE )..<br /><br />IT IS NOT THE MALE HUSBAND OR SON ALONE THAT BENEFITS FROM THE PILGRIMAGE ..<br /><br />THE WIFE FILLS UP A COCONUT WITH DESI GHEE ( USING THE MIDDLE EYE OF THE COCONUT ) IN FRONT OF THE AYYAPPA IDOL OR PICTURE OF HER HOME BESIDE A LIT LAMP..<br /><br />THIS GHEE FILLED COCONUT IS CARRIED INSIDE THE IRUMUDI KETTU ON THE HEAD OF THE MALE PILGRIM..<br /><br />HE WILL NOT ALLOW THE IRUMUDI KETU TO TOUCH THE GROUND TILL HE CLIMBS UP THE 18 STEPS\u2026<br /><br />THE KERALA POLICE IS DOING BLASPHEMY BY ORDERING THE PILGRIM TO OPEN THE IDRUMUDI KETTU , AS IF THERE IS A TIME BOMB INSIDE.<br /><br />THIS GHEE IS POURED ON THE AYYAPPA IDOL INSIDE THE SANNIDHANAM.. TIMING WINDOW IS FROM 0330 AM TO 7 AM AND THEN 0830 TO 1100 AM..<br /><br />THIS GHEE IS GIVEN BACK AS PRASADMA AND THE PILGRIM GOES BACK HOME WITH THIS GHEE FOR HIS WIFE ( OR MOTHER WHO FILLED THE COCONUT ) TO CONSUME ..<br /><br />THIS IS EQUIVALENT TO THE MENSTRAUTING WOMAN UNDERTAKING THE PILGRIMAGE HERSELF..<br /><br />AS THE MALE PILGRIMS WALKS TOWARDS SABARIMALA UNDER A GURUSAMI , THEY CHANT JOYOUSLY \u201c NEY ABHISHEKAM SWAMIKKE \u201c ..<br /><br />NEY ABHISHKAM HAS PUJA TIMINGS AT DAWN ..<br /><br />IF THE PILGRIMS IS FORCED BACK BY THE KERALA POLICE ON COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYANs ORDERS , HE CANNOT DO THE NEY ABHISHEKAM.. THE SPINE OF THIS SOLEMN ENDEAVOUR IS BROKEN..<br /><br /><br />For those pilgrims who have not observed the purity ( say he masturbated ) during his trek to Sabarimala , he will not take back the ghee he brought inside the coconut, there is a container called Neythoni (Ghee Canoe) into which they pour out the ghee. He goes back home empty handed sans prasadham..<br /><br />The wife understands as the ghee would hurt her..<br /><br />This pilgrimage is then not considered to be ACCOMPLISHED.<br /><br />If later he has to become a guruswamy, he has to count how many ties he took the ghee prasadam back home to the woman who filled it..<br /><br />It has to be 18 times..<br /><br />There is no fooling anybody here , including yourself..<br /><br />THIS RITUAL HAS GONE ON FOR 5900 YEARS..<br /><br />NOW WE HAVE AN ATHEIST COMMIE CM NAMED PINARAYI VIJAYAN WHO HAS UNLEASHED A STALIN TYPE REIGN OF TERRROR ..<br /><br />HE HAS SELF DESTRUCTED..<br /><br />HE IS BEYOND CARE !<br /><br />COMMUNIST PARTY IS DEAD \u2013THE LAST BASTION OF KERALA HAS CRUMBLED, DUE TO ONE MANs GOONDAGIRI..<br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_10BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_10b+seeddZjD\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_9T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_9TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_9B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8465346094448244559\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_9M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4090395601340703505\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_33M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_20.html?showComment=1540099373825#c4090395601340703505\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">October 21, 2018 at 10:52 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_33MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9C9O9Nhex0k</span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">TAMILIAN BRAHMIN SUBRAMANIN SWAMY HAS DONE A VOLTE FACE AFTER READING MY BLOGS ON FEMALE PREGNANCY..</span></div>\n<br />\n###############<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil October 19, 2018 at 3:01 PM</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_33B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_33MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nTAMILIAN BRAHMIN SUBRAMANIAN SWAMY DOES NOT KNOW THE BASICS OF SANATANA DHARMA.. HE SHOULD STICK TO TAMIL PRIDE AGAMA SHIT.<br />\n<br />\nI DARE ANY WOMAN WHOSE KNOWN PERIODS ARE ONE WEEK AWAY.. CLIMB SABARIMALA AND YOUR MENSTRUAL BLOOD WILL FLOW OUT BETWEEN YOUR LEGS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WOMAN WHO CONCEIVES AFTER THIS FAILED MENSTRUAL CYCLE GETS STILL BORN BABIES ..<br />\n<br />\nThe endometrium is the tissue lining the uterus (or womb). The endometrium is soft and spongy. Each month, the endometrium changes as part of the menstrual cycle.<br />\n<br />\nEarly in the cycle, the ovaries secrete a hormone called estrogen that causes the endometrium to thicken. In the middle of the cycle, the ovaries start secreting another hormone called progesterone. Progesterone prepares the innermost layer of the endometrium to support an embryo should conception (pregnancy) occur.<br />\n<br />\nIf conception does not occur, the hormone levels decrease dramatically. The innermost layer of the endometrium is then shed as menstrual fluid. This leads to the cyclical nature of the menstrual cycle.<br />\n<br />\nBecause the endometrium builds up between menstrual cycles and then sheds during menstruation, the endometrium is thickest just before menstruation<br />\n<br />\nOne of the functions of progesterone is to oppose estrogen, which causes the uterus to shed the endometrium during menstruation before a new cycle of proliferation, or building up, begins in preparation for the next menstruation.</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_33B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 17.6px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_33MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">POSITIVE SCALAR ENERGY CAUSES THE ENDOMETRIUM SLOUGHING OFF TO BE INCOMPLETE..</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nEndometriosis occurs when the uterine tissue implants and grows outside of the uterus \u2014 often affecting the function of the ovaries, uterus and fallopian tubes.<br /><br />If the endometrium travels outside the fallopian tube and to the other areas of the body, it results in endometriosis. The hormones produced during the menstrual cycle will stimulate this extra tissue to grow, break down and bleed in the uterus.<br /><br /><div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">The shredded tissue and blood have nowhere to exit the body and can develop into cysts, adhesions and scar tissues over time rendering a woman&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">PERMANENTLY INFERTILE</span></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">.</span></div>\n<br />Retrograde menstrual flow, where some of the menstrual tissue flows back into the abdomen and gets implanted there. In endometriosis, the abnormal cells or scar tissues block the ovaries and fallopian tube.<br /><br />An egg usually travels from the ovary, along the fallopian tube, and into the uterus for fertilization before implantation. If you have endometriosis in the fallopian tube, the tissue will block the egg from passing into the uterus.<br /><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">There is no cure for endometriosis.</span></li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_33B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 17.6px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_33MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nALL THIS WAS FIGURED OUT CHARAKA SAMHITA PENNED 6200 YEARS AGO.<br />\n<br />\nIN TEMPLES WHERE THERE IS WATER EVERYWHERE IT BECOME MOST UNHYGENIC..</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_33B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 17.6px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_33MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; REASON , OUR BODY IS LIKE A RIVER- BODY CELLS RENEW BUT NEED TO BE REPROGRAMMED TO GET RID OF PHOBIAS AND TRAUMAS.. SABARIMALA VRAT OFFERS DOUBLE THE TIME ..<br />\n<br />\nVRAT IS EVERYTHING.. REST ALL MALAYALAM TV STATIONS ARE DISHING OUT WHAT THE DEEP STATE WANTS TO FEED US..<br />\n<br />\nHINDU DEVOTEES MUST NOT PUT ANY MONEY INTO TEMPLE HUNDIS ( BHANDARAM ) WHICH ARE OPENED AND COLLECTED BY THE DEVASWOM BOARD..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SWEAT AND BLOOD OF POOR HINDUS IS DIVERTED BY THE COMMIE GOVT, EVEN TO SUBSIDIZE HAJ PILGRIMAGE AND FOR VOTE GRABBING SCHEMES.<br />\n<br />\nOUR TEMPLES ARE ALL IN RUIN DESPITE HUGE MONEY COLLECTED BY THE DEVASWOM BOARD. TEMPLE LANDS HAVE BEEN GRABBED.<br />\n<br />\nKERALA DEWASWOM BOARD OFFICIALS ARE ATHEISTS WHO HAVE NO FAITH IN SANTANA DHARMA..<br />\n<br />\nThe four Kerala devaswoms (Guruvayur, Travancore, Malabar and Cochin) together manage nearly 3000 temples.. Sabarimala comes under Travancore.<br />\n<br />\nTHE ATTEMPT TO DECLARE TEMPLES AS PUBLIC SPACES IS TO GRAB THE ENORMOUS GOLD INSIDE SRI PADANABHASWAMY TEMPLES FOR THE VAULTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nWE CONGRATULATE COMME CM PINRAYI VIJAYAN.. IS REQUIRES REAL TALENT TO KILL A PARTY WHICH WAS RIDING A POPULARITY WAVE AFTER THE RECENT FLOODS.<br />\n<br />\nVINAASHA KAALE VIPAREETA BUDDHI.. LIFE WONT BE EASY FOR THIS COMMIE FELLOW AFTER HE IS KICKED OUT OF POWER.. PEOPLE HAVE LONG MEMORIES.. PINARAYI VIJYAN REFUSED TO FEEL THE PULSE OF THE PEOPLE ..<br />\n<br />\nKERALA WOMEN HAVE NEVER EVER COMPLAINED ABOUT NOT BEING ALLOWED TO JOIN SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE BETWEEN THE AGES TEN AND FIFTY..<br />\n<br />\nSUPREME COURT HAS IGNORED THE \"AGGRIEVED PERSON\" PROVISION AS PER OUR CONSTITUTION .. A MUSLIM NON-BELEIVER NAMED NAUSHAD AHMAD KHAN ( A CRYPTO JEW ) FILED THE CASE AGAINST MENSTRUATING WOMEN ENTRY IN SABARIMALA JUST TO THROW A MONKEY WRENCH INTO THE WORKS OF A RIVAL RELIGION HINDUISM..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS 10 TO 50 RULES FORM WOMEN IS ONLY FOR THE SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE BECAUSE OF THE 41 DAY VRAT..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE HUNDREDS OF AYYAPPA TEMPLES WHERE MENSTRUATING WOMEN ARE ALLOWED.<br />\n<br />\nMALAYALI WOMEN WILL TEACH THE DEEP STATE TRAITORS A SEVERE LESSON.. SOME KERALA NUNS HAVE SENT A BISHOP TO JAIL FOR THE FIRST TIME ON THIS PLANET..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE REAL MEANING OF WOMENs EMPOWERMENT...<br />\n<br />\nTHE WOMENs POLICE STATION IN CALICUT WAS THE FIRST ON THE PLANET.. THIS IS MALAYALI WOMENs POWER..<br />\n<br />\nMORE THAN 81% OF THE PEOPLE OF INDIA AND WOKEN UP IN THE MORNING BY BLARING AZAN CALLS BY LOUDSPEAKER FITTED ON MOSQUES AT AN UNEARTHY HOUR OF 0430 IST DEPRIVING CHILDREN OF REM SLEEP .. These pills contain Norethisterone, which is a man-made version of progesterone, a female sex hormone\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Norethisterone causes SEVERE hormone imbalances \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There are no cheaters in Sabarimala vrat . Nobody monitors, as it is about your own mind cleansing\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For 41 days the pilgrims abstain from sex, alcohol, cigarettes, non-vegetarian food, foul language and lack of discipline\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They have to bathe twice a day and visit the local temple to offer prayers. They sleep for 41 days on the floor without pillows. Sabarimala pilgrimage is a great leveller\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On the first day the pilgrim will be initiated by a Guru Swami, who has undertaken 18 successive years of Sabarimala pilgrimage. He has to present himself after a bath, clean shaven with nails trimmed. A sanctified Mala or garland of Rudrakha beads is put on the neck, while chanting the mantra, \"Swamiye Sharanamayyappa\" \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A SABARIMALA 41 DAY VRAT IS A CONSCIOUS SELF EFFORT THAT YOU ARE UNWILING TO SURRENDER TO DESTINY.. THAT YOU PLAN TO FORGE THE HINGES OF YOUR DESTINY ON YOUR OWN TERMS. KARMA CATCHES UP..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Swadhaya ( contemplation ) happens during the 41 day vrat-- you delve into yourself with an open mind and heart.. you\u2019ll move beyond the boundaries of thought and emotion and tap into the pure consciousness that lies deep within\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">You make a sincere attempt to know the reasons for your happiness and sorrow, anger, greed and attachment\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Witnessing yourself and studying one\u2019s own personality is swadhyaya. Introspection and self analysis is is translated into action after the pilgrimage . Always use PAIN and adversity to introspect. These are god given opportunities to drive real change\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This is the magic of Sanatana Dharma.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">If we know we are beyond the body and mind, we can sit in our pain ( caused by vrat ) without pushing it away-this was the meaning of TAPASYA done by our ancient yogis. A yogi will not cheat himself during self analysis. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">He can fail himself. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Self reflection for a yogi is a humbling process. Swadhyaya inspires and elevates the mind to high spiritual altitude. .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Swadhaya during vrat cuts new spiritual grooves for the mind to move on. It harnesses the mind run in these new grooves to have your bruised soul healed. The conscious mind can dip into the subconscious where beliefs are embedded , in order to eliminate it. .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A sincere Sabarimala pilgrim can meditate, to rewrite these negative programmes that cause you misery\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Men go for Sabarmiala after a emotional breakup..&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">If we are willing to look at behaviors, motivations, and strategies we habitually use to maintain our own FAALTHU keeping up with the Joneses self-image, we can use svadhyaya to pierce through the veil that this self-image creates and into the nature of our own essential being\u2026</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1538808011214#c6813164908246031172\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 6, 2018 at 12:10 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_140MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCM OF KERALA AND DGP OF KERALA LISTEN UP..<br />\n<br />\nTHE LANGUAGE MALAYALAM BINDS THE PEOPLE OF KERALA , UNLIKE THE REST OF INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nYOU WILL FIND ALL IN KERALA SUPPORTS THE SABARIMALA PROTESTS , ALL POLITICAL PARTIES, COMMIE CADRE ( 61% OF MALAYALI PILGRIMS ARE COMMIES ) , CHRISTIANS , MUSLIMS , ALL HINDUS ..<br />\n<br />\nEVEN THE KERALA COMMIE GOVT MINISTERS SECRETLY SUPPORT THIS MOVEMENT FROM WITHIN THEIR HEARTS.. THEY ONLY PRETEND TO BE ATHEISTS..<br />\n<br />\nAYYAPPA IS THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD WHO RULED INDIA DELETED AYYAPPA AND INSERTED A MORTAL NAMED BUDDHA WHO DID NOT BELEIVE IN SOUL AND ATE PIG.. ROTHSCHILD USURPED AYYAPPA IN THE FORM OF IMHOTEP AS THE PATRON DIETY OF ALL JEWISH FREEMASONS..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE NOT ONE SINGLE BUDDHIST IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nAYYAPPA EXISTED IN 3900 BC..<br />\n<br />\nAYYAPPA DISAPPEARED FROM KERALA AT A YOUNG AGE TO KEEP HIS STEP MOTHER HAPPY, AND SURFACED IN EGYPT AT IMHOTEP WHO WAS CONSIDERED AS GOD AND MORE POWERFUL THAN THE PHAROAH..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSABARIMALA IS ALL ABOUT TWO HEROES BHISHMA AND AYYAPPA.. BOTH SWORE TO BE BACHELORS SO AS NOT TO DEPRIVE THEIR BELOVED FATHERS OFF THE THRONE..<br />\nTHE THREE FLASHES ON MAKARA VILAKKU DAY IS THE EXACT MINUTE BHISHMAs SOUL LEFT HIS MORTAL COIL WHILE LAYING ON THE BED OF ARROWS ON KURUKSHETRA FIELD..<br />\n<br />\nTHE FLAME USED IS A CONTINUOUS FIRE , THE YAGNA FIRE INTO WHICH PRINCESS AMBA JUMPED WHILE PARASHURAMA AND BHISMA WERE FIGHTING AND DECLARED THE LONG FIGHT AS A DRAW.\u2026 PARASHURAMA HAD WANTED RELUCTANT BHISHMA TO MARRY AMBA..<br />\n<br />\nUDIPI MUTT, KANCHI MUTT AND TIRUPATI TEMPLE WERE AYYAPPA TEMPLES WHEN THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA\u2026 THIS IS WHY YOU HAVE TAMILS/ TELUGUS AND KANNADIGAS THRONGING INTO SABARIMALA..<br />\n<br />\nSABARIMALA IS THIS PLANETs NO 1 PILGRIMAGE TWICE THE SIZE OF MAHA KUMBH MELA..<br />\n<br />\nCM PINARAYI VIJAYAN IS KILLING HIS OWN COMMUNIST PARTY.. THERE WILL BE NO RECOVERY.. COMMUNIST PART IS NOW OFFICIALLY DEAD AND THANKS TO A RASH DECISION BY PINARAYI VIJAYAN..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BENGALI AND TELUGU COMMIE TOP LEADERSHIP ARE JEALOUS AND NOT HAPPY WITH KERALA COMMIES WEILDING POWER AND GETTING POPULAR WITH PEOPLE, AFTER THE EXCELLENT RESPONSE DURING KERALA FLOODS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE MAGIC OF SABARIMALA THIS PLANETs LARGEST PILGRIMAGE LIES IN THE 41 DAY VRAT... TO BREAK A DEEP ROOTED VICE OR TRAUMA OR PHOBIA IT TAKES 21 DAYS ...<br />\n<br />\nTHE HUMAN BODY IS LIKE A RIVER .. BODY CELLS KEEP RENEWING..<br />\n<br />\nSABARIMALA OFFERS DOUBLE THIS TIME..<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE STEEPED IN NEGATIVITY , WHO INFLICTED UNTOLD MISERY , BEATEN THEIR WIVES AND CHILDREN AND CAUSED EXTREME UNHAPPINESS IN THEIR HOMES , HAVE GONE FOR SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE AND COME BACK LIKE NEW BORN BABIES WITH LIGHTER KARMIC BAGGAGE..<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK THE LEGISLATURE TO CREATE AN IMMEDIATE LAW WHICH RESTRICTS THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE WHICH CAN BE AFFECTED BY A PIL RULING BY JUDGES \u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE EXPECT OUR LEGISLATURE TO DELIVER SUBJECTIVE DHARMA\u2026 NOT OBJECTIVE \u201c BLIND JUSTICE \u201c OF COURTS WHICH TRAMPLES ON OUR PRICELESS CULTURE \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE INDIAN CONSTITUTION HAS NOT GIVEN POWERS TO THE JUDICIARY TO STRIKE DOWN LAWS, CREATE NEW LAWS OR TAKE UP PUBLIC INTEREST LITIGATION ( PIL ) WHICH AFFECTS THE FORTUNES OF THE ENTIRE POPULATION OF INDIA\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nTHE SUPREME COURT HAS IGNORED THE \"AGGRIEVED PERSON\" PROVISION AS PER OUR CONSTITUTION .. A MUSLIM NON-BELEIVER NAMED NAUSHAD AHMAD KHAN ( CRYPTO JEW ) FILED THE CASE AGAINST MENSTRUATING WOMEN ENTRY IN SABARIMALA JUST TO THROW A MONKEY WRENCH INTO THE WORKS OF A RIVAL RELIGION HINDUISM..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/menstruating-women-and-sabarimala.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_140BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; , serif;\">THE MAGIC OF SABARIMALA THIS PLANETs LARGEST PILGRIMAGE LIES IN THE 41 DAY VRAT...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A VRAT IS A MILLION TIMES STRONGER THAN A NEW YEAR RESOLUTION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Vrat works only because it has a spiritual tinge . It is all about steadfastness in purpose.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A pilgrim under vrat , wears black , goes barefooted , grows a beard, goes to temple twice a day after bath in cold water, harnesses ego , curbs sex urge , sleeps without pillows on hard floor, and abstains from all worldly pleasures.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The pilgrims behavior outside and behind closed doors is the same ( karma ) and hence it sends a message to an onlooker about how resolute he is in achieving his goal, that he is firm as a rock and unwilling to surrender to destiny.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">That he plans to forge the hinges of your destiny on his own terms. There are no vrat cheaters. Nobody monitors, as it is about your own internal cleansing.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Non-violence, love, truth , unselfishness, sacrifice, grace, honesty form the warp and weft of this vrat fabric. Optimism , courage , perseverance , contemplation and fortitude form the fibre.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">TO BREAK A DEEP ROOTED VICE OR TRAUMA OR PHOBIA IT TAKES 21 DAYS ... THE HUMAN BODY IS LIKE A RIVER .. BODY CELLS KEEP RENEWING..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SABARIMALA OFFERS DOUBLE THIS TIME..&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PEOPLE STEEPED IN NEGATIVITY , WHO INFLICTED UNTOLD MISERY , BEATEN THEIR WIVES AND CHILDREN AND CAUSED EXTREME UNHAPPINESS IN THEIR HOMES , HAVE GONE FOR SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE AND COME BACK LIKE NEW BORN BABIES WITH LIGHTER KARMIC BAGGAGE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Humans contain about 12 trillion (13 zeros ) cells...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Our body is like a river, it may look the same but water gets changed all the time. 98.1 % of our body renews itself every 8 years.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Our skin renews itself every 28 days, our blood plasma every ten days, white blood cells renew three weeks, stomach lining turns over every 4 days, the villi which absorbs nutrients in the small intestine renews every 3 days, the inner lining of the cheeks in a few hours, taste buds on tongue in weeks etc . In six weeks, each cell of the liver would have died, to be replaced by new cells. Our eye cells regenerate every two days, our skin cells regenerate about every 23 days, and our stomach lining regenerates about every four days.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Cells die by millions every minute. The life spark in each cell immediately reincarnates and does so over and over again as long as the human system lasts.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The intelligence of all the cells makes up the sum total of the intelligence of the human system...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">What we commonly refer to as \"The Cellular Memory\" is the collective energy field generated by these individual cell memories.The Cellular Memory is the database on the storage disk. The files within the database are the cell memories.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Every cell in our body has the ability to remember. Our cellular memory can store the memory of physical trauma like accidents, wounds, surgeries, abuse,trauma , fear etc that manifests in low self-esteem, stress etc. When trauma is suppressed into the cellular memory, that energy can get stuck.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The problem with suppressed cellular memory is not only does it limit our ability to live freely and joyfully in life but it can also catalyse the body in developing physical illness and negativity .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The cellular memory is the complete blueprint for your existence.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Therefore, if we can somehow interrupt the negative programming, and reprogramme the cell towards positivity, healing can take place.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WOMEN CANNOT HAVE A 41 DAY VRAT AS THEY MENSES COME IN BETWEEN .. CELL PHANTOM MEMORIES REMAIN.&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">VRAT IS EVERYTHING.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/menstruating-women-and-sabarimala.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/the-dirty-secret-of-christian.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">...</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_123BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; SHE HAS NOT DONE IT IN 36 YEARS OF MARRIAGE ..<br />\n<br />\nIF SHE DOES NOT HAVE A CHILD, HER FUTURE CHILDREN WILL NOT BE CHAMPIONS..<br />\n<br />\nIF SHE HAS CHILDREN, THEN THE NEXT GENERATION OF CHILDREN ( CHILD'S CHILD ) WILL NOT BE CHAMPIONS--THEY WILL BE BELOW MEDIOCRE HUMANS..<br />\n<br />\nNO HINDU WOMAN GOES TO TEMPLES DURING HER PERIODS ..SHE DOES THIS ON HER OWN ACCORD..<br />\n<br />\nNO HINDU WOMAN GETS MARRIED AND DOES THE PHERA AROUND THE SACRED FIRE WHEN SHE HAS HER PERIODS..<br />\n<br />\nIT IS NOT ABOUT SEX ON THE WEDDING NIGHT ..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">COMMIE CM OF KERALA PINARAYI VIJAYAN OR DGP OF KERALA , DOES NOT HAVE THE POWERS TO ARM TWIST WOMENs POLICE ( OF LESS THAN 50 YEARS OF AGE ) TO ENTER SABARIMALA SANCTUM..</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\nWARNING-- WE THE PEOPLE WILL WATCH ...<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">NO JUDGE OR RULER OR POLICE CHIEF HAS THE RIGHT TO FORCE AN INDIAN MUSLIM TO EAT PORK--&nbsp; GIVING THE EXAMPLE OF OTHER NATIONS.. THE ERRING JUDGE OR ELECTED RULER WHO TRAMPLES ON CULTURE CAN BE IMPRISONED ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE THE PEOPLE ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION.. KERALA HISTORY IS TIED TO AYYAPPA ..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY WITH SLIMY CONNIVANCE OF RSS/ BJP TRIED TO KILL THRISSUR POORAM FESTIVAL-- THE CATHOLIC BISHOP OF THRISSUR SAVED THE MILLINIUMS OLD FESTIVAL.. WE HINDUS WILL NEVER FORGET THIS ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/04/thrissur-pooram-festival-mother-of-all.html</span><br />\n<br />\nRSS / BJP HAVE JUMPED INTO THE SABARIMALA FRAY ONLY BECAUSE CHRISTIAN LED CONGRESS SUPPORTED SABARIMALA..<br />\n<br />\nHAS ONE SINGLE RSS CHIEF MARRIED SINCE THE RSS WAS FOUNDED?<br />\n<br />\nWHAT HAS OPPORTUNISTIC RSS / BJP DONE FOR HINDUS SINCE INDEPENDENCE OTHER THAT TRYING TO CONVERT HINDUS INTO HOMOSEXUALS ?.. WHITE JEW SPONSORED RSS/ BJP EXISTS TO FIGHT WITH MUSLIMS..<br />\n<br />\nWE HINDUS ARE NOT EVEN SURE IF GUJJU NO 2 MODI AND AMIT SHAH ARE HINDUS..<br />\n<br />\nGUJJU NO 1 GANDHI WAS A KATHIWARI JEW-JAIN ( THE SAME CLAN AS ALL FILTHY RICH ANTWERP DIAMOND TRADERS , ROTHSCHILD MIDDLEMEN )<br />\n<br />\nTHE SUPREME COURT HAS IGNORED THE \"AGGRIEVED PERSON\" PROVISION AS PER OUR CONSTITUTION .. A MUSLIM NON-BELEIVER NAMED&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">NAUSHAD AHMAD KHAN</span></b>(&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>CRYPTO JEW LAWYER</b></span>&nbsp;) FILED THE CASE AGAINST MENSTRUATING WOMEN ENTRY IN SABARIMALA JUST TO THROW A MONKEY WRENCH INTO THE WORKS OF HINDUISM..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS CULTURAL TERRORISM TO KILL THIS PLANETs NO 1 PILGRIMAGE ..<br />\n<br />\nMORE THAN 81% OF THE PEOPLE OF INDIA AND WOKEN UP IN THE MORNING BY BLARING AZAN CALLS BY LOUDSPEAKER FITTED ON MOSQUES AT AN UNEARTHY HOUR OF 0430 IST KILLING REM SLEEP.. WHY IS THIS ALLOWED ?<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE WHO ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION DECLARE THAT THE RULINGS OF THE SUPREME COURT ON ADULTERY , HOMOSEXUALITY AND SABARIMALA IS \"NULL AND VOID\".. THESE ARE MATTERS LEFT TO ACCOUNTABLE AND ELECTED LAWMAKERS ..NOT COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY WHICH IS NOT ALLOWED AS PER OUR CONSTITUTION\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNCW MUST KNOW THIS-- REAL WOMENs EMPOWERMENT IS HAPPENING IN KERALA WHERE HINDU WOMEN SAY THAT WE ARE HAPPY TO WAIT TILL MENOPAUSE AND THEY DONT CARE FOR THIS ILLEGAL ULTERIOR MOTIVED JUDGEMENT BY AN UNCONSTITUTIONAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY..<br />\n<br />\nTHEY HAVE THE SUPPORT OF MUSLIM AND CHRISTIAN WOMEN--JUST AN EXAMPLE OF HOW MALAYALAM LANGUAGE BINDS THE PEOPLE..<br />\n<br />\nIF ROHINGYAS AND BANGLADESIS ENTER KERALA ILLEGALLY -- class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1538629487966#c3033119468567849958\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 4, 2018 at 10:34 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_143MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHE PRESIDENT OF INDIA, SUPREME COURT, CJI AND PM MUST NOTE THE FOLLOWING..AND MAKE AMENDS...<br />\n<br />\n1) RIGHT TO DARSHAN IN A HINDU TEMPLE IS NOT THE SAME AS RIGHT TO WORSHIP.. DARSHAN IS A PRIVATE AFFAIR.. RIGHT TO WORSHIP AS PER THE CONSTITUTION IS A PUBLIC THINGY..YOU CANT BARGE INTO A TEMPLE WHEN SANCTUM NADA DOORS ARE SHUT AND TELL THE PRIEST TO OPEN THE DOORS QUOTING YOUR FUNDAMENTAL RIGHT..<br />\n<br />\n2) MORE THAN 81% OF THE PEOPLE OF INDIA AND WOKEN UP IN THE MORNING BY BLARING AZAN CALLS BY LOUDSPEAKER FITTED ON MOSQUES AT AN UNEARTHY HOUR OF 0430 IST.. WHY IS THIS ALLOWED ?<br />\n<br />\n3) THE SUPREME COURT HAS IGNORED THE \"AGGRIEVED PERSON\" PROVISION AS PER OUR CONSTITUTION .. A MUSLIM NON-BELEIVER NAMED NAUSHAD AHMAD KHAN FILED THE CASE AGAINST MENSTRUATING WOMEN ENTRY IN SABARIMALA JUST TO THROW A MONKEY WRENCH INTO THE WORKS OF A RIVAL RELIGION HINDUISM..<br />\n<br />\n4) WHY IS SHANI SHIGNAPUR TEMPLE BEING USED AS A LITMUS PAPER AGAINST SABARIMALA.. THIS IS LIKE COMPARING AN ELEPHANT TO AN ANT.. SABARIMALA IS THIS PLANETs NO 1 PILGRIMAGE , ATTRACTING TWICE THE NUMBER OF PILGRIMS OF MAHA KUMBH MELA<br />\n<br />\n5) WHY ARE WHITE COMMIE JEWS AND THE WHITE CHRISTIAN JEALOUS OF SABARIMALA ? JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO RULED INDIA REMOVED AYYAPPA AS THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU AND INSERTED MORTAL BUDDHA WHO DID NOT BELIEVE IN THE SOUL, AND STRUGGLED FOR SALVATION.. KANCHI MUTT, UDIPI MUTT, TIRUPATI TEMPLE WERE ALL APPAYYA TEMPLES BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAE TO INDIA.. THIS IS WHY WE FIND TAMILS, TELUGUS AND KANNADIGAS COMING TO SABARIMALA .. FESTIVALS ARE NEVER FORGOTTEN..<br />\n<br />\n6) TAKING DECISIONS WHICH AFFECT THE FORTUNES OF THE ENTIRE NATION IS THE SOLE PREROGATIVE OF THE ELECTED LAW MAKERS..WHO ARE ACCOUNTABLE TO THE PEOPLE AND THE WATAN\u2026. THIS IS THE MEANING OF DEMOCRACY..<br />\n<br />\n7) THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION HAS NOT GIVEN POWERS TO THE JUDICIARY TO STRIKE DOWN LAWS, CREATE NEW LAWS OR TAKE UP PUBLIC INTEREST LITIGATION ( PIL ) WHICH AFFECTS THE FORTUNES OF THE ENTIRE POPULATION OF INDIA\u2026.<br />\n<br />\n8) WE EXPECT OUR LEGISLATURE TO DELIVER SUBJECTIVE DHARMA\u2026 NOT OBJECTIVE \u201c BLIND JUSTICE \u201c OF COURTS WHICH TRAMPLES ON OUR PRICELESS CULTURE \u2026<br />\n<br />\n9) WE ASK THE LEGISLATURE TO CREATE AN IMMEDIATE LAW WHICH RESTRICTS THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE WHICH CAN BE AFFECTED BY A PIL RULING BY JUDGES \u2026<br />\n<br />\n10) WOMEN CANNOT UTTER GAYATRI MANTRA WHEN THEY HAVE MENSES. MY WIFE HAS NOT ENTERED THE PUJA ROOM INSIDE MY HOME IN 36 YEARS OF MARRIAGE DURING HER PERIODS.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/menstruating-women-and-sabarimala.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE WHO ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION DECLARE THAT THE RULINGS OF THE SUPREME COURT ON ADULTERY , HOMOSEXUALITY AND SABARIMALA IS \"NULL AND VOID\".. THESE ARE MATTERS LEFT TO ACCOUNTABLE AND ELECTED LAWMAKERS ..NOT COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY WHICH IS NOT ALLOWED AS PER OUR CONSTITUTION..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE CRITICAL COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\n<br />\nCJI GOGOI<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT LAWYERS<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nCM OF KERALA<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nRAHUL EASHWAR<br />\nALL MLAs OF KERALA<br />\nALL MINISTERS OF KERALA<br />\nDGP OF KERALA<br />\nIG OF KERALA<br />\nALL COLLECTORS OF KERLALA<br />\nKERALA MEDIA<br />\nSONIA GANDHI<br />\nRAHUL GANDHI<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nALL CONGRESS SPOKESMEN<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES<br />\nALL MINISTERS MINISTERIES CENTRAL AND STATE<br />\nNCW MAIN<br />\nNCW STATES<br />\nNHRC<br />\nNCM<br />\nRSS<br />\nMOHAN BHAGWAT<br />\nADVANI<br />\nMURLI MANOHAR JOSHI<br />\nBAJRANG DAL<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nALL MEDIA OF INDIA<br />\nE SREEDHARAN<br />\nSOLI BABY<br />\nFALI BABY<br />\nSALVE BABY<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nALL 3 ARMED FORCE CHIEFS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA<br />\n<br />\nALL MUST CO-OPERATE<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_9BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_28.html?showComment=1538222792037#c2209668059005708675\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 29, 2018 at 5:36 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_8MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHE INDIAN CONSTITUTION HAS NOT GIVEN POWERS TO THE JUDICIARY TO STRIKE DOWN LAWS, CREATE NEW LAWS OR TAKE UP PUBLIC INTEREST LITIGATION ( PIL ) WHICH AFFECTS THE FORTUNES OF THE ENTIRE POPULATION OF INDIA\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nJUDICIARY TAKING ARBITRARY DECISIONS BY PIL ROUTE FOR THE ENTIRE POPULATION OF THE NATION, IS NOT ALLOWED BY THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION OR\u2014OR BY ANY STATUTE OR ACT.. ..<br />\n<br />\nTAKING DECISIONS WHICH AFFECT THE FORTUNES OF THE ENTIRE NATION IS THE SOLE PREROGATIVE OF THE ELECTED LAW MAKERS..WHO ARE ACCOUNTABLE TO THE PEOPLE AND THE WATAN\u2026. THIS IS THE MEANING OF DEMOCRACY..<br />\n<br />\nREMEMBER \u201cWE THE PEOPLE \u201c ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION\u2014OUR REPRESENTATIVES IN A DEMOCRACY ARE THE ONES WE ELECT\u2026 NOT COUPLE OF JUDGES IMPOSED ON US BY AN ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM SYSTEM\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWE EXPECT OUR LEGISLATURE TO DELIVER SUBJECTIVE DHARMA\u2026NOT OBJECTIVE \u201c BLIND JUSTICE \u201c WHICH TRAMPLES ON OUR PRICELESS CULTURE \u2026<br />\n<br />\nOUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT ALLOW A COLLEGIUM SYSTEM....INDIA IS THE ONLY NATION WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES.. AS A RESULT DESH DROHI FOREIGN FORCES HAVE HIJACKED OUR DEMOCRACY BY FILING PIL USING THEIR NGOs AND BRIBES TRAITORS..<br />\n<br />\nCOLLEGIUM judges rush to say -- Legislative and executive lethargy has actually forced us to step in and fill up the void . ..<br />\n<br />\nHey, MELORDS what about your own backlog of cases ? .. You have more than 3.41 crores cases pending.. Thousands of undertrails are awaiting justice for petty crimes which they have not committed...<br />\n<br />\nWhile 2.97 crore cases are pending in the subordinate courts, the backlog clogging the High Courts and Supreme Court (SC) is 43.5 lakh and 59,200 cases, respectively\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe Delhi High Court has so many cases pending, it would take a MIND BOGGLING 472 years for it to clear its backlog\u2026</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">JUDGES CAN ONLY JUDGE FOR A SPECIFIC CASE FOR AN AGGRIEVED INDIVIDUAL OR SMALL GROUP OF LIMITED NUMBERS&nbsp; \u2026 FOR AN AGGRIEVED NATION OF 1300 MILLION PEOPLE WE HAVE AN ELECTED DEMOCRATIC SYSTEM..</span></div>\n<br />\nThe first reported case of PIL in 1979 focused on the inhuman conditions of prisons and under trial prisoners ( Hussainara Khatoon v. State of Bihar)\u2026 this is OK\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE WHO ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION WILL NOT ALLOW UNACCOUNTABLE JUDGES TO CREATE PATHETIC RULINGS WHICH WILL BE USED AS A LIFE LONG GOSPEL FOR THE ENTIRE POPULATION OF THE WATAN ( ADULTERY ETC ) \u2014 WITHOUT UNDERSTANDING THE CONTEXT..<br />\n<br />\nJUDGES DID NOT FIND ANYTHING WRONG WHEN 5.1 LAKHS KASHMIRI PANDITS WERE ETHNICALLY CLEANSED AND SUBJECTED TO GENOCIDE\u2026 THOUSANDS OF HINDU TEMPLES WERE RAZED DOWN IN KASHMIR. ..<br />\n<br />\nWE DON\u2019T WANT JUDGES TO SAVE INDIA..<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">WE ASK THE LEGISLATURE TO CREATE AN IMMEDIATE LAW WHICH RESTRICTS THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE WHICH CAN BE AFFECTED BY A PIL RULING BY JUDGES \u2026</span></div>\n<br />\nDEFINITELY OUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT ALLOW THE ENTIRE POPULATION OF 1300 MILLION PEOPLE TO COME UNDER PIL\u2026SO THAT JUDGES CAN ACT GOD --&nbsp; &nbsp; AND THAT TOO TO KEEP DESH DROHI FOREIGN FORCES ( example: HOMOSEXUALITY\u2014 ANIMAL LUST CONVERTED BY MAGIC TO LOVE ) HAPPY..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/objective-arguments-but-subjective.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">THE DEEP STATE ( BIG BROTHER) NOW RULES INDIA..</span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<br />\nWE WATCH..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\nPUT ABOVE CRITICAL COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF-<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nPMO<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nEVERY RSS SHAKHA LEADER<br />\nRSS CHIEF MOHAN BHAGWAT<br />\nABVP<br />\nVHP<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nEVERY HINDU STALWART<br />\nEVERY HINDU ORG<br />\nEVERY LOK SABHA MP<br />\nEVERY RAJYA SABHA MP<br />\nEVERY MLA OF EVERY STATE<br />\nEVERY MINISTER OF ALL STATES<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nIGs OF ALL STATES<br />\nEVERY MINISTER/ MINISTRIES OF CENTRE AND STATE<br />\nALL 3 ARMED FORCE CHIEFS<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nCJI DIPAK MISRA<br />\nROHINGTON NARIMAN<br />\nINDU MALHOTRA<br />\nKHANWILKAR<br />\nCHANDRACHUD<br />\nMARKANDEY KATJU<br />\nFALI BABY<br />\nSOLI BABY<br />\nSALVE BABY<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES.<br />\nALL HIGH COURT JUDGES F INDIA..<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT LAWYERS.<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA.<br />\n<br />\nALL MY READERS MUST CO-OPERATE.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">COLLEGIUM \u201cLAWYER TURNED JUDGES\u201d OF THE\nSUPREME COURT HAVE NOT BEEN VESTED POWERS UNDER THE CONSTITUTION TO WRECK MILLENNIUMS OLD HINDU CULTURE..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;
