font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">NO HINDU WOMAN ENTERS THE PUJA ROOM IN HER\nHOUSE TO LIGHT THE LAMP DURING HER MENSES PERIOD.. LEAVE ALONE GO TO A TEMPLE\n..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">DEEP STATE JUDGES HAVE BEEN TRYING TO HARM\nSANATANA DHARMA UNDER FOREIGN FUND INFLUENCE FOR A LONG TIME.. BY WAY OF ULTERIOR\nMOTIVED PIL FILED BY FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs AND DESH DROHI ANTI-HINDU ACTIVISTS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">SABARIMALA IS THIS PLANETs NO 1 PILGRIMAGE,\nTWICE THE SIZE OF MAHA MAHA KUMBH MELA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">AYYAPPA THE DEITY AT SABARIMALA IS VISHNUs NINTH\nAVATAR.. THIS WAS DELETED BY THE WHITE INVADER AND BUDDHA WAS INSERTED.. BUDDHA WAS A MORTAL WHO TRUGGLED FOR SALVATION\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVEN IF THE JUDGES ALOW MENSTRUATING WOMEN TO\nENTER SABARIMALA TEMPLE\u2014WE THE PEOPLE CHALLENGE \u2013&nbsp; LET IS SEE IF \u201cLAWYERS TURNED\nJUDGES\u201d CAN WRECK OUR CULTURE.. THIS IS AN OPEN CHALLENGE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WOMEN DURING MENSES WILL BE HARMED SEVERELY BY\nTHE NEGATIVE SCALAR ENERGY FLOW..&nbsp; THIS IS THE TIME WHEN THE UTERINE LINING (\nENDOMETRIUM ) IS SLOUGHED OFF BY NEGATIVE LONGITUDINAL FREQUENCY VIBRATIONS.&nbsp; EMBEDDED IN THIS LINING ARE GLANDS THAT CAN\nSECRETE A FLUID WHICH HELPS NOURISH A PREGNANCY UNTIL A PLACENTA IS FORMED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;THIS\nIS THE AURVEDIC SCIENCE PART OF IT.&nbsp; IT\nIS NOT SUPERSTITION. &nbsp;&nbsp;AT SEA I DO NOT\nALLOW OFFICERS WIVES TO ENTER THE SHIPs GALLEY WHEN THEY HAVE MENSES.. THE\nNEGATIVE ENERGY DOES NOT ALLOW THE BREAD TO RISE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS IS THE REASON WHY IN MANY HINDU HOMES\nTHE PUJA ROOM IS INSIDE THE KITCHEN.. THIS APPLIES TO THE HOME WHERE I STAY NOW\nTOO<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">JUDGES ALLOWING WOMEN DURING MENSES TO ENTER TEMPLES\nIS WORSE THAN FORCING MUSLIMS TO EAT PIG.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">MANs IMMEDIATE PREHUMAN ANCESTORS HAD\nSOCIETIES , BUT THEY DID NOT HAVE CULTURE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">CULTURE CAN CAUSE A PERSON TO DIE OF HUNGER\nTHOUGH NOURISHMENT IS AVAILABLE \u2013 AS THE AMERICANS SAW IN GUANTANAMO BAY PRISON\nWITH MUSLIMS IRAQI PRISONERS .. THEY WOULD RATHER DIE OF HUNGER THAN EAT PIG.&nbsp; &nbsp;PIG\nHAS SIMILAR DNA TO MAN. IT CAUSES HOMOSEXUALITY AMONG FUTURE GENERATIONS.. ONLY\nCHRISTIANITY&nbsp; ALLOWS EATING PIG..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;RAJPUT\nHINDU WOMEN WOULD RATHER JUMP INTO THE FIRE TO FUSE THEIR VAGINAS THAN HAVING\nTHEIR DEAD BODIES RAPED BY MUSLIM INVADERS. THERE CAN BE NO STAIN OF DISHONOUR\nEVEN IN DEATH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">CULTURE IS STRONGER THAN LIFE AND STRONGER THAN\nDEATH .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">CULTURE TRIUMPS OVER DEATH AND OFFERS MAN ETERNAL\nLIFE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE THREE FLASHES SAT SABARIMALA IS THE EXACT\nTIME WHEN BHISHMAs SOULD LEFT HIS MORTAL COIL WHILE HE LAY ON A BED OF ARROWS\nAT THE BATTLE FIELF OF KURUKSETRA 6000 YEARS AGO.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">BHISHMA WAS A SWORN BACHELOR \u2013 HE SACRIFICED\nHE THRONE FOR HIS FATHERs WELFARE ..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">AYYAPPA TOO WAS A SWORN BACHELOR WHO\nSACRIFICED HIS THRONE FOR HIS FATHERs WELFARE ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">I WAS A VERY SUCCESSFUL CAPTAIN AT SEA ON\nUNITED NATIONS SHIPS WITH MULTI- RELIGIONS AND CUTURES\u2026 I WAS SENSITIVE TO\nCULTURE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHITE PEOPLE WHO CAN KILL A CAMEL AND KEEP IT\nIN A FRIDGE ROOM AND EAT OFF IT FOR 2 MONTHS -- MUST NOT MAKE LAWS FOR DESERT\nBEDOUINS , WHO MUST EXCLUDE HEART PUMPED BLOOD BY HALAL --&nbsp; OR THE CARCASS ROTS SAME DAY IN EXTREME HEAT\n-- DON'T BITCH ABOUT CRUELTY-- &nbsp;IT IS\nABOUT SURVIVAL-- NO CAMEL MEANS-- DEATH OF A DESERT RACE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">OUR LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES ARE THE BOTTOM DREGS\nOF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL..&nbsp; FOR THE\nLAWYER POOL ONLY LOSER LAWYERS ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">CULTURES THEMSELVES MUST NEVER EVER BE\nEVALUATED OR GRADED AS HIGHER OR LOWER EVEN BY MOST INTELLIGENT MEN, &nbsp;LEAVE ALONG THE COLLEGIUM \u201cLAWYERS TURNED\nJUDGES\u201d WHO ARE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL &nbsp;BARREL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">A CULTURE IS A TIME TESTED MEANS TO AN END\n..&nbsp; CULTURE CANNOT BE IMPOSED ON PEOPLE ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">ONCE ESTABLISHED , CULTURE HAS A IFE OF ITS\nOWN IN A CAUSE AND EFFECT --YIN-YANG RELATIONSHIP.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">CULTURE FLOWS DOWN THROUGH TIME FROM ONE\nGENERATION TO THE OTHER .. IT IS A HIGHLY EVOLVED MEANS OF FREEDOM FROM WORRY\nAND CONTINUITY OF LIFE WHICH BEGAN AS A SIMPLE HUMAN REFLEX.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">CULTURE COULD BE A LOGICAL CONSTRUCT OR A\nPSYCHIC DEFENCE MECHANISM OR EVEN AN ABRSTRACTION FROM BEHAVIOR. &nbsp;&nbsp;THE USE OF CULTURE DEPENDS UPON AN ABIITY FOR\nRATIONAL OR ABSTRACT POSSED BY CONSCIOUS HUMANS ALONE . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">ANIMALS DON\u2019T HAVE IT.&nbsp; DIM WITS WHO ARE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL\nCEREBRAL BARREL AND BOTTOM DREGS OF THE LOSER LAWYER POOL DO NOT HAVE IT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">CULTURE SHOULD BE APPRECIATED IN TERMS OF\nITSELF.&nbsp;&nbsp; WHAT IS MORAL IN ONE CULTURE\nMIGHT BE IMMORAL OR ETHNICALLY NEUTRAL IN ANOTHER .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">CULTURE IS THAT COMPLEX WHOLE , WHICH IS A\nPOTPOURRI OF LANGUAGE , IDEAS, BELIEFS, CUSTOMS, CODES, INSTITUTIONS, TOOLS,\nTECHNIQUES, ART, RITUALS , KNOWLEDGE , MORALS , LAW , HABITS ,FOLKTALES ,VALUES\n, CONCENTIONS , CEREMONIES ETC &nbsp;SNOWBALLED BY MAN AS A MEMBER OF THE SOCIETY..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">CULTURE IS SUBJECTIVE AND CAN NEVER BE\nUNDERSTOOD BY OBJECTIVE PEA BRAINED LAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THESE JUDGES WITH OBJECTIVE MENTALITY &nbsp;WILL ARGUE ENDLESSLY\u2014 IF POPE ALLOWS SHOES\nINSIDE CHURCH WHY CANT HINDUS WEAR CHAPPALS INSIDE TEMPLE.. IF CHRISTIANS CAN\nEAT PIG WHY CANT MUSLIMS EAT PIG..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_qTDi7c80e0/W01nBwLz7CI/AAAAAAABc2Q/tXemcYgZjZ0dP2PrEkld-Zd39ZsjvwpaQCLcBGAs/s1600/dowSnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"185\" data-original-width=\"272\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_qTDi7c80e0/W01nBwLz7CI/AAAAAAABc2Q/tXemcYgZjZ0dP2PrEkld-Zd39ZsjvwpaQCLcBGAs/s400/dowSnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">PEOPLE GO ON SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE TO UPROOT LONG\nESTABLISHED VICES AND DEEP ROOTED TRAUMAS AND PHOBIAS.. HARDCORE DRUNKARDS ,\nDRUG ADDICTS AND WIFE BEATERS COME BACK WITH FORMATTED BRAINS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">IT TAKES 21 DAYS TO BREAK A HABIT. &nbsp;&nbsp;SABARIMALA OFFERS DOUBLE THIS TIME..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">TO\nLOSE A VICE YOU HAVE TO ABSTAIN FOR 21 DAYS --BODY IS LIKE A RIVER -- ALMOST\nALL BODY CELLS GET RENEWED . .</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS IS NO ORDINARY PILGRIMAGE, IT TAKES THE\nPILGRIM 42 DAYS OF INTERNAL CLEANSING BY PRAYERS , FASTS AND KEEPING AWAY FROM USUAL\nPLEASURES OF LIFE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THERE IS ZERO SUPERSTITION IN SANATANA DHARMA.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">MODERN QUANTUM PHYSICS HAS YET TO COME IN\nTERMS WITH THIS WRITTEN ANCIENT 7000 YEAR OLD VEDIC ENTANGLEMENT, ENTRAINMENT\nAND GROUP RESONANCE -- WHICH ACTIVATES THE AUTONOMOUS NERVOUS SYSTEM .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WOMEN AFTER MENOPAUSE GO FOR SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE &nbsp;TO GET RID OF THEIR EXTREME PMS PAINS\n..&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">OUR NCW IS A DESH DROHI COLLEGIUM ORGANISTATION\n,STARTED BY BILDERBERG CLUB..&nbsp; &nbsp;DEEP STATE INDIAN JUDGES FOSER THIS ORG </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">AGAIN, WOMEN ARE ALLOWED IN SABARIMALA,&nbsp; BUT NOT OF THE MENSTRUATING AGE..&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE WILL NOT\nALLOW JUDICIARY TO PLAY GOD AND DESTROY THE NO 1 PILGRIMAGE ON THE PLANET ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">PILGRIMS UNDERTAKE A VOW ( VRAT ) AND THERE\nIS NO SEX DURING THIS PERIOD AND THIS INCLUDES MASTURBATI0N . . . ON THE LAST\nDAY A PILGRIM CANNOT HAVE A LUNNY SEONE TYPE YOUNG WOMAN STANDING IN FRONT OF HIM IN A CRUSH AND\nDISTRACT HIM . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">A VRAT IS A SELF RESOLUTION. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IT IS\nABOUT MAKING A ROTTEN MAN ACCEPTING SOME RIGID SELF DISCIPLINE AND STICKING TO\nIT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">PILGRIMS TURN OVER A NEW LEAF.. THIS IS\nMAGIC.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">THIS IS A MILLION TIMES STRONGER THAT A\nFAALTHU NEW YEAR RESOLTION ..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">NON\nVIOLENCE, LOVE , TRUTH , UNSELFISHNESS, GRATITUDE, SACRIFICE, GRACE , HONESTY,\nFORM THE WARP ND WEFT OF THE VRAT FABRIC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">OPTIMISM\n, COURAGE , PERSEVERANCE , CONTEMPLATION, AND FORTITUDE FORM THE FIBRE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">HINDUS\nWERE THE FIRST ON THE PLANET TO GIVE THE IDEA OF A VRAT AND A PILGRIMAGE ..&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE MAGIC OF A VRAT IS THAT THERE ARE NO\nCHEATERS .. THERE IS NO NEED TO MONITOR.. THERE ARE NO CHEATERS ..&nbsp; &nbsp;AS IT\nIS ABOUT HELPING YOURSELF.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">YOU WILL NOT FIND A MAN WHO HAS WORN THE\nSABARIMALA VRAT MALA SHOWING INDISCIPLINE, LACK OF TOLERANCE, USING FOUL\nLANGUAGE, HURTING FEELINGS , USING ADDICTIVE DRUGS/ CIGARETTES/ ALCOHOL , EATING NON VEG FOOD FOR\n42 DAYS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ANCIENT HINDU PILGRIMAGE ROUTES HAVE BEEN\nUSURPED BY OTHER RELIGIONS..BUT THEY DON\u2019T HAVE THE SELF CONTROL OF A HINDU PILGRIM. THE HINDU PILGRIM IS BAREFOOTED , HE DOES NOT CUT HIS HAIR OF BEARD , HE WEARS BLACK, BATHES TWICE A DAY, SLEEPS ON THE FLOOR WITHOUT PILLOWS--&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THERE IS NO LEVELER LIKE THE SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE...</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">DESH DROHI FOREIGN CONTROLLED NCW AND CLOSET COMMIES LIKE ARNAB GOSWAMI ARGUE -- <span style=\"color: red;\">IF A MENSTRUATING CHRISTIAN WOMAN CAN ATTEND CHURCH WHY NOT A HINDU WOMAN..</span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/the-dirty-secret-of-christian.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/the-dirty-secret-of-christian.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">On the first day the pilgrim will be\ninitiated by a Guru Swami, who has undertaken 18 successive years of Sabarimala\npilgrimage.&nbsp; &nbsp;He has to present himself after a bath, clean shaven with nails\ntrimmed. A sanctified Mala or garland of Rudrakha beads is put on the neck,\nwhile chanting the mantra, \"Swamiye&nbsp;\nSharanamayyappa\" .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">Women between 9 and 50 cannot be pilgrims.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">At the moment of Makaravikkaku millions of\nthroats look at a single light and chant an electriying and hair rasing\n\"Swamiye Sharanamayyappa\". This sends out a soliton field over the\nplanet.&nbsp; Millions of coconuts are broken.\nEvery coconut is broken with intention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">Vrat helps you to prepare the mind for\nmeditation and contemplation--rather observing yourself inwards. It does NOT\nmean instant liberation from sins.&nbsp; It is\nall about steadfastness in purpose.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">Nothing can bar the way of such a\ndetermined soul--never mind that the whole world is against you.. This is\nalways a goal in mind. It is about harnessing your meandering mind , which aids\nself focus to awaken your dormant powers within.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">Vrat has been given pride of place in\nSanatana Dharma or Hinduism. It has a spiritual tinge and hence it sends a\nmessage to an onlooker about how resolute you are in achieving your goal,&nbsp; that you are firm as a rock and unwilling to\nsurrender to destiny--that you plan to forge the hinges of your destiny on your\nown terms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/04/vedic-quantum-intention-experiment.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/04/vedic-quantum-intention-experiment.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">FOREIGN FORCES JEALOUS OF SABARIMALA AND WANT\nTO SABOTAGE THE PLANETs NO 1 PILGRIMAGE USING DEEP STATE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY,\nTROJAN HORSE NGOs AND BENAMI MEDIA . . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">VISHNU AVATAR LORD PARASHURAMA CONSECRATED\nTHE SABARIMALA DEITY ,&nbsp; AS A FUTURE TASK .\n. IT IS ONE OF THE 108&nbsp; IDOLS HE\nCONSECRATED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THERE ARE TECHNICAL CALCULATIONS USING VEDIC\nMATH. THIS IS NO ORDINARY PLACING AN IDOL ANYWHERE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">RECENTY IN THE GUISE OF ARANMULA AIRPORT\nCONSTRUCTION THE CHRISTIANS AND COMMIES OF KERALA WANTED TO CROP THE FLAG STAFF\n( STUMBH ) OF PARTHASARATHY VISHNU TEMPLE ..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS IS NOT ALLOWED , AS THE LENGTH\nAND THE POSITION OF THE STUMBH IS ARRIVED AT AFTER DIVINE SCALAR CALCULATIONS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ARANMULA AIRPORT IS ANOTHER CONSPIRACY TO DRY\nUP THE PAMPA RIVER.. THERE CANNOT BE A SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE WITHOUT BATHING IN\nTHIS RIVER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"459\" data-original-width=\"660\" height=\"444\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ivjA44cdccY/W02HhI8loqI/AAAAAAABc3Q/geYB6GLbXhYO5KIxKDiC8kLqXdfgbEptACLcBGAs/s640/05tvcpt-bathingghats.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVERY ANCIENT TEMPLE SPIRE IN INDIA HAS\nIRRIDIUM INFUSED. ALL THESE SPIRES WERE STOLEN BY THE WHITE INVADER LEAVING\nBEHIND COPPER ONES..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THREE POINTS ARE VERY IMPORTANT -- THE\nPOSITION AND HEIGHT OF THE THIRD EYE OF THE BLACK IDOL, THE POSITION AND HEIGHT\nOF THE STAMBHA ( METAL CASED POLE ) AND THE POSITION OF THE PRASADAM HOLY WATER\nTABERNACLE.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS IS MATH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE WHITE MAN STOLE OUR BRAHMANAS AND\nARANYAKAS ( PART 2 AND PART 3 OF VEDAS ) WHICH HAS THESE CALCULATIONS .&nbsp; THE LAMBDA ANTENNA WAS INVENTED BY ANCIENT\nHINDUS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ON TOP OF THE STHAMBA IS THE VAHANA OF THE\nDIETY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">GARUDA IS A VAHANA OF VISHNU.&nbsp; ON THE FLAG OF ARJUNAs CHARIOT DRIVEN BY\nKRISHNA THE FLAH HAS GARUDA \u2013NOT MONKEY HANUMAN OF RAMAYANA ( CHEATING BY JEW\nROTHSCHILD ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/garuda-vimana-of-vishnu-and-garuda.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/garuda-vimana-of-vishnu-and-garuda.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DHWAJA MEANS TWO TRIANGLES IN SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The flag staff is installed in FRONT of the\ndeity's eyebrows -- and from far away a devotee knows what is what.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A line making an angle of 23.4 degrees with\nthe normal sight line of the idol should cut exactly the top of the Dhwaja.\nThis 23.4 degree and 108 is linked to Vishnu's Varaha avatar ( boar ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/05/vishnu-avatar-varaha-boar-fixing-planet.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/05/vishnu-avatar-varaha-boar-fixing-planet.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The base of the idol ( third eye ) and the\nDhwaja should be of equal height.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The height of Dhwaja is fixed-- and this is\nwhy no ordinary mortal could consecrate a temple .&nbsp; &nbsp;A hole\nis made in the roof of the Mandapa where the line of the above angle touches\nthe roof.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The middle point between the eyebrows of the\nidol, the hole in the roof and the top of the Dhwaja is in the same line.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The above angle line when extended should\nreach the top of the Kalasa the Gali-Gopuram. The Gali-Gopuram should be\nconstructed at thr right distance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As the earth axis is tilted to an angle of\n23.4 degrees the small hole, the top of the Dhwaja and the top of the\nGali-Gopuram should be in a line making an angle of 23.4 degrees with the\nnormal sight line of the idol for the optimum powerful radiation of the directional\npower.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A TEMPLE STUMBHA IS A QUARTER LAMBDA ANTENNA\n--NOT FOR ELECTROMAGNETIC WAVES BUT FOR SCALAR WAVES --HOWEVER IT FULLFILLS\nCONDITIONS FOR ELECTROMAGNETIC SPECTRUM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVERY STAMBHA IN ANCIENT TIMES HAS IRRIDIUM\nAND RHODIUM INHERENT IN THE VAHANA FIGURE OF THE DEITY RIGHT ON TOP. VAHANA\nMEANS CARRIER ( WAVE ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today any incoming missile is shot down in\nseconds using circular arrays are composed of thousands of crossed dipole\nantennas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The impedance of a 1/4 lambda Marconi antenna\nis 36.6 ohms.A \u00bd lambda dipole has an impedance of about 70 ohms . Remember\nscalar energy cannot be measured today--probably they will do it 500 years from\ntoday.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The antenna of your car is a simple example\nof this temple flagpost technology. The antenna and the mirror image behave\nvery like a half wave dipole. The car's antenna is quarter wave long and the\ncar body provides the mirror image<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Like a dipole antenna, a monopole has an\nomnidirectional radiation pattern. That is it radiates equal power in all\nazimuthal directions perpendicular to the antenna, but the radiated power\nvaries with elevation angle, with the radiation dropping off to zero at the\nzenith, on the antenna axis.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ovGSYRoSnuw/W014-NqM8jI/AAAAAAABc2o/FG1DBkzRxgQT7KDo5BdQmx7YagWlwaMhgCLcBGAs/s1600/220px-ESSSlectromagneticwave3D.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE FLAG MAST OF A TEMPLE IS PRECISION\nGEOMETRY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MERU, PASCALSs TRIANGLE , SIERPINSKI\nTRIANGLE, GOLDEN MEAN, FIBONACCI SERIES , LUCAS NUMBER, ULAM SPIRAL ARE ALL\nEMBEDDED IN VEDIC SANSKRIT SRUTIS.. MANTRAS CAN ONLY BE IN SANSKRIT \u2013NO OTHER\nLANGUAGE CAN BE USED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DESH DROHIS LIKE TRUPTI DESAI AND CLOSET\nCOMMIE ARNAB GOSWAMI CRIED-&nbsp; THAT HINDUS\nDISRESPECT WOMEN. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WELL I HAVE NEWS FOR YOU.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NO YAGNA OR HOMAM CAN BE DONE BY AN UNMARRIED\nMAN, OR A WIDOWER..&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The priest in a temple has NO power over the\nHindu devotee, unlike the padre in a church and the mullah in a mosque.&nbsp;&nbsp; The priests in the temples are just keepers\nof the place of worship.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AND NOW WE HAVE COMMIE AND FOREIGN FUNDED DEEP STATE JUDGES TRYING TO REGULATE HINDU SPIRITUALITY?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They can never be a situation where Hindus\nrun out of temples after Friday prayers to kill people enmasse in an orgy of\nviolence.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">History shows what Hindus have always REACTED\nto a GRAVE INJUSTICE and never pro-actively ACTED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The job of the temple priest if to preserve\nthe sancity and hygiene of the temple.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nHe is NOT allowed to intervene between the devotee and his God. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus must know that the greedy Brahmin\nPANDAS in North Indian temples are being controlled by FAKE mutts to grab\npower.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is high time we put PANDAS ( of North Indian\ntemples ) who harass devotees for money is jailed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without a mediator or a broker or a middleman\n, responsibility is placed fully upon the individual. There is no one to intercede\non his behalf. He is responsible for his actions, for his thoughts, for his\nemotions, for his relationship with his God. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He must work out his beliefs from the inside,\nwithout undue dependence upon external influences.&nbsp; Of course, there is much help, as much as may\nbe needed, from those who have previously gone through what he is now going\nthrough.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sabarimala there is a GURUSWAMI to guide\npilgrims \u2013just because he has done the pilgrimage 18 times , and NOT because of\nsome moral authority\u2014he is just a guide.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Guruswami has climbed the Pathinettam Padi ( 18 steps ) eighteen\ndifferent times in different years .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many people have asked me \u2013 why 42 days of\nVRAT for Sabarimala pilgrims and why climb 18 steps?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Balarama , Krishna\u2019s brother went on a\nbarefooted VRAT pilgrimage for 42 days and came back in time to witness the\nfinal fight to finish between his students Duryodhan and Bhima .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When war was imminent between the Kauravas\nand the Pandavas, Balarama considered himself equally affectionate toward both\nparties and so decided to side with neither group.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Bhima felled Duryodhana&nbsp; smashing his groin with his heavy mace ,\nBalarama was furious and charged to attack Bhima with his plough,&nbsp; as it went against the rules of engagement . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna immediately restrained him stating\nthat Bhima has just fulfilled a vow and he was witness to this vow. . In\nreality&nbsp; Duryodhana\u2019s whole body was\ninvincible due to the boon of Gandhari, except his groin. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/menstruating-women-and-sabarimala.html?showComment=1531855033567#c1935792426028682709\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 18, 2018 at 12:47 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_75MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">6200 YEAR OLD AYURVEDIC TEXT CHARAKA SAMHITA DOES NOT ALLOW SEXUAL INTERCOURSE DURING MENSES -- AND ALSO VISITING TEMPLES DURING MENSES.</span></b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>I AM INCLINED NOT TO TALK ABOUT IT--AS WOMEN WHO BREAK RULES OF SANATANA DHARMA DELIBERATELY MUST BE PUNISHED..</b></span>.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Period blood is made up of thickened endometrial cells that slough off if there isn't a pregnancy, actual blood from arteries in the uterus..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A woman's period is just a monthly shedding of the bed that would normally nourish a developing embryo.. The female body release anticoagulants to stop the menstrual blood from clotting..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When a woman takes the PILL , the hormonal changes that would cause a thickening and breakdown of the endometrium doesn't occur. The female body will produce a \u201cflatter\u201d uterine lining when you take hormonal birth control and, in some cases, will create no lining at all.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ENTERING A TEMPLE DURING MENSTRUATION CAUSES ENDOMETRIOSIS.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I AM NOT GONNA TELL EVERYTHING.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LET THESE BITCHES WHO WANT TO GO FOR SABARIMALA DURING MENSES SUFFER.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LET THEM REMOVE THEIR UTERUS, AS A RESULT OF ENDOMETRIAL HYPERPLASIA--OR IN LIEU UNDERGO PAINFUL BIOPSIES AVERY 6 MONTHS .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LET THESE BITCHES HAVE A PLAY PEN BETWEEN THEIR LEGS RATHER THAN A NURSERY..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WILL JUST GIVE A WEE HINT.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Endometriosis occurs when tissue from the lining of the womb is found outside of the womb - in areas of the body including the ovaries, Fallopian tubes, the abdomen and the bladder- caused by a process called retrograde menstruation, which is when the womb lining flows backwards through the Fallopian tubes into the abdomen, instead of leaving the body as a period.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Endometriosis cause damage to the Fallopian tubes or ovaries, leading to fertility problems.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Complications can include painful ovarian cysts and adhesions - areas of tissue which can fuse organs together.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Symptoms of endometriosis can vary, but the most common include painful or heavy periods, pain during and following sex, bleeding between periods, pain in the lower abdomen and difficulty conceiving.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Women who have endometriosis are less likely to be able to get pregnant using IVF.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Diminished ovarian reserve (DOR) refers to a reduction in the total number of eggs left in the ovaries..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DOR is hastened in onset by endometriosis..there is nothing that can be done to slow down or reverse DOR.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE DISPLACED ENDOMETRIAL TISSUE OF A MENSTRUATING WOMAN WHO DELIBERATELY ENTERS A TEMPLE GETS TRAPPED.</span></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SHE MAY GET RETROGRADE MENSTRUATION.</span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Menstrual blood containing endometrial cells flows back through the fallopian tubes and into the pelvic cavity instead of out of the body.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">These displaced endometrial cells stick to the pelvic walls and surfaces of pelvic organs, where they grow and continue to thicken and bleed over the course of each menstrual cycle.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When endometriosis involves the ovaries, cysts called endometriomas form. Surrounding tissue gets irritated, eventually developing scar tissue and adhesions \u2014 abnormal bands of fibrous tissue that can cause pelvic tissues and organs to stick to each other.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Hormones created by GUILT promote transformation of peritoneal cells \u2014 cells that line the inner side of your abdomen \u2014 into endometrial cells.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For pregnancy to occur, an egg must be released from an ovary, travel through the neighboring fallopian tube, become fertilized by a sperm cell and attach itself to the uterine wall to begin development.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Endometriosis obstructs the tube and keep the egg and sperm from uniting. But the condition also affects fertility in less-direct ways, such as damage to the sperm or egg.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LET THESE BITCHES GET RETARDED BABIES !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">EVEN TODAY MODERN DOCTORS DO NOT KNOW WHY ENDOMETRIAL TISSUE GROWS OUTSIDE THE UTERUS.</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\nTHESE \"HAPPY TO BLEED \" BITCHES GOT IT FROM CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WILL NOT TAKE ANY QUESTIONS.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_76b+seedBGdpD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_76b+seedBGdpD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>59.01 %</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_83TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; />\nMODERN DOCTORS CAN NEVER VIEW THE HUUMAN BODY AS \"POORNAM\" ( WHOLE )..THEY CAN ONLY LOOK AT IT PIECEMEAL.<br />\n<br />\nMOON PHASE HAS A LOT TO DO WITH SERUM SODIUM .<br />\n<br />\nThe lunar cycle has an impact on human reproduction, in particular fertility, menstruation, and birth rate.The release of neurohormones are triggered by the electromagnetic radiation and/or the gravitational pull of the moon.<br />\n<br />\nOvarian hormones cause retention of sodium and water in the tissue fluids..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN MENSTRUATING WOMEN ENTER POWERFUL TEMPLES THEY END UP WITH ENDOMETRIOSIS .<br />\n<br />\nEndometriosis is a painful condition in which the lining of the womb behaves abnormally and begins to grow outside the womb in places like the fallopian tubes.<br />\n<br />\nThe body cannot rid itself of the tissue properly, which can cause extreme cramps and problems with menstruation. It can even stop periods all together. The exact cause of the condition has not been identified by Western scientists.<br />\n<br />\nTHE WESTERN CUNT SCIENTISTS CAN NEVER SEE THE INTERPLAY AS A WHOLE.<br />\n<br />\nThe ovulatory menstrual cycle is the result of the integrated action of the hypothalamus, pituitary, ovary, and endometrium.<br />\n<br />\nSAMUDRA MANTHAN ( KURMA AVATAR OF VISHNU ) AT THE MICRO SCALE IS THE INTERACTION BETWEEN TWO OPPOSING FORCES ( PINEAL AND PITUITARY ) .. AMRIT IS INTERNAL ..<br />\n<br />\nPineal DMT is the chemical messenger which links body and spirit.<br />\n<br />\nEndometriosis and polycystic ovary syndrome lead to infertility, as can growths on the uterine wall and polyps caused by heavy bleeding..<br />\n<br />\nOn the withdrawal of estrogens and progesterone there is sudden spasm of the endometrial blood vessels, and all but the basal layer of the endometrium dies. The disintegrating endometrium is shed, together with some blood. The endometrium contains plasmin, an enzyme that dissolves blood clots, so that the menstrual discharge is normally fluid.<br />\n<br />\nThe ovarian hormones circulate in the blood and are excreted in modified forms in the urine<br />\n<br />\nThe pituitary gland stimulates the ovary to produce estrogens and progesterone, but there is a \u201cnegative feedback\u201d by which the estrogens inhibit the output of FSH from the pituitary gland .<br />\n<br />\nFollicle stimulating hormone is one of the gonadotrophic hormones, the other being luteinising hormone. Both are released by the pituitary gland into the bloodstream.<br />\n<br />\nProgesterone is controls the output of LH..<br />\n<br />\nPituitary first stimulates the ovary, and the ovary then inhibits the pituitary, the basic rhythm is under the control of the hypothalamus..<br />\n<br />\nThe pituitary gland, which is about the size of a pea and located deep in the base of your brain, controls the secretion of hormones in the body. 6200 year old Charaka Samhita does not allow menses sex.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe pituitary gland controls several hormone-secreting glands including the thyroid, adrenals and ovaries.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_172MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_172BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_172B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_173B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9112124651208563549\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_173M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/menstruating-women-and-sabarimala.html?showComment=1531920739885#c9112124651208563549\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 18, 2018 at 7:02 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_173MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nAs the menstrual cycle is dictated by hormones and controlled by the ovaries, if there is a problem with the control centre upstairs it can change the regularity and even colour of your period--leave alone pain.<br />\n<br />\nThe inner lining of the womb, known as the endometrium, prepares for an embryo to implant in it. The endometrium thickens, divides into different layers and develops an extensive network of blood vessels.<br />\n<br />\nIf the woman doesn't get pregnant, progesterone levels begin to fall. The thick endometrial tissue with its blood vessels then begins to slough off, and passes out through the vagina. This bleeding is menstruation.<br />\n<br />\nYOU EXPECT 1.2 CRORE MANAGEMENT QUOTA / SC-ST QUOTA DOCTORS T TELL YOU ALL THIS.<br />\n<br />\nI DARE THE TOP 20 GYNECOLOGISTS OF INDIA TO TAKE 200 ITEM OBJECTIVE TEST ON THEIR SUBJECT--LIKE IN THE LINK BELOW- COLLECTIVELY ALL WILL FAIL..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/10/marine-engineering-self-examiner.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAgain-- Endometriosis is a disorder in which the tissue that normally lines only the inside of your uterus (the endometrium) grows outside of it\u2014around the ovaries, bowel and other areas in your pelvis.<br />\n<br />\nFrom the start of menstruation (menarche) to its cessation (menopause), monthly menstrual bleeding (menses) is regulated by hypothalamic and pituitary hormones.<br />\n<br />\nEven the smallest changes in hormone levels can result in menstrual cycle abnormalities..<br />\n<br />\nDiscomfort prior to the onset of menstruation that is accompanied by psychiatric, gastrointestinal, and/or neurological symptoms is referred to as premenstrual syndrome<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/04/abnormal-uterine-bleeding-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe hormonal feedback loop is also influenced by other hormones (e.g., prolactin) and neurotransmitters (e.g., opioids, acetylcholine, noradrenaline).<br />\n<br />\nREAD BOTH PARTS OF THE POST BELOW-<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/11/prolactin-oxytocin-dopamine-child.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/epidurals-when-chutney-mary-fails-her.html<br />\n<br />\nDuring menses (absence of a pregnancy ) by regression of corpus luteum, the progesterone concentration decreases and it induces vasospasms in the uterine spiral arteries, ischemia,--thus sloughing off of the functional layer of the endometrium..<br />\n<br />\nMenses may actively be delayed if progesterone is administered in the second half of the menstrual cycle.<br />\n<br />\nUterine spiral arteries extend the full length of the endometrium<br />\n<br />\nPremenstrual dysphoric disorder (PMDD) is severe form of affective symptoms that interferes with daily life, including having abnormal disagreements with family, friends, and colleagues..<br />\n<br />\nSUCH WOMEN ARE UNFIT TO RUN A HOME --LEAVE ALONE A NATION.. text-decoration-line: none;\">July 18, 2018 at 9:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_197MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\n<br />\nCOL RATHORE<br />\nI&amp;B MINISTRY<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME NINISTRY<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nLAW MINISTRY</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\">WE ASK THE DEEP STATE COLLEGIUM JUDGES WHO\nARE HELL BENT ON FORCING MENSTRUATING WOMEN INTO SABARIMALA..</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;</span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">WILL YOU NOW DECLARE 41 DAY VRAT AS REDUNDANT\nFOR ALL -- AS OBVIOUSLY MENSTRUATING WOMEN CANNOT HONOUR THE VRAT !</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
