font-size: 16px;\">https://www.thehindu.com/news/national/section-377-partner-can-be-from-the-same-sex-says-justice-chandrachud/article24382220.ece</span><br />\n<br />\nHEY CHANDRACHUD--<br />\n<br />\nHOW ABOUT SEX WITH ANIMALS, HOW ABOUT SEX WITH DEAD BODIES, HOW ABOUT SEX WITH OWN MOTHER ?<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nCHANDRACHUD<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nSUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nINDU MALHOTRA<br />\nFALI BABY<br />\nSOLI BABY<br />\nSALVE BABY<br />\nROHINGTON NARIMAN<br />\nCM OF KERALA<br />\nDGP OF KERALA<br />\nIG OF KERALA<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMAN<br />\nALL CENTRAL / STATE MINISTERS AND MINISTRIES<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nIGs OF ALL STATES<br />\n<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_23B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1475377405179604634\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_23M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_26.html?showComment=1532587170341#c1475377405179604634\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">July 26, 2018 at 12:09 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_23MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nAn excellent informative fwd reg the ingoing Legal case in supreme Court on Tught of Entry to Sabarimala for Women of any age..<br />\nHighlighted emphasis supplied by me:<br />\n*******<br />\nBrilliant submissions by Sr. Advocate Shri K Parasaran today before the Hon\u2019ble Supreme Court in Sabarimala matter<br />\n(Source :People for Dharma @People4Dharma)<br />\n<br />\n1. Arguments in the Petition resume. Mr. Parasaran now argues for the Nair Service Society.<br />\n2. Mr. Parasaran submits that Kerala is an educated society<br />\n3. Mr. Parasaran submits that 96% of the women in Kerala are educated. They are independent. It is a matrilineal society. Therefore to assume that the practice of the Temple is based on patriarchy is fundamentally incorrect<br />\n4. Mr. Parasaran submits that the practice of the Temple is not comparable to Sati. In fact, Sati itself has not connection to the Hindu faith.<br />\n5. Mr. Parasaran cites the examples of the wives of Dasaratha and Kunti to prove that they did not commit Sati after their husbands' death.<br />\n6. Therefore Mr. Parasaran submits that we should not approach the issue of with notions of patriarchy<br />\n7. *Mr. Parasaran says that a right question will lead to the right answer, a wrong question will lead to the wrong answer*.<br />\n8. Mr. Parasaran submits that *if a person asks \"can I smoke when I pray?\" he will get a slap. But if he asks \"can I pray as I smoke?\" he will be appreciated*.<br />\n<br />\n9. Therefore, Mr. Parasaran says the *right questions must be asked in this case for the Court to get the right answers*.<br />\n10. Mr. Parasaran further submits that in this case he has to be even more careful and prepared because he is answerable not just to the Lordships but also the Lord above.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n11. Mr. Parasaran is now reading out portions from the Shirur Mutt decision of the Supreme Court.<br />\n<br />\n12. Mr. Parasaran submits that even democracies, especially democracies, must protect religion and tradition.<br />\n13. Mr. Parasaran submits that Hindu religion respects merit and wisdom wherever it comes from. He says for neeti, it is still Vidura neeti which is cited. That is the greatness of the faith.<br />\n14. Mr. Parasaran submits that while the court must listen to activist voices, it must equally listen to voices which seek to protect tradition.<br />\n15. Mr. Parasaran submits that the Legislature is Brahma, Executive is Vishnu and Shiva is judiciary because only Shiva's ardhanarishwara form epifies Article 14, equal treatment of both sexes.<br />\n16. Mr. Parasaran submits that Shiva is no Brahmachari, but even when his meditative state was sought to be disturbed by Kama Deva, he was reduced to ash because he failed to respect that state of Shiva.<br />\n17. Mr. Parasaran submits that we must not proceed with the presumption that the ancients knew nothing and that we know better in all aspects of life.<br />\n18. Mr. Parasaran that Lord Ayyappa's character as a Naishtika Brahmachari is protected by the Constitution.<br />\n19. Mr. Parasaran is placing reliance on the judgment of the Court in Tilkayat Govindaji Maharaj (1964).<br />\n20. Mr. Parasaran refutes the argument of the Petitioner that some women may die before they reach the age of 50, Mr. Parasaran says that a person carries her or his fate with him. That's not a legal consideration to reverse the tradition<br />\n21. Mr. Parasaran points out that there are thousands of ppl who register for Padi Pooja at , the consequence being that the pooja will be conducted in their name only long after their deaths.<br />\n22. Mr. Parasaran therefore submits that using death as an argument to upset the tradition is neither here nor there.<br />\n23. Mr. Parasaran submits that the basis of the practice is the celibate nature of the Deity, not misogyny. Devotees who visit the Temple too are expected to observe celibacy in letter and spirit. Hence, during the journey, company of women must be avoided.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_23BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_21T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_21TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedFeWD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedFeWD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_21TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_21TN\"></span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_21TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedFeWD\" kind=\"d\"><br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_21B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6116119558079815623\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_21M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_26.html?showComment=1532587284459#c6116119558079815623\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">July 26, 2018 at 12:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_21MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\n24. Mr. Parasaran is reading out portions from the Sundarakanda of the Ramayana to explain the concept of Naishtika Brahmacharya.<br />\n25. Mr. Parasaran submits that Lord Ayyappa is a yogi. To define who a Yogi is, Mr. Parasaran is quoting Adi Sankara.<br />\n26. *Mr. Parasaran submits that misogyny is not supported by Hindu Shastras nor is chastity the sole obligation of the woman. In fact, chastity is a greater obligation on the man and he is duty bound under the Shastras to give a pride of place to the woman*<br />\n27. Mr. Parasaran submits that the practice in Sabarimala by no stretch of imagination is informed by misogyny. The only consideration is the nature of the Deity.<br />\n28. Mr. Parasaran now proceeds to address Article 25.<br />\n29. Mr. Parasaran submits that Article 25(2)(b) applies only to social reform, it still does not apply to matters of religion covered by Article 26 (b).<br />\n30. Justice Chandrachud wonders if Article 25(2)(b) applies to only Hindu institutions. Mr. Parasaran responds that the practice sought to be addressed by the said Article is peculiar only to Hindu institutions.<br />\n32. Mr. Parasaran resumes submissions post lunch. Mr. Parasaran submits that women do not fall under the protection of Article 25(2)<br />\n33. Justice Nariman asks- will not scheduled caste women be protected by Article 25(2)? Mr. Parasaran disagrees and says 25(2) treats the community as a class, not on the basis of gender.<br />\n34. Mr. Parasaran submits that even Article 15 does not apply to religious institutions which is evident from the language of the Article itself. This was a conscious exclusion since an amendment to include religious institutions was rejected.<br />\n35. *Justice Chandrachud observes that perhaps Article 25(2) may not apply to the rule under challenge*. But asks what provision acts as a limitation on the rights of religious denominations under Article 26.<br />\n36. Mr. Parasaran submits that Article 25(2) deals only with secular aspects and right of entry of classes or sections. It does not therefore apply to religious aspects or right of entry based on gender.<br />\n<br />\n37. The CJI asks Mr. Parasaran to shed light on the Constituent Assembly debates on the relevant Articles of the Constitution. Mr. Parasaran is now walking the Court through the debates.<br />\n<br />\n38. Justice Nariman asks - \"Therefore Mr. Parasaran, are you saying that the core object of Article 25(2)(b) is connected to the object of Article 17?\" Mr. Parasaran answers in the affirmative.<br />\n39. Justice Nariman asks - \"why do we need two provisions for the same object?\" *Mr. Parasaran submits that while Article 17 applies generally, Article 25(2) applies specifically to Temples.*<br />\n40. Mr. Parasaran further submits that Article 25(2) reiterates the object of Article 17 in the specific context of Temples and Hindus to send a loud and clear message.<br />\n41. Mr. Parasaran submits that if the intention of the Constituent Assembly was to include religion in Article 15, they would have.<br />\n42. *Justice Nariman agrees with Mr. Parasaran's interpretation of Articles 15(2) and 25(2)*<br />\n43. Justice Nariman agrees that the object of Article 25(2) and Article 17 are the same i.e. *To address caste based untouchability and not gender*.<br />\n44. Mr. Parasaran says that he does not even need to make his case under Article 26 because he has a solid case under Article 25 itself.<br />\n45. Justice Nariman says - \"assume that we agree with your submissions, then pls explain to us why can't the state fall back on 25(2) citing religious reform? Also what about the rights of women under Article 25(1)?\u201c<br />\n46. Mr Parasaran submits that the present case does not involve a social issue but a religious issue. By using 25(2), u will reform a religion out of its identity.<br />\n47. *Justice Nariman AGREES with the submission of Mr. Parasaran on the inapplicability of Article 25(2) to the issue at hand*<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_21BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_21B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_22B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8260423093199319233\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_22M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_26.html?showComment=1532587325790#c8260423093199319233\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">July 26, 2018 at 12:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\n48. Mr. Parasaran is now taking the Court through judgements on rights of religious denominations.<br />\n49. Mr. Parasaran submits that by abolishing the practice, the very character of the religious institution will be irreparably altered which affects the rights of devotees under Article 25(1).<br />\n50. Mr. Parasaran digresses and *submits that Constitutional law is his first love and that it is his privilege to argue in this matter when he has otherwise stopped taking up matters*.<br />\n51. Mr. Parasaran is placing reliance on the Jantia Hills District case.<br />\n52. The citation of the judgement is 2006(4) SCC 748<br />\n53. Mr. Parasaran is citing the creation of another heaven for Trishanku by Vishwamitra as an example of the consequence of over activism. And submits that the Petition at hand is a case in point.<br />\n54. Mr. Parasaran is now taking the Bench through the Travancore Cochin Hindu Religious Institutions Act, 1951.<br />\n55. Mr. Parasaran is citing Section 15A(1) of the 1951 Act which deals with duties of the Travancore Devaswom Board.<br />\n56. Mr. Parasaran points out that the said provision requires the Board to observe and maintain the practices of Temples under its administration.<br />\n57. Mr. Parasaran is now going through the Constituent Assembly debates to show the history of Articles 14, 15 &amp; 25.<br />\n58. Mr. Parasaran is reading portions of the debates which relate to Article 17, which clearly show that the Article deals only with caste-based untouchability.<br />\n59. Mr. Parasaran is reading out extracts from the Interim Report on Fundamental Rights with respect to Articles 15, 17 and 25(2)(b).<br />\n60. *Mr. Parasaran specifically shows the REJECTION of the amendment of Article 15 by the Constituent Assembly with respect to inclusion of religious places*.<br />\n61. Mr. Parasaran is reading out portions from debate of November 29,1948 to support his position on Article 17 that it relates only to religion and caste based untouchability<br />\n62. Mr. Parasaran submits that even if Article 25(2) applies to women, it is only with respect to social issues but not religious issues.<br />\n63. Mr. Parasaran further submits that Article 25(2)(b) *is at best an enabling provision for the Legislature, it doesn't enable the judiciary*.<br />\n64. Mr. Parasaran submits that there are several other famous Ayyappa Temples in Kerala itself which allow entry of women without age restrictions. Therefore, the Temple is not a case of discrimination.<br />\n65. Mr. Parasaran is thanking the Bench for a patient hearing.He has concluded his submissions.</div>\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedFeWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-thread\" id=\"bc_0_21T_box\" style=\"margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedFeWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seedFeWD\" kind=\"d\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_23B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_26B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6531001180231640748\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_26M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_26.html?showComment=1532589382804#c6531001180231640748\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">July 26, 2018 at 12:46 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_26MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nARGUMENTS TO AND FRO FROM PARASARAN TO CHANDRACHUD / ROHINGTON NARIMAN IS AN AFFRONT TO THE VERY SUBJECT OF DHARMA AND NATURAL JUSTICE..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WILL BE A PERMANENT BLOT / SLUR TO THE SYSTEM OF INDIAN JUSTICE...<br />\n<br />\nTHIS SEALS THE NEED TO DISMANTLE OUR JUDICIAL SYSTEM-- DISMISS ALL \"LOSER LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES\" WHO ARE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL AND CREATE A FRESH SYSTEM WITH INTELLIGENT JUDGES ( SELECTED BY ENTRANCE TESTS LIKE IIT ) ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/menstruating-women-and-sabarimala.html<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE ( LIKE LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES ) AND STARKID JUDGES WHO CANT THINK-- MUST KEEP AWAY FROM SABARIMALA SPIRITUALITY.<br />\n<br />\nALL ARGUMENTS IN A COURT ARE OBJECTIVE...VETO POWER ON MATTERS OF SPIRITUALITY ( NOT RELIGION ) CAN NEVER BE GIVEN TO THE OBJECTIVE..<br />\n<br />\nLaws of Karma and Dharma has guided the Hindu since time immemorial . There was never any DOGMA lumped down the Hindu\u2019s throat...<br />\n<br />\nMoral subjectivity leads a society to embrace diversity by seeing that a particular worldview isn't the only right one.<br />\n<br />\nA subjective morality is one rooted in human feelings and conscience ...<br />\n<br />\nNatural justice is inherent. These are the things that are most important to us, indeed the only things important to us!..<br />\n<br />\nOBJECTIVE IS OUTSIDE OF HUMAN BEINGS. WHEN A SHIP INCPECTOR INSPECTS THE SHIP, HE MUST BE OBJECTIVE. HE MUST NOT ALLOW HIS EMOTIONS TO RULE.<br />\n<br />\nSAME WITH A JUDGE IN A COURT. NATURAL JUSTICE AND CONSCIENCE IS LOCKED UP AND THROWN AWAY.<br />\n<br />\nOBJECTIVE MORALITY IGNORED CONTEXT ..<br />\n<br />\nIN THE CASE OF SABARIMALA THE PATROLS DEITIES ARE AYYAPPA ( NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU ) AND GRANDSIRE BHISHMA.. BOTH SWORN BACHELORS , WHO TOOK AN OATH NOT TO MARRY, TO PROTECT THE INTERESTS OF THEIR FATHERS.. A HUGE SACRIFICE INDEED.<br />\n<br />\nTHE THREE FLASHES HAPPEN AT THE EXACT MOMENT OF BHISHMAs SOUL LEAVING HIS MORTAL COIL FROM A BED OF ARROWS ON THE BATTLE FIELD OF KURUKSHETRA..<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA IS SUBJECTIVE. SUBJECTIVE IS STRICTLY WITHIN HUMANS BEINGS \u2013IT DERIVES FROM OUR INTANGIBLE CONSCIENCE ALONE.<br />\n<br />\nHINDUS MUST NECESSARILY USE THEIR OWN CONSCIENCE AND ARRIVE AT OWN ANSWERS..NI OTHER RELIGION AFFORDS THIS GREAT LIBERTY\u2026<br />\n<br />\nDO YOU EXPECT PARSI IMMIGRANT STAR KID ROHINGTON NARIMAN TO UNDERSTAND ALL THIS..<br />\n<br />\nIN SUBJECTIVE MORALITY PERCEPTION WITHIN PERIMETER OF CONTEXT IS PARAMOUNT... SUBJECTIVE IS DEPENDENT ON PEOPLEs OPINIONS NOT THE CONSTITUTION..<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA IS BASED ON CONSCIOUS HUMAN CONSCIENCE. NO MAN CAN MANIPULATE OR SILENCE HIS CONSCIENCE. WE ARE NOT THE SOURCE OF OUR OWN CONSCIENCE...<br />\n<br />\nSPIRITUALLY SOAKED HINDUS ARE SUBJECTIVE WITH MORALITY. ONLY THIS WORKS..<br />\n<br />\nMORALITY IS DOING WHAT IS RIGHT, REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOUR ARE TOLD...<br />\n<br />\nSUBJECTIVE MORALITY HAS NO SCOPE FOR EXCUSES OR MAN MADE OBJECTIVE LAW... LOVE , COMPASSION AND FAIRNESS MAKE US MORAL..<br />\n<br />\nHinduism was developed along spiritual lines, NOT religious lines\u2014the reason why 800 years of slavery could NOT stamp out this amazing way of life..<br />\n<br />\nHinduism is NOT a religion, it is the practice of spirituality by elevating human consciousness in the personal quest for truth..<br />\n<br />\nLoaded truth is delivered or revealed from a divine source and enters the world through a single agent: for example, Abraham in Judaism, Jesus Christ in Christianity, and Muhammad in Islam.<br />\n<br />\nThe Hindu spirituality tradition , unlike other religions -- has always concerned itself with the \u201chuman\u201d situation rather than the \u201cour religion \u201c situation...<br />\n<br />\nUnder the doctrine of karma, the ability to make choices remains with the individual-and NOT what is being told as gospel in a holy book -- OR some objective rules in the constitution..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Ask the Jews\u2014they will say India is the only place where they never got persecuted over thousands of years\u2014 they always ran here for refuge...this PARAMOUNT TRUTH must never be forgotten.</span></div>\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_26BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/shikimate-pathway-cancer-spurt-in-india.html?showComment=1532752171502#c582959221376391330\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 28, 2018 at 9:59 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_108MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">IMPORTANT/ URGENT/ CRITICAL------</span><br />\n<br />\nONLY THE ELECTED LEGISTLATURE CAN RESOLVE THE SABARIMALA ISSUE.. A NON ISSUE RAKED UP BY A CRYPTO JEW KHAN LAWYER..<br />\n<br />\nFIVE UNELECTED ( WHOSE BIASES AND SLANTS ARE KNOWN ) UNACCOUNTABLE JUDGES CANNOT DECIDE FOR 1300 MILLION INDIANS..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE BEST WAY WOULD BE --<br /><br />THE SABARIMALA \"MENSTRUATING WOMEN ENTRY\" MUST BE RESOLVED BY A REFERENDUM AMONG KERALA MALE HINDUS WHO HAVE ALREADY GONE ON PILGRIMAGE AT LEAST 18 TIMES ( GURUSWAMYS ) ...</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHIS MUST BE DONE IN CONJUCNTION WITH --<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">A REFERENDUM OF FEMALES -- OF 30 WOMEN WHO HAVE ALREADY MADE THE PILGRIMAGE TWICE ( AS GIRLS BELOW THE AGE OF 10 / AS OLD MENOPAUSED WOMEN OVER THE AGE OF 50 )..<br /><br />THE QUESTION TO BE WOMEN WOULD BE ----<br />1) YOU HAVE MADE THE TRIP UNDER THE AGE OF TEN AS A SMALL GIRL CHILD, WOULD YOU AS A YOUNG MENTRUATING WOMAN NOW, LIKE TO GO FOR SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE , OR WILL YOU BE HAPPY TO WAIT TILL THE AGE OF 50. ?<br /><br />2) YOU HAVE MADE A SARARIMALA PILGRIMAGE TRIP AFTER THE AGE OF 50, WOULD YOU HAVE LIKED TO GO TO SABARMALA WHEN YOU WERE A YOUNG MENSTURATING WOMAN, EARLIER , WITHOUT BEING MADE TO WAIT SO LONG ? ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHE INDIAN JUDICIARY MUST BE DISMANTLED AND REBUILT..<br />\n<br />\nWE DONT NEED THE MENTALLY INFERIOR COLLEGIUM SYSTEM, WHERE JUDGES ELECTED JUDGES.. THIS IS NOT ALLOWED BY OUR CONSTITUTION.. INDIA IS THE ONLY NATION WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: medium;\"><b>LAWYER TURNED JUDGES WHO CANNOT THINK BEYOND THE OBJECTIVE, ARE THE BANE OF INDIAN JUDICIAL SYSTEM\u2026 THEY CANT TAKE FAST DECISIONS..<br /><br />DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE ) CAN NEVER BE OBJECTIVE AND GIVEN TO A NON-CONSCIOUS CALCULATOR / COMPUTER , WHICH CAN NEVER TELL THE MORAL OF A STORY , LAUGH AT A SUBTLE JOKE OR UNDERSTAND WHAT IS CULTURE..</b></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">KHAPS WHO DELIVER SUBJECTIVE JUSTICE ARE BETTER THAN OUR USELESS INDIAN JUDICIARY--WHERE A FEW WISE OLD MEN ( WHO KNOW ALL THE PEOPLE IN THE VILLAGE SINCE THEY WERE BORN ) DELIVER SUBJECTIVE CONSCIOUS JUSTICE -- SWIFT / WITHIN THE PERIMETER OF CONTEXT/ WISE TO THE WAYS OF LOCAL CULTURE / LADEN WITH DHARMA...</span></span></div>\n<br />\nWE DONT CARE FOR THE BENAMI MEDIA FAKE STORIES SHOWING KHAPS IN BAD LIGHT..<br />\n<br max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2289545902881016127\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_98M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_20.html?showComment=1538102659197#c2289545902881016127\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 28, 2018 at 8:14 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_98MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI-- HAS STOOD IN THE SHADOWS AND USED THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY TO STRIKE AT THE ROOTS OF THE SACRED INSTITUTION OF MARRIAGE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN SANATANA DHARMA NO MAN CAN PERFORM A YAGNA WITHOUT HIS WIFE.. A WIDOWER OR A BACHELOR CANNOT PERFORM A YAGNA..</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Marriage ( vivaha ) is known as \"saha-dharma-carini-samprayoga\". It means \"union with a wife together with whom a man practises dharma\".</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The clear implication is that carnal pleasure is not its chief purpose, but the pursuit of dharma.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The sastras do not ask a man to pursue dharma all by himself but require him to take a helpmate for it. The wife is called \"dharma-patni\", \"saha-dharma-carini\", thus underlining her connection with dharma, and not with sensual pleasure.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Here is proof of the high esteem in which the sastras hold women.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">THE INDIAN JUDICIARY WITH BENAMI MEDIA AND NCW IN CAHOOTS HAS REDUCED AN INDIAN WOMAN TO A SEX OBJECT..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/dubious-role-of-bilderberg-club-created.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">IN SANATANA DHARMA , NO WOMAN CAN ENTER ANY TEMPLE , WHEN SHE IS MENSTRUATING.. THIS IS NOT FOR SABARIMALA ALONE..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN MY HOME MY WIFE HAS NEVER ENTER THE PUJA ROOM WHEN SHE HAD HER PERIODS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\"Deho devalaya prokto jivah prokto sanatanah. \" (The body is a temple. The life enshrined in it is the eternal Lord. )</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">You do not enter the precincts of a temple if you are unclean.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GAYATRI MANTRA CAN BE CHANTED BY WOMEN AS LONG AS SHE DOES NOT HAVE HER PERIODS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE KANCHI MUTT HEAD CHANDRASEKHARA SARASWATI WROTE THAT WOMEN CANNOT RECITE GAYATRI MANTRA.. HE IS WRONG.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KANCHI MUTT WAS AN AYYAPPA TEMPLE CONVERTED TO A FAKE MUTT BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..( JUST LIKE UDIPI MUTT )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Kb0q9J8lPA</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE MEDITATE ON SAVITR, - THE SACRED LIGHT FROM THE PRIMORDIAL SOURCE, MAY SHE GUIDE OUR INTENTIONS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS SACRED LIGHT IN NOT THE SUN, AS WRITTEN AND TOLD BY EVERY BODY SINCE VEDAS WERE WRITTEN DOWN 7000 YEARS AGO.. IT IS THE QUASAR, WHOSE BRILLIANCE EXCEED A TRILLIONS SUNS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There is no mortal author to Gayatri mantra.. Gayatri mantra contains in itself the spirit and energy of all Vedic mantras.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Gayatri is the essence of Rgveda, Yajurveda and Samaveda. HE WENT AROUND BOASTING.. OUR COLEGIUM JUDICIARY CRIED \u201c FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nBUT WITHIN A WEEK UC ANANTHAMURTHY HAD KIDNEY PROBLEMS AND TO DEFRAY THE EXPENSES OF EXPENSIVE DIALYSIS THE ITALIAN WAITRESS MADE HIM VC OF AN UNIVERSITY..<br />\n<br />\nOF COURSE UC ANATHAMURTHY WOULD NEVER PISS ON A STATUE OF JESUS / MARY OR THE HOLY KORAN TO BRAND THEM POWERLESS TO STRIKE BACK..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ATHEIST RATIONALISTS MUST KNOW THAT SANATANA DHARMA HAS ZERO SUPERSTITION..</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span>THE DAY MODERN SCIENCE CAN TIDE UP AND BREACH THE LAST FRONTIER TO MEET SANATANA DHARMA AND SEE EYE TO EYE , THERE WILL BE PRALAYA ( COSMIC DISSOLUTION ) DUE TO STAGNATION..<br />\n<br />\nFOR EXAMPLE -- ALBERT EINSTEIN STOLE ALL HIS AWARD WINNING THEORIES FROM VEDANTA..<br />\n<br />\nEINSTEIN JUST PUT SOME MATH AND MADE SUBJECTIVE ANCIENT VEDANTA LOOK LIKE OBJECTIVE MODERN SCIENCE.. THE BEST PART IS THAT HE OUTSOURCED HIS MATH TO INDIA AND HE WAS POOR IN MATH..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nVISHNU IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY ..AN ENERGY FIELD --JUST LIKE BRAHMA AND SHIVA ON A MACRO AND MICRO SCALE..<br />\n<br />\nA BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS THE FIRST TO REVEAL THIS.. THAT IS WHY HE IS THE NO 1 WRITER ON THE PLANET WITH PROFILE VIEW OF 739 MILLION...<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WIVES OF THE TRINITY ARE ALSO COSMIC ALLEGORIES.<br />\n<br />\nFOR EXAMPLE THE WHITE MAN AND COMMIES WHO ARE INVITED FOR DROHI LITERARY FESTS RIDICULED THAT BRAHMA DID INCEST WITH HIS OWN DAUGHTER SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU GOOGLE \u201c&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BRAHMA INCEST</span></b>&nbsp;\u201c YOU WILL GET 4.8 LAKH POSTS ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">SARASWATI ( WIFE OF BRAHMA ) IS THE MIGHTY QUASAR WHICH IS SEVERAL TRILLION TIMES MORE BRILLIANT THAN THE SUN....</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHE VEDAS WHICH WENT ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE IT WAS PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO REFERS TO SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SHIVA WIFE PARVATI ( DEVI/ BHAGAWATI/ DURGA / KALI ) IS A MIGHTY COSMIC ALLEGORY.. IN HER DESTRUCTIVE FORM SHE IS THE BLACK HOLE WHICH CAN DEVOUR ENTIRE GALAXIES IN SECONDS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nLONG AGO WHEN MEAND MY WIFE CLIMBED UP KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN, MANY READERS ASKED ME WHY I DID THAT..<br />\n<br />\nWELL MY WIFE DID ORGONE ENERGY MAPPING..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/kudajadri-mountain-chitramoola-cave-adi.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST ABOVE I WROTE ABOUT DEVI FOLLOWING ADI SHANKARACHARYA AND TELLING HIM NOT TO LOOK BACK.. NOW, DEVI ( WIFE OF SHIVA ) IS ENERGY.. SHE IS NOT A MORTAL WOMAN..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SPOT ADI SHANKARACHARYA LOOKED BACK, DEVI DISAPPEARED AND HE CONSECRATED THE POWERFUL MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE THERE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHOUGH THE TEMPLE IS IN KOLOOR KARNATAKA, ONLY MALAYALIS DEVOTEES GO THERE ..WE KNOW WHAT IT IS..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE UNDERGROUND WATER CHANNELS FROM THE TOP OF KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN TO THE INNER SANCTUM OF MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE..<br />\n<br />\nDURING THESE RECENT FLOODS THE TEMPLE WAS PARTIALLY SUBERGED..<br />\n<br />\nSAME IN GIZA PYRAMIDS.. I HAD WRITTEN ABOUT THE APEX OF THE PYRAMID EMITTING A BLUE PLASMA GLOW WHICH COULD BE SEEN FOR THOUSANDS OF MILES IN ANCIENT TIMES .. THERE ARE WATER CHANNELS FROM THE RIVER NILE UNDER THE PYRAMIDS..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_34BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_32B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1950966935418826789\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_32M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<span kind=\"d\"><cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. ( GEOMETRY OF OM -108), ULAM SPIRAL, LUCAS NUMBERS, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC -- EMBEDDED IN IT.&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">THIS IS WHY WE SAY VEDAS WERE DOWNLOADED FROM AKASHA BY MAHARISHIS , AND THERE IS NO MORTAL AUTHOR..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">BY RECITING VEDIC SRUTI EVERY HUMAN CONDITION OR COSMIC CONDITION COULD BE ADDRESSED AND RESOLVED INSTANTLY ..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">SANATANA DHARMA IS BASED ON THE SCALAR LONGITUDINAL WAVE WHICH TRAVELS FASTER THAN LIGHT..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">MY WIFE INTEGRATES ISOTOPE MAGIC ( SRUTI VERSES REDUCED TO DIGITS ) INTO HER DISTANT REIKI\u2014TACHYON ENERGY FASTER THAN LIGHT ..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.20 %</span></b></span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\">..</span></div>\n</div>\n<span kind=\"d\">\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_32BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_4.html?showComment=1533627666035#c7894093904803267438\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 7, 2018 at 1:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_129MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCAN DO<br />\n<br />\nChitrahuti , is a FAKE practice of keeping small amount of food out side of the plate on the floor , as offering to FAKE Chitragupta..<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">CHITRAGUPTA IS A CREATION OF JEW ROTHSCHILD.. ALL CHITRAGUPTA TEMPLES IN INDIA WERE BUILT BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWE NEVER HEARD OF CHITRAGUPTA ( AND MISSING LINK KAYASTHAS ) TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nIN KERALA THERE ARE NO KAYASTHAS OR CHITRAGUPTA TEMPLES.<br />\n<br />\nMANY KAYASTHA LEADERS WERE TRAITORS DURING ROTHSCHILDs RULE OF INDIA<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">ROTHSCHILD GAVE THE BULLSHIT THAT CHITRAGUPTA ( PATRON DEITY OF KAYASTHAS ) DECIDES IF YOU MUST GO TO HEAVEN OF HELL..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">SORRY THERE IS NO HEAVEN OR HELL IN SANATANA DHARMA..WE HAVE A CONCEPT OF REINCARNATION. IN SANATANA DHARMA IT IS NOT YOUR CURRENT BIRTH WHICH DECIDES YOUR FATE-- ALL THE EXTRA BAGGAGE OF YOUR PAST LIVES ADD UP</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">KAYASTHAS EAT MEAT..&nbsp; &nbsp;DURING MOGHUL RULE THEY CONVERTED TO ISLAM..&nbsp; &nbsp;MOST WERE LOW CASTE HINDU ACCOUNTANTS AND GIVEN HIGH POSTS WITH LAND AND PERKS...IN BENGAL THEY WERE CALLED PIR ALI MUSLIMS.<br /><br />AFTER MUGHAL EMPIRE WAS TAKEN OVER BY JEW ROTHSCHILD , THESE KAYASHTAS CONVERTED BACK TO HINDUISM..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">AND ROTHSCHILD MADE KAYASTHAS THE MISSING LINK-- BETWEEN BRAHMINS AND KSHATRIYAS. SINCE THESE OPPORTUNISTS WERE OF LOW MORAL FIBRE THEY WERE USED AS TRAITORS.</span></b><br />\n100 YEARS AGO BENGALI KAYASTHAS ( ORIGINALLY PIR ALI MUSLIMS ) HELD 53% OF LAND IN BENGAL. THEY WERE CALLED BHADRALOK ( ELITE GENTRY-- BOSE/ BASU/ GUHA/ GHOSH / MITRA/ DATTA etc )<br />\n<br />\nCHITRA GUPTA FOLLOWERS ARE HAPPILY EATING BEEF -- A LOOP HOLE PROVIDED BY ROTHSCHILD FOR THESE OPPORTUNISTS WHO HAD TO SACRIFICE BEEF WHEN THEY RECONVERTED BACK FROM ISLAM TO HINDUSIM...<br />\n<br />\nBENGAL HAS PRODUCED MORE TRAITORS THAN FREEDOM FIGHTERS.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD USED HIS OPIUM FUNDED UNIVERSITIES LIKE UC BERKELEY, COLUMBIA , CAMBRIDGE ECT TO PROP UP THESE FAKE KAYASTHAS.. But the instructions also cover what it calls the 'worst crime', described as an obscene act perpetrated by a cleric with 'youths of either sex<br />\n<br />\nThe 69-page Latin document bearing the seal of Pope John XXIII was sent to every bishop in the world. The instructions outline a policy of 'strictest' secrecy in dealing with allegations of sexual abuse and threatens those who speak out with excommunication.<br />\n<br />\nThey also call for the victim to take an oath of secrecy at the time of making a complaint to Church officials. It states that the instructions are to 'be diligently stored in the secret archives of the Curia [Vatican] as strictly confidential. Nor is it to be published nor added to with any commentaries.'<br />\n<br />\nI DONT NEED TO PROVE ANYTHING --BUT MY PHOTO INSIDE THE COLOSSEUM ( WEARING WRANGLER JACKET , LEVI JEANS AND YASHICA CAMERA ) WAS TAKEN THE SAME DAY..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST BELOW, YOU CAN SEE MY PHOTO ON THE STEPS OF ST PETERs CATHEDRAL VATICAN ON THE SAME DAY. The allegations of sexual abuse against Cardinal Groer proved to be true.<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN , ABOVE IS JUST ONE OF THE THOUSANDS OF CASES..<br />\n<br />\nIn another case from the late 1940s, Marcial Maciel, the Mexican founder of a religious order, The Legionaries of Christ, was a sexual abuser multiple times over. When allegations against Maciel were initially raised, John Paul II ignored them.<br />\n<br />\nJoseph Ratzinger, John Paul II\u2019s confident and later successor, remarked: \u201cOne can\u2019t put on trial such a close friend of the pope.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nMaciel avoided prosecution until his death in 2008.<br />\n<br />\nThe hierarchical structure of the church made it difficult to bring high-ranking figures to justice.<br />\n<br />\nSuperiors are given nearly absolute obedience, which makes the threshold for acting against them high. By the same token, superiors can often protect offending priests.<br />\n<br />\nIt is a terrible sin for a bishop to commit or cover up a terrible crime such as rape or sexual abuse. It is a devious attempt to conceal criminal conduct and is a blueprint for deception and concealment.<br />\n<br />\nThreatening excommunication to anybody who speaks out shows the lengths the most senior figures in the Vatican were prepared to go to prevent the information getting out to the public domain<br />\n<br />\nTHREE BILLION USD PAY OUT IN THE POST BELOW IS GROSS UNDER ESTIMATION.. AND HENCE REQUIRES A MIDDLEMAN BETWEEN THE DEVOTEE AND HIS GOD..<br />\n<br />\nPROTESTANT BELIEVE THAT ONLY GOD CAN FORGIVE--NOT A BROKER POPE OF PADRE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html</span><br />\nTHERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO REFERENCE IN THE BIBLE OLD OR NEW ABOUT CONFESSING TO A MIDDLEMAN PRIEST WITHIN THE CONFINED OF A CONFESSION BOX INSIDE THE CHURCH..<br />\n<br />\nBIBLE WANTS SINNERS TO CONFESS TO GOD DIRECT IN REPENTANCE..<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness. 1 john 1.9\u2014UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_28MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_28BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_28B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_29B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6260624235427538576\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_29M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_7.html?showComment=1533686605212#c6260624235427538576\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 8, 2018 at 5:33 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_29MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nTHE RULE OF CONFESSING TO THE PRIEST FROM INSIDE A CONFESSION BOX WHILE HOLDING A CROSS ( AS A SACRAMENT ) WAS LAID DOWN AT THE FOURTH LATERAN COUNCIL IN 1215 AD..The Fourth Council of the Lateran was convoked by Pope Innocent III, and the Council gathered at Rome's Lateran Palace beginning 11 November 1215.<br />\n<br />\nCANON 21, \"Omnis utriusque sexus\", commands every HERMAPHRODITE Christian who has reached the years of discretion to confess all ITS sins at least once a year to ITS priest. This was more of a political ploy..<br />\n<br />\nUTRIUSQUE SEXUS MEANS HERMAPHRODITE.. A PERSON WITH PENIS ( WITHOUT BALLS ) AND VAGINA ..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE UNFORTUNATE PEOPLE WERE THEN BLACKMAILED FOR SEX BY CATHOLIC ELITES WHO ENGAGED IN SUCH DEVIANT PLEASURES ..<br />\n<br />\nCONFESSIONS WERE 100% SEXUAL IN NATURE AND WEALTHY GAY CLIENTSS USED TO WAIT OUTSIDE THE CHURCH..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SEXUAL ORIENTATION OF THIS HERMAPHRODITE WAS WHAT WAS CONFESSED AS SOMETIME IT COULD SATISFY AN ANAL SEX HUMPING GAY-- OR EVEN A PERVERTED STRAIGHT AS IT HAD A VAGINA.. .<br />\n<br />\nLATER THIS CONFESSION WAS EXTENDED TO BOTH MALE AND FEMALE GENDERS.. WHY SHOULD A WOMAN CONFESS TO A STRANGER MALE PRIEST ?<br />\n<br />\nJESUS WAS FIRST DEPICTED ON A CROSS ONLY 1148 YEARS AGO.. IT COULD HAPPEN ONLY BECAUSE THESE VERSES HAD DIVINE MATH\nEMBEDDED.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES ,\nPASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI YANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL,\nPRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT --.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY WE HINDUS INSIST THAT SRUTIS WERE DOWNLOADED\nFROM AKASHA.. THESE VERSES ARE NOT WRITTEN BY MAN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SUN CANNOT BE SEEN FROM OUTER SPACE ..BUT ITS ENERGY CAN\nBE DRAWN BY SOLAR PANELS OF SATELLITES.. THIS IS AN EXAMPLE OF MAYA MENTIONED\nIN RIG VEDA 72 TIMES AND 29 TIMES IN ATHARVA VEDA .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMAYA IS INVISIBLE- NO HUMAN CAN SEE BEYOND THE QUANTUM\nSCREEN.. OUR 5 SENSES ARE SQUELCHED FOR OUR OWN SURVIVAL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL THE INITIAL QUANTUM PHYSICS SCIENTISTS DECLARED THAT\nWHEN SCIENCE CATCHES UP WITH VEDANTA , THE COSMOS WILL HAVE DISSOLUTION (\nPRALAYA ).. SUCH IS THE WISDOM CONTAINED IN THE VEDAS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL OF THEM PICKED UP BHAGAWAD GITA AND WROTE DOWN IN THEIR\nWILLS THAT THEY WANT TO BE CREMATED --NOT BURIED..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTRANSFORMER ?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU IS A TRANSFORMER -- THOUGH I HAVE MENTIONED THAT\nVISHNU IS A MEDIATOR AND PRESERVER IN ALL MY POSTS SO FAR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHAT WE SEE AS MATTER IS ACTUALLY VIBRATING ENERGY -- THIS\nWAS WRITTEN IN OUR VEDAS--LIFTED BY JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN AND PATENTED IN HIS\nNAME..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nENERGY CAN NEITHER BE CREATED BY BRAHMA OR DESTROYED BY\nSHIVA --IT CAN ONLY BE TRANSFORMED BY VISHNU.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES , EXCEPT VISHNUs MORTAL\nAVATARS VAMAMA, PARASHURAMA, RAMA, KRISHNA AVATARS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU LOOK INTO THE MIRROR WHAT YOU SEE IS NOT YOU-- YOU\nARE ACTUALLY A BALL OF VIBRATING ENERGY INSIDE YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU DIE YOUR SOUL WILL EXIT YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN THE BODY IS CREMATED AND THE SKULL POPS A SOLITON WAVE\n( TSUNAMI ) WILL TAKE YOUR SOUL UP TO ONE OF THE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS WHICH\nACCOMMODATES THAT PARTICULAR SOUL FREQUENCY.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU BURY A DEAD BODY , THE SOUL IS TRAPPED ON PLANET\nEARTH, UNHAPPY AND LOST FOREVER. SINCE BURIAL RELIGIONS CAME ON PLANET EARTH\nMAN HAS KNOWN NO PEACE..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOUR SOUL FREQUENCY IS TIED TO YOUR NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE.\nWHEN THE KARMIC BAGGAGE GETS LIGHTER , YOUR SOUL FREQUENCY INCREASES..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS CORRESPOND TO THE SEVEN HUMAN\nCHAKRAS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE IS NO INSTANT KUNDALINI BUNGEE JUMP..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE FIRST ASTRA LAYER IS FOR NON \u2013 CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE ,\nFEW SEMI-CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE WHICH CAN PASS THE MIRROR/ COLOUR TEST ( LIKE\nELEPHANTS/ BONOBOS/ DOLPHINS ) , AND FULLY CONSCIOUS HUMANS WHO ARE CRIMINALS\nAND HOMSEXUALS WHOSE KUNDALINIS ARE STUCK IN THE LOWERMOST MOOLADHARA CHAKRA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCHAKRAS AND ASRAL LAYERS RISE FROM RED TO VIOLET ( RAINBOW\nVIBGYOR COLORS ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. IN FIRST TO SIXTH ASTRAL LAYERS --AWAIT RE-BIRTH.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY SOULS CAN ENTER ALL SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS --NOT THE\nPHYSICAL BODY ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN THE 5 PANDAVA BROTHERS AND DRAUPADI DECIDE TO CLIMB\nMOUNT MERU --IT IS AN ALLEGORY FOR DEATH AND SOULS PARKING AT ONE OF THE SEVEN\nASTRAL LAYERS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA ( DHARMA ) IN THE FORM OF A DOG JOINS THIS GROUP ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA USHERS IN --<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDRAUPADI INTO THE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNAKULA INTO THE THIRD ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSAHADEVA INTO THE FOURTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBHIMA INTO THE FIFTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nARJUNA INTO THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAND THEN YUDHISTRA LOOKS BACK AND SEES THE DOG.. HE KNOWS\nTHAT NO DOG CAN GET PAST THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER --AND HE IS PUZZLED..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE DOG REPRESENTED DHARMA ( YAMA ) \u2014 YUDHISHTRA WAS \u201cSON OF\nDHARMA \u201c..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAT THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER ( EQUIVALENT OF HEAVEN )\nYUDDHISTRA SEES ALL HUNDRED KAURAVAS ALREADY THERE -- ALONG WITH THE STALWARTS\nLIKE BHISHMA/ DRONA /KARNA ETC<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHE IS SHOCKED AND ANGRY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAT THAT TIME YAMA ( THE DOORKEEPER OF ASTRAL LAYERS 2 TO 6 )\nDECLARES THAT HE IS YUDDHISTRAs FATHER WITH KUNTI .. AND THAT YUDDHISTRA STILL\nHAS SEEDS OF EGO WITHIN HIMS WHICH MAKES HIM UNFIT FOR MOKSHA ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMAs EXPLANATION: WHOEVER KRISHNA KILLED --ALL GOT MOKSHA\n.. KRISHNA HAD THE UNWRITTEN TASK OF KILLING ALL 100 TEST TUBE KAURAVA BABIES--\nHE DID IT AND HOW..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPANDAVAS WOULD HAVE HAD ALBINO BLOOD OF MOTHER KUNTI HAS SEX\nWITH PANDU ( AN ALBINO )--AND IN THAT CASE KRISHNA WOULD HAVE KILLED ALL 5\nPANDAVAS TOO..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER READING THE MAHABHARATA EPIC -- ALL WONDERED WHY\nKRISHNA PLAYED FOUL--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIF YOU REALLY LOOK AT IT DISPASSIONATELY -- HE GAVE ALL 100\nTEST TUBE BABIES MOKSHA-- THE ULTIMATE GIFT FROM VISHNUs AVATAR ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCHANGE IS THE ONLY CONSTANT\u2014 BRAHMAN DOES NOT ALLOW\nSTAGNATION.. IN SANATANA DHARMA THERE ARE NO CIRCLES\u2014ONLY SPIRALS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHUMANS WHO ARE NOT CRIMINALS AND HOMOSEXUALS ON DEATH\n--THEIR SOULS GET PARKED ON SECOND TO SIXTH LAYER. YAMA IS IN CHARGE --HE\nDECIDES BASED ON KARMIC BAGGAGE .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE IS NO PERMANENT HEAVEN OR HELL IN HINDUSIM. THE FIRST\nASTRAL LAYER IS A SEMI TEMPORARY HELL --THE POPE STOLE THIS IDEA AS\n\"PURGATORY\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREMEMBER DOING PUJA , VISITING TEMPLES , DOING SHRADDH FOR\nANCESTORS , DIPPING IN GANGES -- IS ALL TO PUT YOU IN A MENTAL FRAMEWORK OF\n\"GRATITUDE\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS THE LAWS OF KARMA THAT COMPELS HINDUS TO BEHAVE\nRIGHTEOUSLY AS PER THE UNIVERSAL MORAL ORDER OR LAWS OF DHARMA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE HINDU KNOWS THAT KARMA IS IN HIS OWN HANDS .. THIS IS\nWHY A HINDU IS THE SAME OUTSIDE DOORS AND WITHIN DOORS.. A HINDU WOMAN DOES NOT\nNEED TO CONFESS IN CHURCH TO A STRANGER MALE SEXUAL PREDATOR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE RASCAL SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV TOLD ON NDTV THAT MEN CAN\nHAVE ANAL SEX BEHIND CLOSED DOORS.. MODI GAVE THIS FAKE GURU A PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:47 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE OTHER FAKE GURU AND RASCAL SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR TOLD ON\nNDTV THAT SANATANA DHARMA ALOWS HOMOSEXUALITY . HAVE YOU HEARD THE VOICE OF\nTHIS PATHETIC FELLOW-- HAVE YOU SEEN HIS FINGERS ? MODI GAVE HIM TOO A PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA IS PURELY KARMA BASED. THERE IS NO SHORT CUT OR\nJUGAAD POSSIBLE-- LIKE ROTHSCHILDs CREATION BABAJI ( OR SOME RASCAL LIKE SRI\nSRI RAVISHANKAR ) GIVING YOU DEEKSHA .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREMEMBER WE ARE ALL IMMORTAL. WE ALL WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU , YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER AND YOU WOULD BE GREAT GRANDSON\nWERE ALL BORN AT THE SAME SPLIT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU AVATARS WERE NOT BORN WITH THE STARS LIKE YOU AND ME\n. THEIR SOULS WERE CREATED AND SENT DOWN FOR A PURPOSE ON EARTH.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER THEIR MISSION ON EARTH WAS OVER , THEIR SOULS MERGED\nBACK TO BRAHMAN ON SEVENTH ASTRA LAYER ( VAIKUNTA ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR CON-MEN TO CLAIM THAT THEY ARE\nDESCENDANTS OF RAMA OR KRISHNA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL MORTALS ON EARTH LIKE YOU AND ME --WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS--THE SAME SPLIT SECOND<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS MEANS YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER, YOU AND YOUR GREATGRANSON\nWAS BORN AT THE SAME SPILT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE WERE ALL PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD NAMED BRAHMAN ON THE\nSEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY HINDUS DO NAMASTE\u2014WE HONOUR THE PIECE OF BRAHMAN\nWITHIN THE OTHER PERSON.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE GOD OF SANATANA DHARMA IS A \"MORHOGENETEIC\nCONSCIOUSNESS FIELD- BRAHMAN \" WHICH CANNOT HE PICKED UP BY THE 5\nSENSES--ON MICRO AND MACRO SCALE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MICRO SCALE THIS EMPTY SPACE ( INTELLIGENT FIELD )\nPROVIDES PERPETUAL MOTION WITHIN AN ATOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MACRO SCALE IT IS AKASHA ( ETHER ) WHERE THE ENTIRE\nCOSMOS HOLDS THEIR POSITIONS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are\nconscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites\nTamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos\nis change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is\nvibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic\nspiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOne cannot exist without the other and they are dependant .\nNo phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They\nconsume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIf the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the\nmediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is\nwhy Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal\navatars.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAs for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it\nreally does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug\ninto the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThese two opposing forces are natural and transform each\nother , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas\nalways results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBalance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously\ndevour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without\nvibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 5-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:48 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThis is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is\nNOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE-\nprakriti.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as\nbeing created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are\npermanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal\naspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nEach of the trinity gods are powerless without their\nconsorts.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the\nsame body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a\nmindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the\nchangeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active\naspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThrough uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his\nspirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS\nhere- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the\nsentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle.\nPragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The\nrelationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and\nenergy<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPrakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its\nnon-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and\nShakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well\nas in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also\nthe agent of all change<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is\nwithdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy\nare interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSamkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the\nways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the\nliberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDO YOU THINK IDIOTS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU\nJAGGI VASUDEV CAN EVER UNDERSTAND THIS\u2014THEIR PADMA VIBHUSHAN MINDS ARE TOO\nSMALL AND THINKING PROCESS TOO PETTY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREAD ALL 102 PARTS OF THE UNFINISHED POST BELOW-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; THE WHITE INVADER INJECTED POISON AND REPLACED LAND BHARAT WITH BHARATA ( SON OF SHAKUNTALA WHO NEVER EXISTED )<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA ( ARJUNAs ANCESTOR ) IS NAMED AFTER BHARATA ( LAND)<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">BHA / BHAVA- EMOTION<br />RA / RAGA- MELODY<br />TA / TALA- RHYTHM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Natya Shastra like Vedas have NO author as it is a SRUTI . The white invader converted Bharata into a MUNI ( sage ).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/kathakali-dance-form-of-kerala-capt.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>THE ANCESTOR OF PANDAVAS AND KAURAVAS WAS BHARATA ( 8165 BC ) SON OF RISHABHA (8190 BC ) AND ELDER BROTHER OF BAHUBALI</b></span></div>\n<br />\nThe story of Shakuntala has been added as an appendage in the Mahabharata ( Adiparva chapter ) by Jew Rothschild..<br />\n<br />\nCRYPTO JEW Raja Ravi Varma who painted the non-existent Radha ( mistress of Lord Krishna ) does the honours for Shakuntala too.<br />\n<br />\nEmperor Rishabha ( Adinath ) , the father of Chakravatri Bharata is considered as the first Thirthankara. Mahavira was the 24th Thirthankara..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD PUT MONKEY HANUMAN ON THE FLAG OF ARJUNAs CHARIOT.. THE REAL FLAG WAS KRISHNAs FLAG EMBLAZONED WITH VISHNUs CARRIER GARUDA..<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WAS NOT A SINGLE TEMPLE FOR HANUMAN , THE GOD OF THE DEVADASIS ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535892123070#c782687426727886869\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 2, 2018 at 6:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_188MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSOMEONE ASKED ME-- IF WE MANUALLY DE-SILT DAM RESERVOIRS , WHAT IS THE HARM?<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN--<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">GANGES IS NOT A HOLY RIVER ANY MORE AS THE \"LIVING\" PART OF IT LIES AT THE BOTTOM OD DAM RESERVOIRS UPSTREAM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nFOR MILLIONS OF YEARS LIVING WATER FLOWED DOWN GANGES RIVER.. THIS IS RIVER WATER PLUS SILT.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SILT IS NOT JUST MUD--- IT IS THE COLLOIDAL LIFE OF THE RIVER..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">GANGES WATER AT GAUMUKH ( SOURCE ) CONTAINS MASSIVE AMOUNT OF COLLOIDAL SILVER AND OTHER COLLOIDS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHIS WATER IS HIGHLY ALKALINE AND HAS AN EXTRAORDINARY AMOUNT OF HYDROGEN WITH AN EXTRA ELECTRON TO NEUTRALIZE DAMAGING FREE RADICALS WHICH CAUSE DNA DAMAGE AND RAPID AGEING.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS LOW SURFACE TENSION WATER IS BIO-ENERGISED MIRACLE WATER..LESS THAN THE USUAL 73 DYNES..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MIRACLE WATER EASILY PENETRATES THE 75 TRILLION CELLS AND MITOCHONDRIAL MEMBRANES TO SUPPLY NUTRIENTS AND FLUSH WAY TOXINS.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE OLYMPICS CERTAIN ATHLETES HAVE GOOD COACHES WHO TELL THEM WHAT TO DRINK BEFORE THE RACE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_16.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI WAS AT SEA FOR 40 YEARS AND THUS MISSED FAMILY MARRIAGES--WHERE RELATIVES MEET EACH OTHER..<br />\n<br />\nI WENT TO KANNUR TO GIVE INVITATIONS FOR MY ELDER SONs WEDDING 3 YEARS AGO..<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF MY RELATIVES WERE SEEING ME AFTER HALF A CENTURY.. AND THEY ALL MADE SURE THAT I ATE WHATEVER NATIVE SWEETS THEY GAVE ME --IN ADDITION TO SWEET COLD DRINKS AND SWEET TEA..<br />\n<br />\nON THE DRIVE BACK FROM KANNUR TO CALICUT MY TOES AND FINGERS WENT HAYWIRE.. I BANGED INTO A MOTORCYCLIST AT A TRAFFIC LIGHT.. HE JUST LOOKED BACK AND ACTED AS IF NOTHING HAPPENED.<br />\n<br />\nI WAS UNABLE TO EVEN HOLD THE WHEEL LEAVE ALONE PRESS THE BRAKE.<br />\n<br />\nI IMMEDIATELY TOLD MY WIFE-- I WILL PARK AT THE NEAREST BAKERY-- MY BODY NEEDS SODIUM AND POTASSIUM IMMEDIATELY.. BUY A TIN OF SALTED CASHEW..BEFORE I GET BRAIN FOG..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS 2130 PM AND MOST STORES WERE SHUTTING..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE CAME RUNNING BACK WITH A HUGE TIN OF SALTED CASHEW--I GORGED ON IT AND DRANK LOT OF WATER...<br />\n<br />\nWITHIN THREE MINUTES I WAS OK--AND I DROVE THE NEXT ONE HOUR TO CALICUT AT FULL SPEED WITHOUT PROBLEM..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_bPFKDdWlCg</span><br />\n<br />\nBONGS CANT GET HILSA FISH ANYMORE AFTER THE FARAKKA ARRAGE WAS BUILT SANS FISH LADDER.. HILSA FISH SWIMS HUNDREDS OF MILES UPRIVER TO SPAWN IN PURE SWEET WATER..<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI WANTED TO INTERLINK INDIAN RIVERS.. HE THINKS RIVERS ARE GUTTERS FLOWING INTO THE SEA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAS LONG AS SARASWATI RIVER FLOWED, GANGES WITH ALL IT DIVINE MACROPHAGES HAD NO IMPORTANCE..<br />\n<br />\nSARASWATI RIVER HAD MORE DIVINE AXOLOTLS...WHICH COULD REGENERATE EVEN THE SPINAL CORD.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWELL WELL --WHAT DO YOU KNOW ?<br />\n<br />\nYOU EXPECT GANGA MINISTER UMA BHARATI TO KNOW ALL THIS ?<br />\n<br />\nHEY VOTE KA BHOOKA PM MODI-- WE HAD ENOUGH JAANKAARI FROM YOU ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR .. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The verdict delivered by Justice Jagmohanlal Sinha, led to imposition of Emergency in India on June 25, 1975.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Justice Jagmohal Lal is infamous for his 1975 ruling in the State of Uttar Pradesh v. Raj Narain lawsuit in which he invalidated the election of Prime Minister Indira Gandhi.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The petition challenged her election to the Lok Sabha in 1971 from the Rae Bareli parliamentary constituency in Uttar Pradesh, which MAD CAP Raj Narain had also contested..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The judgement in itself ran to 259 pages.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Indira Gandhi was declared guilty of corrupt practices and her election to the Lok Sabha was declared null and void.
