max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c968402945007440732\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_12M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_15.html?showComment=1531652036836#c968402945007440732\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 15, 2018 at 4:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_12MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE UNIVERISTY IN MALI WHERE VISTITING NAMBOODIRI PROFESSORS FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERITY ( MUZIRIS ) TAUGHT MATH AND ASTRONOMY WS CALLED WAS CALLED SANKORE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TODAY THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE AROUND THIS UNIVERSITY RE CALLED DOGONS\u2014PEOPLE WHO KNEW KERALA ASTROLOGY..USING COWRIE SHELLS ( NOT PEANUTS )..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SIRIUS B IS CALLED MAKARAJYOTI IN MALAYALAM ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The brightest star in the night sky, Sirius is recorded in the earliest astronomical records. Its displacement from the ecliptic causes this heliacal rising to be remarkably regular compared to other stars, with a period of almost exactly 365.25 days holding it constant relative to the solar year.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In 1844, the German astronomer Friedrich Bessel deduced from changes in the proper motion of Sirius that it had an unseen companion. On January 31, 1862, American telescope-maker and astronomer Alvan Graham Clark first observed the faint companion, which is now called Sirius B, - \"the DOG child\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">French anthropologist Marcel Griaule, several authors have claimed that Dogon traditional religion incorporates details about extrasolar astronomical bodies that could not have been discerned from naked-eye observation. This idea has entered the New Age and ancient astronaut literature as evidence that extraterrestrial aliens visited Mali in the distant past.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WESTERNERS HAVE WONDERED HOW PEOPLE OF MALI KNEW ADVANCED MATH AND ASTRONOMY \u2013WHERE STARS WERE CHARTED, WHICH COUD NOT BE SEEN BY THE NAKE EYE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Sirius is the brightest star in the night sky. However, the people of Mali held ancient yet precise astrophysical information about other \u2018invisible\u2019 stars in the Sirius system \u2013 some of which have only recently been discovered by modern scientists with highly sophisticated equipment. The sacred Sigui ceremony is performed every 60 years, during which the Dogon perform dances recounting the story of their origin.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Their drawing of the planet Saturn show a ring around it. They know the four moons of Jupiter, and that the planet follows Venus by turning slowly around the sun. They even plot the positions of Venus by a series of alters, raised stones and arrangements in caves and shelters.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Saturn\u2019s halo, which can only be seen through a telescope, is also known to them. The Dogon know perfectly well that it\u2019s the turning of the earth on its own axis that makes the sky seem to turn around. They talk of \u2018the apparent movement of the stars from west to east as men see them.\u2019</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They believe that the earth, sun, moon and stars were created by a divine being called Amma ( means mother in Malayalam ).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Sirius is the brightest star system in the night sky, almost twice as bright as the second brightest star, Canopus. Sirius is visible from almost everywhere on Earth, except latitudes north of 73\u00b0 N.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Sirius's emanations affect dogs and are used by Kerala oracle for making predictions. My wife is a firm believer in Muthappan oracle and his DOG.</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/10/muthappan-deity-of-north-kerala-capt.html</span><br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">The Seven Stars of the Pleiades ( wives of Sapt Rishis) transmit the spiritual energy of the Seven Rays from the Galactic Logos to the Seven Stars of the Great Bear ( the Sapt Rishis ), then to Sirius\u2014by QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT</span></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">From there is it sent via the Sun to Sanat Kumaras , and finally through the seven Masters of the Seven Rays ( 7 chakras ) to the human race.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Although white to blue white in color, Sirius might be called a rainbow star, as it often flickers with 7 chakra colors.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Sirius (Mrgavyadha \"deer hunter ) rises just before the Sun on the morning of June 19th, exactly 365 days, 6 hours, 9 minutes, and 9.54 seconds after its last rising. In the past the new year has been celebrated by most people on the planet on the morning of June 19th, at the rising of Sirius.<br />\n<br />\nAAJ KELIYE ITHNA KAAFI.. margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />WHY ARE THESE 5 JUDGES DISCUSSING RIDICULOUS THINGS LIKE SHIKANDI / ADHANESHWARA / AYYAPPA / HOMOSEXUAL SPECIES ( WHEN THERE IS NONE) ETC \u2013 GOING THROUGH THE MOTIONS \u2013 AN ACTIVITY TRAP..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nARE THESE 5 JUDGES GENIUSES ?<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW \u201cLAWYERS TURNED JUDGES \u201c ARE THE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL, IN AS MUCH AS THEY DON\u2019T HAVE THE CEREBRAL WHERWITHAL TO APPLY BODMAS TO THE CONSTITION OR EVEN GLEAN CIRCUMSTANTIAL EVIDENCE ,-- IN A VESTED SYSTEM WHERE JUSTICE IF BLIND ( NO NATURAL JUSTICE/ DHARMA ) AND THE PERIMETER OF CONTEXT IS DELIBERATELY DISREGARDED ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW PAST JUDGEMENTS OF SUCH COLLEGIUM JUDGES TO BE USED AS A LANGOT TO THE CONSTITUTION.. BURN ALL OF THEM. ..<br /><br />WE THE PEOPLE CALL ALL LAWS CREATED BY JUDGES VIA PIL ROUTE ( FILED BY DESH DROHI FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs ) TO BE NULL AND VOID..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWILL THESE 5 JUDGES CREATE LAWS WHICH AFFECTS BHARATMATA AND LIVES OF 1330 MILLION INDIANS ?..<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS THE ONLY MORAL NATION ON THIS PLANET..<br />\n<br />\nNARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI\u2014&nbsp; YOU KNOW EVERY WELL THAT SEC 377 WILL NEVER EVER BE STRUCK DOWN BY OUR ELECTED LAW MAKER MPs WHO ARE ACCOUNTABLE TO THE PEOPLE WHO ELECTED THEM..<br />\n<br />\nNARENDRADA DAMODARDAS MODI , ARE YOU RULING INDIA OR IS PRO-HOMOSEXUALITY ARUN JAITEY RULING INDIA.. WHY DO YOU SELECT PRO-HOMOSEXUALITY I&amp;B MINISTERS ?..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">NARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI, AS A PM YOU DON\u2019T HAVE THE POWERS TO ABDICATE AND ASK JUDICIARY TO DO THE EXECUTIVEs JOB.. WE THE PEOPLE WILL NEVER ACCEPT THIS SLIMY ILLEGAL UNDERHAND METHOD..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">\nWE ASK , WHY IS EVERY BENAMI MEDIA BARON AND MAIN STREAM MEDIA JOURLALIST VEHEMENTLY PUSHING HOMOSXIALITY AS ACTIVISTS ?... WHY DOES THE I&amp;B MINISTER ALOW THIS?...</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">\nWHY HAVE FILM CENSOR BOARDS ALLOWED HOMOSEXUALITY ON INDIAN SCREEN ?...</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">\nKYA HOH RAHA HAI ?..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">\nMODI, WHOSE INTERESTS ARE YOU TAKING CARE OF , BHARATMATAs OR THE KOSHER DEEP STATE ?..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA WOULD RATHER BE SLAVES ALL OVER AGAIN , THAN WATCH OUR CHILDREN SIT IN DEPRAVED GAY BEER BARS ..BEER WILL BE </b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The US militarized\npolice, which have joined forces with state and federal law enforcement\nagencies in order to establish themselves as a standing army.&nbsp; The DEEP STATE&nbsp; fusion centers and spy agencies that have\ncreated a surveillance state and turned all of the US people into\nsuspects.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The courthouses and prisons\nthat have allowed corporate profits to take precedence over due process and\njustice.&nbsp; In USA the cost of maintaining\nprisons is part of GDP.. The military empire with its private contractors and\ndefense industry are bankrupting the nation.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xk7gkw-kW00/W0xuj3_yCtI/AAAAAAABczI/BXggNA5mR5oA5J2WTmdf691ls-3QkfmGACLcBGAs/s1600/imag9Jes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The private sector has 855,000 contract personnel with top-secret\nclearances,- a number greater than that of top-secret-cleared civilian\nemployees of the government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is&nbsp; hybrid of national security and law\nenforcement agencies-- the Department of Defense, the State Department,\nHomeland Security, the CIA, the Justice Department, the Treasury, the Executive\nOffice of the President via the National Security Council, the Foreign\nIntelligence Surveillance Court, a handful of vital federal trial courts, and\nmembers of the defense and intelligence committees.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">To justify its own existence and expansion\nNATO has to create a Russian bogey.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WITHOUT THE KOSHER\nWEDGE BETWEEN USA AND RUSSIA , NATO&nbsp; (\nROTHSCHILDs PRIVATE ARMY&nbsp; ) CANNOT EXIST.<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qquDpFI99Ns/W0xs_QeZKRI/AAAAAAABcyg/m5Oi6ECGt-8w2dUXT65QmWbf0dfuSvhHACLcBGAs/s1600/pU8GYatriotact.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; It appears the mystery behind Khajuraho temples is solved. I guess I found it out before you could reveal it officially.<br />\n<br />\nThe profane sculptures (Kamabandhas) were built over the defensive Yantras to safeguard them! These defensive yantras such as Kamakala protected Shiva-Shakti mandirs from onslaught of evil spirits. This is why Islamists could never ravage these temples. The Yantras promise that the monument will thus stand forever!!!<br />\nThis why so many Kerala Tantric designed temples survive till today, and same for countless scattered ignored temples in minimal damaged states.<br />\nThe Kamabandh designs were meant to act as decoys for the parochial common man, to ensure the protected Kamakala Yantras were not damaged plus they offered Supernatural magic powers to the region. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sayanim ( Hebrew:\nhelpers, assistants) is a Jew living outside Israel who volunteers to provide\nassistance to the Israeli Mossad utilising the capacity of their own\nnationality to procure assistance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Wallace is an American television anchor and political commentator who is the host of the Fox Broadcasting Company.<br />\n<br />\nThe US Deep State is so heavily entrenched, so well protected by surveillance, firepower, money and its ability to co-opt resistance that it is almost impervious to change\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf there is anything the Deep State requires it is silent, uninterrupted cash flow and the confidence that things will go on as they have in the past.<br />\n<br />\nTo comprehend the full scope, enormity and depravity of the Deep State\u2019s intelligence operations against Trump,( Trump dossier of Russian whores pissing n Trump\u2019s face etc ) it is instructive to dig into the allegations that the active measures taken against Trump and his team went well beyond merely the misuse of signals surveillance information gathered \u201cincidentally\u201d in spying on the communications of foreigners.<br />\n<br />\nThe \u201cTrump dossier,\u201d was written by former British MI6 intelligence officer, Christopher Steele, who was commissioned initially by anti-Trump Republicans as part of their \u201copposition research\u201d during the Republican presidential primaries.<br />\n<br />\nMr. Steele, the co-founder of London-based Orbis Business Intelligence Ltd, prepared a 35-page document that alleges the Kremlin colluded with Mr. Trump\u2019s presidential campaign and that the Russian security services have material that could be used to blackmail him, including an allegation that he paid prostitutes to defile a bed that had been slept in by Barack and Michelle Obama.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">AMERICANS ARE SICK AND TIRED OF STORMY DANIELS TYPE SHIT</span></b><br />\n<br />\nSteele\u2019s research was initially funded by anti-Trump Republicans, and later by Democrats.<br />\n<br />\nAlthough Steele\u2019s work reportedly was funded initially by anti-Trump Republicans, after it was clear Trump was going to be the Republican presidential nominee, the Republican money dried up \u2013 and Steele was hired by unidentified Democratic clients to continue opposition research on Trump.<br />\n<br />\nA picture now emerges of how anti-Trump opposition research, consisting of unverified sources and unsubstantiated accusations \u2013 paid for by anti-Trump factions within both political parties \u2013 and the author of that material himself were used by at least one U.S. intelligence/law-enforcement agency (the FBI) to justify intelligence operations against Trump under the guise of \u201can investigation.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nOn April 28, 2017, the Guardian reported that memos written by Steele were passed to DEEP STATE operative Senator John McCain who then handed over a copy of them to then-FBI Director DEEP STATE operative James Comey on December 9, 2016.<br />\n<br />\nThe Guardian goes on: The Steele dossier was referred to in an intelligence briefing provided by the FBI and US intelligence agencies to DEEP STATE operative JEW Obama and Trump in January. Comey has confirmed that counter-intelligence investigations are under way into possible links between Trump associates and Moscow, and CNN has reported that the FBI used the dossier to bolster its investigations.<br />\n<br />\nSo \u201cchummy\u201d were Steele and the FBI Deep State operatives that the Bureau was willing to pay him to continue his work, until, that is, the whole sordid affair became public.<br />\n<br />\nIn an effort to get to the bottom of the Trump dossier, Judicial Watch filed a FOIA lawsuit on May 16 against the U.S. Department of Justice for records of communications and payments between the FBI and former British intelligence officer Christopher Steele and his private firm, Orbis Business Intelligence<br />\n<br />\nThe Trump dossier is at the center of the anti-Trump Russian collusion and conspiracy theory. Outwardly we have a Constitutional government. We have operating within our government and political system \u2026 a well-organized political-action group in this country, determined to destroy our Constitution and establish a one-party state\u2026. The important point to remember about this group is not its ideology but its organization\u2026 It operates secretly, silently, continuously to transform our Government\u2026. This group \u2026 is answerable neither to the President, the Congress, nor the courts. It is practically irremovable. UNQUOTE-- Senator William Jenner, 1954 speech.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">COG WAS DESIGNED TO BE USED AS A HEGELIAN DIALECTIC</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE DISMEMBERMENT OF MIGHTY YUGOSLAVIA WITHOUT US CONGRESS/ UN APPROVAL USING ROTHSCHILDs PRIVATE ARMY NATO WAS A HEGELIAN DIALECTIC..<br />\n<br />\nThe first shadow government, referred to as COG or Continuity of Government, is made up of unelected individuals who have been appointed to run the government in the event of a \u201ccatastrophe.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nCOG is a phantom menace waiting for the right circumstances\u2014a terrorist attack, a natural disaster, an economic meltdown\u2014to bring it out of the shadows, where it operates even now. When and if COG takes over, the police state will transition to martial law.<br />\n<br />\nAgain, Continuity of government (COG) is the principle of establishing defined procedures that allow a government to continue its essential operations in case of a catastrophic event such as nuclear war.<br />\n<br />\nCOG was developed by Rothschild\u2019s agent JEW Winston Churchill before and during World War II<br />\n<br />\nIn the US, COG is no longer limited to nuclear emergencies; the Continuity of Operations Plan was activated following the September 11 attacks.<br />\n<br />\nThe 2007 \"National Security Presidential Directive 51\" directs the geographic dispersion of leadership, staff, and infrastructure in order to maintain the functions of the United States Government in the event the nation\u2019s capital is \u201cdecapitated\u201d by a terrorist attack.<br />\n<br />\nBuried deep within the 98-page National Continuity Plan is the strategy for the mass evacuation and relocation of every federal government agency including The White House and the military in response to an exceptional catastrophic event within the National Capital Region. Each agency is required to have a detailed Continuity of Operations Plan (COOP) in place.<br />\n<br />\nFollowing a catastrophic national emergency, the President, or his successor can authorize the establishment of a temporary \"shadow government\" to maintain control of the essential functions of the Federal Government. President Bush activated the shadow government on September 11, 2001 shortly after the second attack on the World Trade Center.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_135BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/menstruating-women-and-sabarimala.html?showComment=1531902260535#c5443062836813642438\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 18, 2018 at 1:54 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_134MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nEvery federal agency has designated key individuals to be part of an \"Emergency Relocation Group\". These ERGs are assigned to an alternate secure location on a rotating basis and are ready to take over the duty of supporting the National Essential Functions of this nation in an emergency.<br />\n<br />\nPresidential Line of Succession-----<br />\nThe Presidential Succession Act of 1947 sets the order of Presidential Succession. This order is followed if the President dies or is incapacitated. The order of cabinet officers included in the list is determined by the dates on which each of their positions was created: -------<br />\nVice President<br />\nSpeaker of the House<br />\nPresident pro tempore of the Senate<br />\nSecretary of State<br />\nSecretary of Treasury<br />\nSecretary of Defense<br />\nAttorney General<br />\nSecretary of the Interior<br />\nSecretary of Agriculture<br />\nSecretary of Commerce<br />\nSecretary of Labor<br />\nSecretary of Health and Human Services<br />\nSecretary of Housing and Urban Development<br />\nSecretary of Transportation<br />\nSecretary of Energy<br />\nSecretary of Education<br />\nSecretary of Veterans Affairs<br />\nSecretary of Homeland Security<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">TRUMP-- MAKE SURE YOU CAN TRUST THE TOP SEVEN OF THIS LINE OF SUCCESSION.</span></b><br />\nOrders of succession are also established for each of above Cabinet officials within their own departments. Ten successors residing within the National Capital Region (NCR) and three successors outside the NCR are identified for all executive departments and agencies..<br />\n<br />\nCOG has metamorphosed to the second shadow government\u2014also referred to as the Deep State\u2014that poses the greater threat to freedom right now.<br />\n<br />\nComprised of unelected government bureaucrats, corporations, contractors, paper-pushers, and button-pushers who are actually calling the shots behind the scenes, this government within a government is the real reason \u201cwe the American people\u201d have no real control over the government.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_135b+seedLnYD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8016855402030318707\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_136M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. These machines, which will be\nequipped with weapons, will be able to record all activities, using video\nfeeds, heat sensors and radar. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The DEEP STATE\ngovernment bureaucracy will continue to churn out laws, statutes, codes and\nregulations that reinforce its powers and value systems and those of the police\nstate and its corporate allies, rendering the rest of us petty criminals. The\naverage American now unknowingly commits three felonies a day, thanks to this\noverabundance of vague laws that render otherwise innocent activity illegal. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">US states will continue\nto outsource prisons to private corporations, resulting in a cash cow whereby\nmega-corporations imprison Americans in private prisons in order to make a\nprofit. In exchange for corporations buying and managing public prisons across\nthe country at a supposed savings to the states, the states have to agree to\nmaintain a 90% occupancy rate in the privately run prisons for at least 20\nyears.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">America\u2019s expanding\nmilitary empire will continue to bleed the country dry at a rate of more than\n$15 billion a month (or $20 million an hour). The Pentagon spends more on war\nthan all 50 states combined spend on health, education, welfare, and safety.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_13.html?showComment=1531445911873#c2552148709804898655\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 13, 2018 at 7:08 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_11MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QQuA3pVz8NE<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">HEY<br /><br />AMARTYA SEN WITH A ROTHSCHILD WIFE WANTS TO SAVE INDIA</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/amartya-sen-gets-nobel-prize-for.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/nobel-prize-amartya-sen-kofi-annan-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS PEA BRAINED FELLOW AMARTYA SEN CANNOT IMPRESS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br /><br />I CAN FIT HIS ENTIRE INTELLECT UNDER THE FORESKIN OF MY UNCIRCUMCISED PRICK AND HAVE SPACE FOR 99% MORE..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHIS FELLOW AMARTYA SEN DOES NOT EVEN UNDERSTAND REAL ECONOMICS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DEEP\nSTATE operation is slimy fascism in its most covert form, hiding behind public\nagencies and private companies to carry out its dirty deeds. It is a marriage\nbetween government bureaucrats and corporate fat cats. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Most\ndemocracies are a &nbsp;well run \u2018Kleptocracy\u2019\ni.e. a system of non-governance characterized by injustice, rampant greed and\ncorruption. A state where bribery has become a way of life is a kleptocracy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Kleptocracy\nis a Greek-derived term.&nbsp; It means \u201crule\nby thieves\u201d. It is used for an establishment that takes the advantage of the\nrampant corruption in government echelons to increase the personal wealth and\npolitical power of the government officials and the ruling class through the\nembezzlement of government funds at the expense of the wider populace,\nsometimes without even the pretense of honest service.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Once democracy yields to\nkleptocracy, good governance is given a silent burial. The vacuum thus created\nis filled by a vicious nexus among politicians, bribed bureaucrats and the\ncorporate who companioning together change the laws of the land to serve their\nrespective interests. Over a course of time, the corporate interests take over\nthe other interests and corporate start dictating terms to the politicians and\nthe bureaucrats.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For this they take recourse to greasing their palm or taking\nthe help of lobbyists who, acting on behalf of corporates, influence the policy\ndecisions of the governments, even trying to influence the appointment of\nministers to the ministries which are of particular interests to them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">All over\nthe world over, illegal, underhand donations to political parties have been\nconsidered a major cause of corruption in public life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVERY\nLOBBYIST RUNS SHELL COMPANIES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Nira\nRadia episode shows that&nbsp; the real power\ncentre in democracy under capitalist system exists outside the formal and legal\nstructures of the State, while the elected organs are rendered more and more\ntoothless and corrupted by the money, with each passing day. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Video clips of Nira Radia's taped\nconversations provide the Indian public a sneak preview as to how PR\nconsultants and corporate lobbyists orchestrate deals when it comes to nexus\nbetween mainstream news reporting and government officials.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We\nwould have never got this if it was not leaked.&nbsp;\nThe political parties are always on look out for funds to fuel their\ncoffers and to buy MPs to form a majority alliance \u2013 or to win a no trust\nconfidence motion in the parliament etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These\ndonations are nothing but a \u2018bribe\u2019 on the consideration that corporate pays only\nfor the undue `favours' it receives or MUST receive from a political\nparty.&nbsp; No under the table donation is\nfree \u2014this is just the small fish at the fish hook which will catch the big\nfish.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BOTH\nCONGRESS AND BJP WANTS FOREIGN FUNDS.. MODI TRIES TO SHOW THAT HE IS A KNIGHT\nIN SHINING ARMOUR\u2014 ALBEIT A GUJARATI ONE.&nbsp;\nTHIS BLOGSITE WILL WRITE HIS LEGACY \u2013NOT ROTHSCHILDs HISTORIANS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/treason-from-within-biggest-cut-on.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/treason-from-within-biggest-cut-on.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nRadia tapes have exposed the way corporate do lobbying to even fix the\nappointment of Ministers so that they could reap the fruits of dictated and\nmanipulated government policies. These tapes have also exposed how the\nministers and bureaucrats function as cronies of the corporate sector and\ninfluence the actions and policies of the government in their interest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nRadia episode shows that&nbsp; the real power\ncentre in democracy under capitalist system exists outside the formal and legal\nstructures of the State, while the elected organs are rendered more and more\ntoothless and corrupted by the money, with each passing day.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">CBI says that this woman had the latest state\nof the art Israeli anti-surveillance gizmos running on the telephones used by\nher and her close aides&nbsp; at Vaishnavi\nCorporate Communications&nbsp; and its sister\norganisations like Vitcom, Neucomp, and Neosys.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The IT\ninvestigations revealed that apart from managing the telecom licences for\nbuilder Unitech, among others, Radia also handled and facilitated cross-border\ntransfer of funds. Intercepted conversations between Radia and the allottees of\nthe new telecom licences suggest that she was a key adviser in staggering the\ninflow of funds from outside India so that no impression could be created that\nthere was a windfall gain to the companies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There\nwas a time when lobbyist Italian UNCLE Quatrocchi could barge in and shout at\nthe babus in the Finance and Defence ministries, just because Queen Bee is also\nItalian.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The babus used to stand up because of fright, while this Italian shouted at\nthem.&nbsp; He used to have minutes of\nconfidential notings , as if to show that he was in the inner cotiere. His wife\nonce kicked a uniformed Jawan with her pointed Gucci shoes ( or was it Pucci ?\n) for daring to run a metal scanner over her .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A\nstate where bribery has become a way of life is a kleptocracy. Crony capitalism\nis a term describing an economy in which success in business depends on close\nrelationships between business people and government officials.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It may\nbe exhibited by favoritism in the distribution of legal permits, government\ngrants, special tax breaks, or other forms of dirigisme.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Dirigisme\nis an economy in which a corrupt government whose politicians have been bought\nby bribes, exerts strong directive influence. The Party Chief issues a WHIP,\nthat every MP must vote for FDI in multi-brand retail, so that-- say\u2014&nbsp; Zionist Walmart (who gave political donations\nto bth BJP and Congress ) can come into the country.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/walmart-is-not-good-for-india-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/walmart-is-not-good-for-india-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/09/will-india-be-banana-republic-walmart_18.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/09/will-india-be-banana-republic-walmart_18.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE\nBJP GOVT WOULD RATHER HAVE A WALMART WITH THEIR FRIDGES IN INDIA, RATHER THAN\nTAKE ADVISE FROM CITIZENS OVER OZONE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE\nPOST BELOW HAS BEEN SENT TO MODI AND PMO MORE THAN 20 TIMES\u2014CONSIDERING MORE\nTHAN 40% OF OUR FOOD GOES WASTE ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/unsung-ozone-for-instant-prevention-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/unsung-ozone-for-instant-prevention-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Walmart\nsays they will reduce wastage of veggies and fruits by refrigeration.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">So who will pay for the electricity these\nrefrigeration compressors consume?</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Digression:\nIndia has just become free after 800 years of slavery.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These huge foreign\ncorporates , as soon as they secure a toe hold , puts all important Indian\npower brokers in their pay rolls and then they run the government by remote\ncontrol. The wealth of the country now gets siphoned out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Crony\ncapitalism arises when political cronyism spills over into the business world.\nSelf-serving friendships and family ties between businessmen and the government\ninfluence the economy and society to the extent that it corrupts public-serving\neconomic and political ideals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They\nconvert our MPs and Ministers into desh-drohis and Judases with few pieces of\nsilver. If wealth cant buy them \u2013 it will be muscle,&nbsp; blackmail using honey traps or even\nassassination. Once you take a bribe, there is no way out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Black\nmoney refers to funds earned on the black market, on which income and other\ntaxes has not been paid. Bribing is giving someone some sort of compensation in\nexchange for favorable treatment.&nbsp;\nBribery is an act of giving money or gift giving that alters the\nbehavior of the recipient. Bribery constitutes a crime. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bribery\ninvolves offering, giving, receiving, or soliciting of any item of value to\ninfluence the actions of an official or other person in charge of a public or\nlegal duty.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A bribe is a gift bestowed to influence the recipient's conduct. It\nmay be any money, good, right in action, property, preferment, privilege,\nemolument, object of value, advantage, or merely a promise or undertaking to\ninduce or influence the action, vote, or influence of a person in an official\nor public capacity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">GM\nFOOD IS THE REASON WHY INDIAs CANCER RATES HAVE EXPLODED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/monsanto-and-farmer-suicides-in-india.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/monsanto-and-farmer-suicides-in-india.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Crony\ncapitalism can devolve into simple corruption, where any pretense of a free\nmarket is dispensed with. Bribes to government officials are considered de\nrigueur and tax evasion is common. This is sometimes called plutocracy (rule by\nwealth) or kleptocracy (rule by theft).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Crony\ncapitalism is the inevitable result of any capitalist system. Since big\nbusinesses make big money and money leads to political power, business will\ninevitably use their power to influence governments.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The recent Occupy Wall\nStreet movement was all about common man wanting an end to the influence of the\nsuper wealthy in the political process, which is manifestation of crony\ncapitalism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Did\nanybody ever say that India is a poor country.&nbsp;\nWith our scam money alone ( stashed away abroad ) we can buy out oil\nrich middle east countries..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Now\nwhy do politicians in power get payoffs from powerful foreign corporations,\norganizations or individuals?&nbsp; Pray?&nbsp; Is it because they have such large kind\nhearts?&nbsp; Sorry, it is only out of selfishness.&nbsp; It is in return for making choices in the\ninterests of those parties, or in anticipation of favorable policy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">India\nhas emerged as THE the fastest-growing economies in the world, and a host of\nthe companies from across the world, including from the US, are seeking to\nenter this market or further expand their business here. Despite a global\neconomic slowdown, and Rothschild controlled rating agencies giving us bullshit\npercentages for growth ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bribery\nis the first step towards subversion of the system. Slowly but steadily, a\nparallel system is formed. This results in an unfair advantage for the bribe\ngiver.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Over time, the system erodes the economic foundation of the country,\nhurting the most vulnerable members of the society and filling the middle class\nwith a sense of hopelessness and cynicism. Corruption is seen as endemic and at\nthe heart of the systemic failure in some countries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bribery\nis considered illegal, while lobbying is not.&nbsp;\nBribery is considered a sale of power.&nbsp;\nHowever, lobbying is considered an influence of political power by offering\ncontributions that affect political outcomes. You have to be a stupid person to\nbelieve that both are different.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You gift wrap shit, it is still shit--it does\nNOT become chocolate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">US\nSenators aggressively seek contributions for their campaigns and often request\nlobbyists to arrange for fundraisers. It is a symbiotic relationship. This is\ntrue of the bribe taker and bribe giver relationship as well.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Lobbying is a multi-billion dollar business\nin America that funds and influences elections campaigns and the actual brain\nbehind laws and regulations written and legislated in the US Congress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nbusiness is so lucrative in USA, that experts believe more than 140,000 people\nare involved in what growing number of Americans view as illegitimate practice\nof buying political influence.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A top-notch lobbyist, for instance, can make\nmillions in annual income. There are 31,000 corporate lobbyists in Washington,\nDC, whose sole function is to bribe congressmen - give them millions of\ndollars, to get their way.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\nevery case , this activity is detrimental to US citizens. All US congressmen\nare rich. You don't become a congressman unless you are rich. USA is a country\nof the rich, is controlled by the rich, for the rich.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Although\nit is illegal in the United States for members of Congress to cast legislative\nvote in exchange for election campaign contributions, yet lobbyists\nconveniently manage to skirt the system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Virtually\nall Washington lobbyists pass out campaign contributions among candidates for\nelective office from both dominant political parties Republican and Democratic,\nand those campaign donations always take place behind closed doors. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nsystem makes sure that the rich contributors get bailed out while everyone else\nkeeps sinking further into debt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the\nUS till recently, there was a limit to the amount of money corporations could\nspend to influence politicians. But the US Supreme Court in a shocking decision\nsaid that money was equal to speech and that freedom of speech meant that there\ncould be no limit to how much money could be used to buy a politician\u2019s\nsupport!&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">So\nthis is what George Orwell said in 1984\u2014 all are equal, but some are more equal\nthan others. So now a rich person has more freedom of speech than a poor one.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But\nwhy should we Indians bitch? Our private medical colleges churn out substandard\ndoctors who have paid 120 lakhs donation to get into the college, right? , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A\nbusinessman dealing in chemicals wrote to the Indian Govt that holding Dow\nresponsible would jeopardize their promised investments. This twit - nay turd,\ndoes NOT understand that when you take over a company, you take over both\nassets and liabilities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">India\nwill be this planet\u2019s No 1 superpower in 15 years . We are a nation with a\ncritical and strategically located landmass , populated with intelligent people\n, where ALL companies want to invest money. We have to deal with foreign\ncorporations from a point of strength. There is NO need to attract investment\nby scuttling the nation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">The\nmulti-nationals can come to India to do business. We Indians will NOT allow\nthem to \"lobby\"</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">( buy our\nminsters) and rule our country by remote control , and siphon off our nation's\nwealth.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Government's\npriority in policy should be the countrys' and&nbsp;\ncitizens\u2019 interest. It can\u2019t be the other way around.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Vasco\nDa Gama when he came to my hometown in Calicut ( 1498) was on his knees in\nfront of our King Zamorin. &nbsp;&nbsp;They then\nbecame masters by DIVIDE AND RULE and left India only in 1961, when Nehru threw\nthem out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Why do\nwe allow all these foreign funded TV channels to dole out annual awards? These\nare sham awards for quid pro quo deals.&nbsp;\nAny award given with large amounts of cash must be construed as bribery.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\nAdam Smith economics, the bribe has been described as rent . In some capitalist\ncountries, such bribes are considered tax-deductible payments.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bribery in\nbureaucracy is the reason for the higher cost of production of goods and\nservices. Many types of bribes exist: tip, gift, sop, perk, skim, favor,\ndiscount, waived fee/ticket, free food, free ad, free trip, free tickets,\nsweetheart deal, kickback, funding, inflated sale of an object or property,\nlucrative contract, donation, campaign contribution, fundraiser,\nsponsorship/backing, higher paying job, stock options, secret commission, or\npromotion (rise of rank).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Political\ncampaign contributions in the form of cash, are criminal acts of bribery in\nsome countries, while in the United States, provided they adhere to election\nlaw, are legal.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Example--\na motorist&nbsp; bribes a police officer not\nto issue a ticket for speeding. A citizen seeking paperwork or utility line\nconnections&nbsp; bribes a functionary for\nfaster service. Bribery may also take the form of a secret commission, a profit\nmade by an agent, in the course of his employment, without the knowledge of his\nprincipal.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Euphemisms abound for this\n(commission, sweetener, kick-back etc.) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bribers\nand recipients of bribery are likewise numerous although bribers have one\ncommon denominator and that is the financial ability to bribe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bribery\naround the world is estimated at more than 1.3 trillion USD &nbsp;.Lobbying is corruption and campaign\ncontributions are bribes, plain and simple. Legalizing them will benefit no one\nexcept for politicians and corporations. India will suffer. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Corporations\nhire lobbying firms ( like the one owned by Nira Radia )&nbsp;&nbsp; to influence government decision makers on\ntheir behalf. They consider it a cost of doing business\u2014 not even a hidden\ncost.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Who\nsays India is more corrupt than USA? Which moron will give Switzerland the No 1\nspot for the cleanest country , when it comes to corruption?&nbsp;&nbsp; Are we stupid?&nbsp; Where are all the Rothschild banks , who&nbsp; hold black money situated ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Media\u2019s\nbiasness towards corporate houses and media persons acting as the lobbyist for\ncorporate sectors in the corridor of power and brokers of secret deals among\ndifferent corporate groups started in the early eighties. Ramnath Goenka of the\nIndian Express can be safely called as the father of this trend in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A\nperson who gives a bribe is corrupt too. If he refuses his peanuts, his boss will suspect him to be a\npotential whistle blower and shove him off.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The powerful man who rapes must be punished, not the weak victim who\njust lay down and let it be , due to compulsions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">What\nare all these TV sham awards for--if it is NOT for king making ? It can be an employee\nof a private company reporting corrupt practices within the company.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/11/protect-whistle-blowers-if-india-must.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/11/protect-whistle-blowers-if-india-must.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">India\nright now, does not yet have legislation for whistle blowers who face grave\npersonal danger while reporting acts of corruption.&nbsp; By exposing corruption among their\nsuperiors,&nbsp; they face the possibility of\ndirect or indirect vindictive action.&nbsp; In\nsuch cases the Govt must transfer these whistle blowers, so that their safety\nand career graph can be sustained. They\nvitually mint money-as the profit margins are too high.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We all\nknow about the recent Robert Wadhera --nay-- Vadra ,&nbsp; DLF nexus case.&nbsp; Corrupt ministers with the connivance of IAS\nbabus just make plans for laying by pass roads \u2013 along 5 or 6 routes, when actually\nthere will be none.&nbsp; They will go in a\ngang and punch in pegs into the soil, which passes through or adjacent&nbsp; hundreds of homes.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Alarmed citizens try and sell off the land at\nthrow away prices and move away. This land will be bought by the mafiia.&nbsp;&nbsp; After all who wants a highway few metres\nfrom your bed room?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
