font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nroute where the actual highway will come is kept a secret, till corrupt\npoliticians and their moneybag cronies buy off all lands adjacent to this\nplanned highway, whose value will skyrocket , 10 times in a couple of\nmonths.&nbsp; Farm lands are converted into\ncommercial lands just by altering records.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ROTHSCHILD\nPLANNED THE KHALISTANI MOVEMENT, &nbsp;A\nCENTURY IN ADVANCE. &nbsp;&nbsp;ALMOST ALL KHALISTANI\nLEADERS WERE CRYPTO JEWS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An\nelaborate plan was made to show the Sikhs that they would be the new Brahmans\nof Punjab.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">They\nwould hold the power .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">They\nwould hold the good fertlile lands and the money.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blue eyed\nKhalistani Sikhs were told to buy up land at certain areas cheap throw away\nprices . These lands were literally deserts. Nothing was ever gown there.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nHindus and Muslim were wondering why the Sikhs are buying all these lands. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Soon\ncame the stunning news. Canals would be dug by the British to make these lands\nirrigable.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Road\nand rail lines would criss-cross these areas, so that the land became valuable.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Yeah--pretty\nmuch the way apna desh ka daamad Robert Wadhera --nay--Vadra ( angrez hai nah ?\n) did recently.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/07/unknown-history-of-sikhs-and-sikhism.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/07/unknown-history-of-sikhs-and-sikhism.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nmost loyal stooges of the British got the canal zone lands free.&nbsp; Tracts of land from 15 acres to 500 acres\nwere doled out.&nbsp; Irrigation projects\ncovered entire lands which were previously arid deserts where not a blade of\ngrass grew. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These\nlands were made fit for agriculture from the Chenab river, 430 miles of canal\nwere dug with&nbsp; 2293 miles of distributor\nchannels, while 12,100 miles of the water course were taken.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Financial\nincentives were given to the most loyal British Sikh stooges. Recommendations\nfrom loyal Sikh Maharajas were acquiesced to.&nbsp;\nNow you know the secrets of 15 gun and 21 gun salutes and how Sikh\nMaharajas were found fit to visit king George in England.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These\nchannels irrigated 2.6 million acres of land.&nbsp;\nIt was at the cost of 350 Lakh rupees ( a fortune in those days ) and\nthe initial yearly value of the crop yielded over 900 lakh rupees -- every\npaise earned by the loyal Sikh farmers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Posts\nfor loyal Sikhs were reserved in the Army and in the civil services to be\nfilled exclusively by baptized Sikhs, the Tat Khalsa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nland owning Brahmins now depended on Sikhs who became the new Zamindars. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nSikhs held the money,&nbsp; they were allowed\nto carry swords , they got the ear of Rothschild -&nbsp;&nbsp; they were the new tough guys on the block . Why\ndo you think there are so many anti- Hindu Khalistanis in Canada .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\n1897, Queen Victoria invited her most loyal Sikh Soldiers&nbsp; to attend her Diamond Jubilee celebrations in\nLondon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These\nloyal badge Sikh soldiers, were then taken on a conducted tour of Canada on\ntheir way home.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They\nwere promised large tracts of free land if they immigrate--as a reward for\ntheir loyalty.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They\nwere told to go back to their villages and spread the good world quietly among\nSikhs only.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is\nanother thing that the first batch of Sikhs who went there had eye infection (\ntrachoma ) and after that they made a new rule that the trip from originate\nfrom India by ship.. Which meant a good incubation period for any disease --and\nonly healthy Sikhs would land up after a health check .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These\nSikhs returned to India with stories of an attractive land of milk and honey\nwaiting to be settled by British loyalist subjects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By\n1907, when the Khalsa Diwan society was organized in Vancouver with branches in\nAbbotsford, New Westminster, Fraser Mills, Duncan Coombs and Ocean Falls.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sikhs\nwere given employment with good salary in laying the tracks of the Canadian\nPacific Railway, in lumber mills and mines.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Though\nthey earned marginally&nbsp; less than white\nworkers, they made more than enough money to send to India and get relatives to\nimmigrate to Canada nay KNEEDAAA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today\nCanadian Sikhs who hate India are more than 2.24 % of the total population.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">VERY\nSOON THERE WILL BE A \u201cSIKH BRIGADE \u201c\u2014GORKHAS ARE NOT WILLING TO BE SLAVES OF\nTHE WHITE MAN ANYMORE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\nIndia we need a fast and efficient judiciary to handover judgments in fair and\nimpartial manner&nbsp; without political and\nsocial pressure. We need a clean and unbiased police that will come to the aid\nof those working on the right side of the law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SATYAMEVA\nJAYATE TV series of the CRYING BOLLYWOOD SUPERSTAR told all Indians that police\ncannot refuse to register an FIR. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We\nwant this nonsense to stop. &nbsp;Any IPS\nofficer must be able to VET an FIR first and VETO it.. False FIRs to harass\npoor people are now rampant in India. With this TAREEQ PEH TAREEQ PEH PAREEQ poor\npeople dread false FIRs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today\nwe cannot take a corrupt politician to court. The only thing sure will be the\nexpense, and the knowledge that even your grandchildren will have to pay for\nyour folly in taking on a monster.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Did\nnot Geetika of Gopal Goyal Kanda fame, find it out&nbsp; the hard way? In this young girl\u2019s autopsy , her\nasshole was large and flaccid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We\nneed to give our public some knowledge about the constitution, their rights\ntherein, and rule of law.&nbsp; Police can\nwalk in and arrest a man at 2 AM , without a warrant, just because a certain\nKarti Chidambaram is not happy with him.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/streisand-effect-self-goal-by-karti.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/streisand-effect-self-goal-by-karti.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We\nneed laws that will encourage people in both urban and rural areas to come\nforward without any fear of retribution, to usher in an era of transparency,\naccountability and participation in the day to day governance of the country.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We\nneed a system, a society,&nbsp; where a person\ncan do his duty without fear, with his head held high , where he gets job\nsatisfaction.&nbsp; If the government really\nintends to convert India into&nbsp; such a\nnation, then it is high time the government rolled up its sleeves and made\nconcrete efforts to pass the whistle blowers act ASAP<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\nKerala we have the ATTI MARI where goons of all political parties,&nbsp; form a \u201c head load workers union\u201d. You cannot\nland any goods from the lorry to the ground, even in your private plot, unless\nan exorbitant extortion money is paid\u2014for an easy job.&nbsp; If the lorry contains cement these goons will\nmelt away, as they want easy moolah, where breaking into a sweat in NOT required.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These\nare the same goons who throw stones on your car if you drive on a bandh day in\nan emergency.. Police will NOT interfere . You can make out which political\nparty they are affiliated to by the color of their neck scarf.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If\nIndia has to become a super power we need to terminate criminalization of\npolitics and rip asunder&nbsp; the nexus among\ncriminals, politicians and bureaucrats in India. We cannot allow such criminal\nnetworks to virtually running a parallel government.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We\nmust introduce a system where a regional party ( DMK / TMC types &nbsp;) cannot come into the national stage, unless\nthey can get sufficient number of seats from at least one more state speaking\nanother language.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Corruption\nhas been institutionalized in India during the corrupt rule of the\n\"waitress turned empress\".&nbsp;\nRight from the highest President to the smallest municipal corporator\u2014\nall are hand in glove in misusing tax payer\u2019s money for their personal foreign\njaunts.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">All\nthis corruption has mushroomed in the rule of the Italian Queen Bee, it was NOT\ntoo bad before . She chooses Catholic politicians and pseudo Hindus who are\nmore loyal to her than their motherland.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Her handpicked sycophant President Pratibha Patil who loved globe\ntrotting even took away all official gifts in Rashtrapati Bhavan for her son\u2019s\nmuseum, till she was pulled up sternly by the courts to return them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/indias-worst-president-ever-so-what-she.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/indias-worst-president-ever-so-what-she.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We\nneed to re-write the Indian constitution, to be in consonance with these modern\ntimes! THESE PANSYs WERE NOT TO BE ALLOWED IN THE PROMISED LAND..</b></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n</b></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AFTER GAYS WERE MASSACRED BY JEW HITLER\u2014ANAL SEX RECEIVING JEWS WENT UNDERGOUND..ALL GAY BEER BARS HAD TO SHIT DOWN.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">JEW HITLER PACKED HIS SS BROWN SHIRTS INLY WITH AGGRESSIVE ANAL SEX HUMPING JEWS.. THEY WOULD PICK UP A PANSY FROM A BEER BAR ONLY AFTER CHECKING SHE NAY HE WAS CIRCUMSIZED ( IN THE TOILET ).. ONLY THEN HE WOULD GO TO THE PANSYs HOME AND PROFILE HIM.</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HOLOCAUST WAS ALL ABOUT JEWS KILLING ANAL SEX RECEIVINGJEWS\u2026 AND SOME ROMA GYPSIES THROWN IN FOR GOOD MEASURE TO PUT FOG AND OBFUSCATE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">.http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BY 1933 ALL GAY BEER BARS SHUT DOWN IN GERMANY AS ANAL SEX RECEIVING JEWS KNEW THAT SOMETHING WAS AMISS AND THEY STOPPED GOING THERE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONLY AFTER GAYS SEX WAS DECRIMINALISED IN 1969 DID GAY BEER BARS OPEN AGAIN IN GERMANY..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TODAY IN TEL AVAIV GAY PARADE , ANAL SEX RECEIVING PANSYs DON\u2019T GO OUT OF FEAR OF BEING PROFILED.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BOTH IN JUDAISM AND ISLAM ANAL SEX RECEIVING GAYS ARE CONSIDERED WORSE THAN THE LOWEST GRADE ANIMAL\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN KERALA THE GAY NAMBOODIRIS WERE SEPARATED AND KEPT ISOLATED AT MINICOY ISLAND.. THEY WEREASKED TO CIRCUMCISE AS SHIT GAVE PENILE DISEASES.. THESE ARE THE FOREBEARERS OF ORIGINAL JEWS IN PALESTINE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TODAY IN GERMANY THERE ARE WINE BARS FOR LESBIANS .. THESE WHITE WOMEN ARE SO PERVERTED THAT THEY START LICKING EACH OTHER PUSSIES INSIDE THE BAR ITSELF.. MY FEMALE AGENT AT ROSTOCK TOLD ME THIS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OH- THIS WAS THE PLACE WHERE A ORISSA PYTHON WAS FOUND INSIDE MY SHIP..</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/true-sea-story-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LIKE HOW JEW HITLER PROFILES THE PANSY JEWS.&nbsp; &nbsp;WE IN INDIA WILL PROFILE BOTH GRADES \u2013HUMPING GAYS AND ANAL SEX RECEIVING GAYS, IF THEY OPEN GAY BEER BARS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE KNOW THE DEEP STATE JUDGES IN INDIA WHO ARE HELL BENT ON OPENING GAY BARS IN INDIA.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-weight: bold;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-weight: bold;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR JUDGES BURNT MIDNIGHT OIL TO OPEN CHAMIYA BARS IN MUMBAI\u2014 AS IF THREE DOZEN GOOD LOOKING DANCING GIRLS CANT GET A DECENT JOB..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-weight: bold;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE WATCH&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MODI\u2014WE KNOW WHAT YOU ARE UP TO.. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HOW WAS IT POSSIBLE FOR NEHRU TO INCARCERATE THOUSAND OF TRAITOR INDIAN COMMIES JUST BEFORE TH 1962 WAR?..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS INCLUDES COMMIE ARMY OFFICERS WHO WERE ON THE PAYROLL OF THE CHINESE ...COMMUNIST PARTY OFFICES HAS CHINESE RADIO TRANSMITTERS/ RECEIVERS WITH BEIJING CHIP..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">WELL NEHRU \"DID A HITLER\"...ONLY DIFFERENCE WAS NEHRU USED COFFEE CAFEs INSTEAD OF BEER BARS..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NEHRU WAS GIVEN THE COMPLETE LIST OF INDIAN COMMIES FOREIGN AGENTS BEFORE THE 1962 WAR WITH CHINA BY RUSSIAN PREMIER NIKITA KHRUSHCHEV\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RUSSIA MOVED AWAY FROM ROTHSCHILD ( WHO CREATED RUSSIAN COMMUNISM ) AND NOW THESE INDIAN COMMIES WERE FUNDED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD--VIA THE CHINESE\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">USING THE NAMES OF THE BRIBED FOREIGN PAYROLL TRAITORS NEHRU WAS ABLE TO CRACK THE INDIAN COMMIE TRAITOR NETWORK..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">NEHRU CREATED COMMIE COFFEE HOUSES IN CALCUTTA --AND GAVE THE SPIN THAT COMMIE \"INTELLECTUALS \" DISCUSS COMMUNISM OVER COFFEE \u2026 CHO0T TEA DRINKING BONG COMMIES-GOT AN OPPORTUNITY TO BE CALLED INTELLECTUALS \u2026</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THESE STUPID COMMIE BONGS WENT IN DROVES TO DRINK COFFEE , LOUDLY BOASTING OF THEIR EXPLOITS \u2026 UTTERING WORDS LIKE BOURGEOISIE / PROLETARIAT / COMMON MINIMUM PROGRAMME , EVERY COUPLE OF MINUTES..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE COFFE CAF\u00c9 WAITERS WERE ALL GOVT SPIES. ..WHEN THESE TRAITOR CUSTOMERS WENT HOME THEY WERE FOLLOWED AND THEY WOULD GET ARRESTED LATER\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN JAIL THE COMMIES WERE PUT TOGETHER AND THERE WERE GOVT SPIES IN JAIL PRETENDING TO BE ARRESTED COMMIES\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">VS ACHUTANANDAN WAS PASTED BADLY IN JAIL BY HIS OWN COMMIE COMRADES , FOR SUGGESTING THAT HE MUST DONATE BLOOD TO INDIAN JAWANS FIGHTING ON THE BORDER WITH CHINA..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TODAY THE INDIAN COMMIES HAVE NO LOVE FOR THE WATAN-- THEY IDENTIFY WITH A STRANGE IDEOLOGY \u2026 \"CONSTITUTIONAL PATRIOTISM \" TO DAS KAPITAL AND MAOs LITTLE RED BOOK..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A BIG PERCENTAGE OF LAND WITH COMMIES ARE ALL GRABBED . ..MODI MUST PROFILE THESE ROGUES AND TAKE THEIR ILLGOTTEN LAND BACK\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">COMMUNISM IN INDIA WAS ALL ABOUT GRABBING LAND, AND BURNING GOVT LAND REGISTRY OFFICES\u2026 THEY KILLED THE REGISTRARS AND EVEN RETIRED REGISTRARS \u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SOME OF THE COMMIE PROFESSORS OF JNU/ DU/ JU/ FTII/ TISS ARE IN FOREIGN PAYROLL\u2026 THESE PROFESSORS LIVE FAR BEYOND THEIR SALARIES...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SOME WOMEN PROFESSORS ( UGLY ONES ) GET SERVICED BY NAXAL STUDENTS AND SEPARATIST STUDENTS \u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TELGI STAMP PAPER SCAM WAS NOT ABOUT MAKING MONEY WITH STAMP PAPER--IT WAS ABOUT GRABBING LAND , MAKING FORGED LAND DEEDS AND INSERTING IT IN GOVT REGISTRY OFFICES\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THESE COMMIE BASTARDS WHEN THEY CAME OUT OF JAIL- THOUSANDS OF THEM, P1SSED ON FOOD BAGS IN FCI GODOWNS ( CONCERTED EFFORT ) AND CAUSED THE GREAT FAMINE , WHICH INTRODUCED THE KOSHER GREEN REVOLUTION\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR HOLY HUMUS LADEN TOP TOIL WAS RAPED BY ARTIFICIAL FERTILISERS AND PESTICIDES KILLING BENEFICIAL MICROBES ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">90% OF OUR LAKES WHICH SURVIVED IN PRISTINE CONDITION FOR MILLIONS OF YEARS WERE KILLED IN JUST 50 YEARS \u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">INDIAN COMMUNIST FOUNDER MN ROY HAS A JEWESS HONEY POT WIFE NAMED EVELYN TRENT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_143M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/03515649322352795115\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">abcindiagogo</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_13.html?showComment=1531555629888#c2624609026254713701\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 14, 2018 at 1:37 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_143MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nEVEN FORBES RECOGNIZES INDIA'S ANCIENT METALLURGICAL CAPABILITES !!!!!!<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE===============================<br />\n<br />\nThere is now a general agreement that the Damascus steel which made its way into the western world through the crusades was produced in India rather than in Damascus. This steel was known as Wootz steel, potentially derived from the word \u2018ukku\u2019 which means steel in Telugu and Kannada. Damascus swords were known to be extremely hard and flexible to the hilt and able to cleave a free-falling silk scarf or a block of wood with the same ease.<br />\n<br />\nHence, the forging techniques must have been different than those used for other types of steel known in the western world.<br />\n<br />\nIt is speculated that Wootz was made in India from 500 B.C. to about 1600 A.D. Verhoeven et al. also speculate that the art of making steel was probably a trade secret passed on to select apprentices by master smiths. The master smith would have taught the apprentice the heat treatment process and the grinding process described above.<br />\n<br />\nUNQUOTE=============================<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.forbesindia.com/blog/technology/the-mystery-of-the-damascus-sword-and-indias-materials-heritage/</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_143BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 14, 2018 at 7:16 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_166MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://mic.com/articles/190260/trump-bashes-obama-cnn-and-deep-state-after-mueller-indicts-russians-over-election-interference#.g7LKwItJG<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROBERT MUELLER IS DEEP STATE..JUST LIKE JAMES COMEY..<br />\n<br />\nWE ALL KNEW MUELLER BABY WOULD COME UP WITH SOME SHIT -- TO FORCE TRUMP NOT TO MEET PUTIN ALONE-- OR EVEN SCRAP THE MEET ALTOGETHER ..<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK TRUMP<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THERE IS NO NEED TO SPEAK TO DEEP STATE MEDIA AFTER YOUR PRIVATE MEET WITH PUTIN..<br /><br />LET THE MEDIA WHORES TEAR THEIR SHORT CURLIES IN GRIEF..</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Secret Intelligence\nService (SIS), commonly known as MI6, is the foreign intelligence service of\nthe government of the United Kingdom, tasked mainly with the covert overseas\ncollection and analysis of human intelligence (HUMINT)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SIS was created in 1909\nby Jew Rothschild to make covert preparations for WW1 and plans to carve out\nthe state of Israel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The name MI6 (meaning\nMilitary Intelligence, Section 6) originated as a flag of convenience during\nWorld War II, when SIS was known by many names \u2013 to obfuscate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The goal\nremained the same CARVE OUT THE STATE OF ISRAEL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The existence of SIS\nwas only officially acknowledged in 1994<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The man behind the\ninfamous dossier that raises the possibility that Donald Trump may be\nvulnerable to Kremlin blackmail is Russia expert Christopher Steele, formerly\nof M.I.6<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Christopher Steele, the\nformer British intelligence officer who compiled an explosive dossier of\nallegations of collusion between the Trump campaign and the Kremlin,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Steele had spent more\nthan twenty years in M.I.6, most of it focussing on Russia. For three years, in\nthe nineties, he spied in Moscow under diplomatic cover. Between 2006 and 2009,\nhe ran the service\u2019s Russia desk, at its headquarters, in London. He was fluent\nin Russian, and widely considered to be an expert on the country.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Steele left MI6 in\n2009, to start up a commercial intelligence firm, Orbis, with a former\ncolleague, Christopher Burrows. Soon after its founding, Orbis began working\nwith Fusion GPS, a Washington-based company doing political and business\nresearch, which commissioned the investigation of Trump in 2016.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Trump\u2013Russia\ndossier, also known as the Steele dossier, is a private intelligence report ( sponsored\nby the DEEP STATE ) comprising 17 memos that were written from June to December\n2016 by Christopher Steele, .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Steele was hired without knowing, or ever having\ndirect contact with, his ultimate DEEP STATE clients, and his only instructions\nwere to seek answers to this basic question: \"Why did Mr. Trump repeatedly\nseek to do deals in a notoriously corrupt police state that most serious\ninvestors shun?\".&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The resulting dossier contains allegations of misconduct and\nconspiracy between Donald Trump's presidential campaign and the Government of\nRussia during the 2016 election cycle, with campaign members and Russian\noperatives allegedly colluding to interfere in the election to benefit Trump.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHO KILLED THEIR ERECTIONS ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JUST ONE WEE EXAMPLE AMONG THOUSANDS ...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY DEEP STATE SERIES IS FOR MODI AND TRUMP.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I NOW SOUND A WARNING TO ALL TRAITORS OF INDIA AND THIS PLANET..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GANDHI WAS AN INDIAN ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MARTIN LUTHER KING WAS A BLACK AMERICAN..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BOTH AGENTS WERE \"USED \" BY KOSHER BIG BROTHER TO PREVENT THE BROWN AND BLACK AN FROM RESORTING TO VIOLENCE..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">AFTER THE CURRY LEAF IS USED FOR COOKING -- IT IS DISCARDED..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DEAD MEAN TELL NO TALES..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GUJJU NO 2 GANDHI AND MARTIN LUTHER KING WERE EXPENDED WITH BULLETS . . NATURAM GODSE WAS A CHITPAVAN JEW, A BOY WHO WORE GIRLS UNIFORM WHILE AT SCHOOL.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE IS NO WAY KOSHER BIG BROTHER WILL ALLOW THEM TO WRITE A \"TELL ALL \" BOOK..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SMARTER MEN LIKE JEW HITLER AND NETAJI BOSE HID FOR DECADES LIKE RATS IN A HOLE -AND DIED NATURAL DEATHS. A PUNISHMENT WORSE THAN INSTANT DEATH ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TODAY JUDAS TRAITORS ( JUDGES/ POLITICIANS / MEDIA BARONS ) ARE BRIBED AND UNDER INSTRUCTIONS TO CONVERT INDIA INTO A HOMOSEXUAL NATION --WITH GAY BEER BARS LIKE STARBUCKS CHAIN , USING FDI..</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THESE TRAITORS MUST KNOW-- AFTER THE JOB IS DONE , THEIR LIVES WILL NOT BE SAFE..&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS IS THE WAY THE KOSHER DEEP STATE OPERATES.. NO LOOSE ENDS UNTIED..HISTORY IS WITNESS . ..&nbsp;</span></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TODAY GEORGE FERNANDES HIDES IN A SANATORIUM PRETENDING TO BE MAD, STARING AT HIS RIGHT THUMB..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SO SO SO-- MODI HAS GIVEN THE SEC 377 TO 5 JUDGES TO KNOCK DOWN .. HE KNOWS THAT THE CHOSEN JUDGE BENCH IS PRO-HOMOSEXUALITY..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GUJJU NO 2 MODI KNOWS THAT A VOTE IN PARLIAMENT WILL KICK IT OUT BY A PERCENTAGE OF MORE THAN 99 % --</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NO WE WILL NOT ALLOW INDIA TO BE A DEPRAVED NATION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE HAVE PROFILED ALL TRAITORS OF THIS NATION. . These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti ( Prakriti) ..<br />\n<br />\nThe concept of Ardhanarishvara clearly brings out the fact that Prakriti (Shakti) and Purusha (Shiva) are nothing without each other and one cannot exist and function in the absence of the other...<br />\n<br />\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_132MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MIND YOU --SHIVA AND HIS CONSORT SHAKTI ( PARVATI/ DEVI/ KALI/ DURGA ) ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Purusha is the embodiment of pure consciousness, and Prakriti is the embodiment of pure energy. font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The collegium judiciary has given desh drohis\nthe RIGHT TO HIDE in the name of PRIVACY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Article 21 in The Constitution Of India :--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">21. Protection of life and personal liberty\nNo person shall be deprived of his life or personal liberty except according to\nprocedure established by law<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Article 21 prohibits the deprivation of the\nabove rights EXCEPT ACCORDING TO&nbsp; A\nPROCEDURE ESTABLISHED BY LAW.&nbsp;&nbsp; Read the\nUPPER CASE part of this sentence a Zillion times<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE KNOW WHO OUR LAWMAKERS ARE\u2014WE ELECT THEM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">OUR JUDGES ARE NOT ELECTED \u2013 NOR CAN THEY\nCREATE ANY LAWS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS LAW RESTS WITH LAWMAKERS \u2013NOT WITH\n\u201cLOSER LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Article 21 can only be claimed when a person\nis deprived of his \u201clife\u201d or \u201cpersonal liberty\u201d by the \u201cState\u201d as defined in\nArticle 12.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Article 21 applies to natural persons. The\nright is available to every person and&nbsp;\ncitizen . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Fundamental Rights are the basic rights of\nthe people and the charter of rights contained in Part III of Constitution of\nIndia.&nbsp;&nbsp; It guarantees civil liberties\nsuch that all Indians can lead their lives in peace and harmony as citizens of\nIndia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">SORRY FOREIGN DESH DROHIS\u2014 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">NO FOREIGNER OR ALIEN CAN CLAIM THIS RIGHT \u2013\nSO STOP YOUR PROPAGANDA ON TV AND MAIN STREAM MEDIA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Part-III of the Indian constitution from\narticle 12 to 32, contains fundamental rights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">These include individual rights common to\nmost liberal democracies, such as equality before law, freedom of speech and\nexpression, religious and cultural freedom and peaceful assembly, freedom to\npractice religion, and the right to constitutional remedies for the protection\nof civil rights by means of writs such as habeas corpus, Mandamus,\nProhibition,&nbsp; Certiorari and Quo Warranto.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Violation of these rights result in\npunishments as prescribed in the Indian Penal Code or other special laws,\nsubject to discretion of the judiciary. The Fundamental Rights are defined as\nbasic human freedoms that every Indian citizen has the right to enjoy for a\nproper and harmonious development of personality. These rights universally\napply to all citizens, irrespective of race, place of birth, religion, caste or\ngender.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE HAD FOREIGN WHITE TOURISTS FUCKING IN\nPUBLIC IN KHAJURAHO TEMPLE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/07/kamasutra-by-vatsayana-immoral-sexual.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/07/kamasutra-by-vatsayana-immoral-sexual.html</a><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In Indian laws, a foreign national will not\nbe entitled to the same constitutional rights as a citizen of a country will\nhave. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Looking at the history of India, the framers\nof the constitution found it better to keep a check on the Rights and\nprivileges provided to the foreigners. The main motive behind such a step is to\nstop the illegal activities by the infiltrators or trespassers, and to secure\nthe sovereignty of the nation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Aliens (persons who are not citizens) are\nonly considered in matters like equality before law. REPEAT \u2013 ONLY IN MATTERS\nOF&nbsp; \u201cEQUALITY \u201c BEFORE LAW.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">They are enforceable by the courts, subject\nto&nbsp; restrictions.&nbsp; REPEAT\u2014 SUBJECT TO RESTRICTIONS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">ONCE AT MUMBAI INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT I SAW\nTWO LESBIANS DOING MOUTH TO MOUTH KISSING FOR MORE THAN 15 MINUTES IN THE\nOPNE.. IS AUTOMATICALLY NULL AND VOID \u2013&nbsp; UNLESS ENDORSED BY THE ELECTED LEGISLATURE\n.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the constitutions of almost ALL developed\ndemocracies, the word \u201ccitizen\u201d appears late in the text, never in the first\nparagraph.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">We Indians are like cats who fell in HOT\nwater ( slavery ) and we are circumspect with COLD water today<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The major exception to this is the Indian\nConstitution. Here, unlike all others, the term \u201ccitizen\u201d makes its appearance\nright there in the first sentence, that is, in the Preamble itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">India is the world's THIRD largest economy by nominal GDP and the third-largest by purchasing power parity (PPP)..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCOUNTRY / GDP NOMINAL / BILLION USD / RANK<br />\n#########################<br />\nUnited States / 18,100 / 1<br />\nChina / 13, 200 / 2<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">India / 4200 / 3</span><br />\nJapan / 4,100 / 4<br />\nGermany / 3900 / 5<br />\nUnited Kingdom / 2700 / 6<br />\nFrance / 2600 / 7<br />\n<br />\nCOUNTRY / GDP -PPP / BILLION USD / RANK<br />\n#############################################<br />\n<br />\nChina / 25,200 / 1<br />\nUSA / 19,400 / 2<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">India / 12,200 / 3</span><br />\nJapan / 5,400 / 4<br />\nGermany / 4,300 / 5<br />\nRussia / 4,200 / 6<br />\nBrazil / 3,300 / 7<br />\n<br />\n#################################<br />\n<br />\nGDP (Gross Domestic Product) is the total market value of all final goods and services produced in a country in a given year. In Nominal method, market exchange rates are used for conversion.<br />\n<br />\nTo make meaningful comparison, PPP is used to compare economies and incomes of people by adjusting for differences in prices in different countries..To make a comparison of prices across countries that holds any type of meaning, a wide range of goods and services must be considered. Purchasing power is determined in each country based on its relative cost of living and inflation rates. Purchasing power plus parity equalizes the purchasing power of two differing currencies by accounting for differences in inflation rates and cost of living.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILDs KOSHER RATING AGENCIES CAN SCREW THEMSELVES ..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT A JOKE-- BEGGAR NATIONS JAPAN/ BRITAIN / GERMANY AHEAD OF INDIA?...<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">USA IS 21.4 MILLION USD IN DEBT..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">CHINAs DEBT TO GDP RATIO IS 365% .. It is obvious even to a layman it has been built by Indians The entire structure is made of Laterite and is floating in water. When the Europeans first saw this they mistook it for a moat!! Not sure if they still understand that if they drain the water, the entire structure will sink into the ground. I was reminded of what Captain wrote about Tripura - Atlantis. In Angkor, on the wall outside they show a scene from the churning of the ocean where there is Hanuman holding the tail of Vasuki. Captain has mentioned very clearly that Hanuman is a side character in The Ramayana and not an immortal who was around thousands of years earlier steadying the tail of Vasuki. There are lots of such details that have been introduced by the Thais and Europeans. The main altar at the top level has an idol of the sleeping Buddha. Here Vishnu has been removed and replaced with Buddha.<br />\nShankar.</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_229MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-142373992\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_229BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_229B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</span></li>\n<span id=\"bc_0_78b+seedDkD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_230B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s113/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c637773953184290448\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_230M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. This multiplied by the Vedic Golden ratio of 1.618 gives 7692 miles which is the distance from Giza to Nazca . Now 7692 miles multiplied by the golden ratio again gives 12446, which is the distance from Nazca to Ankor Wat.<br />\n<br />\nThe spherical triangle between Alaska at the apex, Giza and Nazca gives the Sri Yantra angle of 51 degrees 49 minutes 38.25 seconds , which is the same as the Egyptian pyramid, and also the Vedic Sri Yantra.<br />\n<br />\nThe sky-ground plans of Angkor and Giza have succeeded in capturing the highest point in Draco's trajectory and the lowest point in Orion's .<br />\n<br />\nThe white invader stole precession from India and patented in his name \u2013though precession is written in our 7000 year old Vedas. Precession was only discovered (sic ) by modern astronomers relatively recently,<br />\n<br />\nThuban was the North Pole star from 3942 to 1793 BC. It is 250 times more luminous than the Sun.<br />\n<br />\nANGKOR WAT IS PART OF THE ANCIENT DRACO CONSTELLATION--WHEN IT WAS BUILT</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">Our 7000 year old Vedic texts declare that devout people who know the 14 stars of Sisumara constellation are blessed. This is why after marriage in Kerala , the couple before consummating the marriage have to see Thuban star together , as a rite of passage \u2013Vivaha Samskara</span></div>\n<br />\n14 stars of Sisumara are :-<br />\n<br />\n1) Dharma 2.Uttanapada 3.Kratu 4.Narayana 5.Samvatsara 6-7 Ashvins 8-9. Aryama-Varuna 10.Mitra 11.Agni 12.Indra 13.Kashyapa 14.Dhruva. one street ( at Marriott Hotel over looking river Neckar ) is named after Iqbal called IQBAL UFER-- thanks to German Jew Rothschild..Rothschild rewarded him for his role in pouring cold water over Muslim world anger over Palestine and ending the powerful Ottoman empire at Turkey.<br />\n<br />\nIqbal was first noticed by Rothschild , as a piece of clay to be molded, when he wrote something which surprised everybody.<br />\n<br />\nUpon the death of Queen Victoria in 1901, Dr. Iqbal penned an epicedium of ten pages, entitled \u201cTears of Blood \u201c.<br />\n<br />\nThe Queen died on the day of Eid-ul-Fitr, and Iqbal the slave wrote : ---<br />\n\"Happiness came, but grief came along with it,<br />\nYesterday was Eid, but today muharram<br />\n(Month of the year associated with the deepest mourning<br />\nfor Muslims) came.<br />\n<br />\n\"Easier than the grief and mourning of this day,<br />\nWould be the coming of the morn of the day of judgment.<br />\n<br />\n\"Ah! the Queen of the realm of the heart has passed away,<br />\nMy scarred heart has become a house of mourning.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, thy lover has passed away,<br />\nShe who sighed at thy troubles has passed away.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, the protective shadow of God has<br />\nbeen lifted from above you,<br />\nShe who sympathised with your inhabitants has gone.<br />\n<br />\n\"Victoria is not dead as her good name remains,<br />\nthis is the life to whomever God gives it.<br />\n<br />\n\"May the deceased receive abundant heavenly<br />\nreward, and may we show goodly patience.\"<br />\n<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, Poem runs over pages 71\u2013 90.)<br />\n<br />\nSOB--SOB--CRY--CRY!!<br />\n<br />\nIn December 1911, on the occasion of the coronation of King George V, Iqbal wrote and read out a poem entitled `Our King':<br />\n<br />\n\"It is the height of our good fortune,<br />\nThat our King is crowned today.<br />\n<br />\n\"By his life our peoples have honour,<br />\nBy his name our respect is established.<br />\n<br />\n\"With him have the Indians made a bond of loyalty,<br />\nOn the dust of his footsteps are our hearts sacrifced.\"<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, p. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti ( Prakriti) ..<br />\n<br />\nThe concept of Ardhanarishvara clearly brings out the fact that Prakriti (Shakti) and Purusha (Shiva) are nothing without each other and one cannot exist and function in the absence of the other...<br />\n<br />\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_132MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MIND YOU --SHIVA AND HIS CONSORT SHAKTI ( PARVATI/ DEVI/ KALI/ DURGA ) ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Purusha is the embodiment of pure consciousness, and Prakriti is the embodiment of pure energy. Through uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side anal sex as figured out by small minds)\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Prakriti symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy. ..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change.Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Modern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In the highest planes they are interchangeable, which is why we see a great incongruence between our spiritual experiences and the external reality.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death\u2026</span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW SHIVA TO BE DENIGRATED BY </span><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">DEEP STATE JUDGES</span></b><span style=\"color: red;\"> AND LAWYERS IN THE PAYROLL OF FOREIGN FORCES ANYMORE\u2026</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-size: xx-large;\">FOREIGN FUNDED CULTURAL TERRORISM SHALL STOP .. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DEEP STATE&nbsp; in USA have been doing domestic surveillance,\neven before FACA BOOK leaked data to them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No matter who wins the presidential\npopularity contest, the National Security Agency (NSA), with its $12 billion black\nops annual budget, will continue to spy on every person in the United States\nwho uses a computer or phone.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus, on any given day, whether you\u2019re walking\nthrough a store, driving your car, checking email, or talking to friends and\nfamily on the phone, you can be sure that some government agency, whether the\nNSA or some other entity, is listening in and tracking your behavior.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Local\npolice have been outfitted with a litany of surveillance gear, from license\nplate readers and cell phone tracking devices to biometric data recorders.\nTechnology now makes it possible for the police to scan passersby in order to\ndetect the contents of their pockets, purses, briefcases, etc.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Full-body\nscanners, which perform virtual strip-searches of Americans traveling by plane,\nhave gone mobile, with roving police vans that peer into vehicles and buildings\nalike\u2014including homes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coupled with the nation\u2019s growing network of real-time\nsurveillance cameras and facial recognition software, soon there really will be\nnowhere to run and nowhere to hide.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
