In so doing, they re-orient the\nlegal landscape in such a way as to ensure that martial law, rather than the\nU.S. Constitution, is the map by which Hilly Billy yanks navigate life in the\nUnited States. These laws will continue to be enforced no matter who gets\nelected.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After 9/11, America\u2019s\ninstitutions made the decision that security was more important than liberty.\nThe PATRIOT Act was one such bill ( a Hegeian Dialectic&nbsp; ) that derived from this collective\nconsensus. At first, very few people were out and against the act. In fact, it\npassed 99\u20131 in the Senate and 357\u201366 in the House of Representative. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/mystery-of-911-solved-hydrogen-fires.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/mystery-of-911-solved-hydrogen-fires.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the time, many\npeople thought that passing the act was a logical solution to remedying our\nproblems with terrorism. However, post-Iraqi conflict, it has become abundantly\nclear how the PATRIOT Act has affected the U.S and its governance.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">The US Govt no longer feels it needs a\nwarrant to enter your home. As long as it is in the \u201cinterest of national\nsecurity\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Now, the govt just claims a bogus thing, or\nelse they say something like, \u201cwe believed he had a gun\u201d. And presto! They are\nin your house sans warrant a warrant!<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">ANYBODY CAN BE FIXED BY THE DEEP STATE.</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 11, 2018 at 2:56 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_191MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nRespected Captain<br />\nhttps://barandbench.com/day-2-section-377-hearing-live-updates-supreme-court/<br />\nWhat's the point in sending links and comments if the BJP government itself wants homosexuality to be decriminalized? I am quoting relevant part of above article:<br />\n<br />\nAt long last, the Central government has clarified its stance on Section 377 of the Indian Penal Code. On the second day of the hearing of the petitions challenging the provisions, Additional Solicitor General Tushar Mehta revealed that the Centre will not contest the challenge to Section 377.<br />\n<br />\nThe affidavit submitted to the Supreme Court today states,<br />\n<br />\n\u201c\u2026so far as the constitutional validity Section 377 to the extent it applies to \u201cconsensual acts of adults in private\u201d is concerned, the Union of India would leave the said question to the wisdom of this Hon\u2019ble Court\u2026<br />\n<br />\n\u2026in the event this Hon\u2019ble Court is pleased to declare Section 377 viz. \u201cconsensual acts of adults in private\u201d, to be unconstitutional, no other issue/issues and/or rights are referred for consideration and adjudication and therefore, may not be gone into.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nHowever, the Centre revealed that should the Court delve into issues other than those specified above, it will file a detailed affidavit with respect to those issues.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cIn the most respectful submission of the Union of India, allowing any other issue (other than constitutional validity of Section 377) to be argued and adjudicating the same without giving an opportunity to the Union of India to file a counter affidavit to the Union of India may not be in the interest of justice and would be violative of principles of natural justice.\u201d<br />\nNow how do these BJP fools prevent homosexuals from getting other rights like adoption, freedom of association and so on once Section 377 is decriminalized?</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_191BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; BASICALLY FONDLING THE BREASTS..WITH PINK NIPPLES STANDING OUT LIKE BULLETS ..&nbsp; &nbsp;ANOTHER SHOWED CHILD BIRTH WITH EXCESSIVE FOCUS ON TWAT BEFORE DELIVERY--SHAVING PUBIC HAIR INCLUDED FOR GOOD MEASURE&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE OTHER STALL HAD TWO NAKED DEAD BODIES EMBALMED IN STINKING FORMALDEHYDE -- ONE MAN AND ONE WOMAN WITH AGED SKIN DARK BROWN .. THE MAN HAD A VERY LARGE PRICK AND THE WOMEN A LARGE TWAT AND BIG BREASTS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS SOON AS THE MALE MEDICAL STUDENT SEES A YOUNG GOOD LOOKING GIRL, HE WOULD HOLD THE MANs PRICK USING FORCEPS -SLIDE THE FORESKIN OVER THE GLANS AND LAUNCH INTO AN EXPLANATION OF HOW PURUSHABEEJAM ( SEMEN ) CAME OUT FROM THE PEE HOLE ORIFICE BLAH BHAH..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SAME WHEN YOUNG MEN WENT TO THE DEAD FEMALE CADAVER, THE FEMALE MEDICAL STUDENT WOULD POKE HER FORCEPS INTO THE TWAT AND LAUNCH INTO AN EXPLANATION OF HOW THE SEMEN ENTERED THIS WAY AND HOW THE BABY IS BORN IN THE WOMB.. BLAH BLAH..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY KEPT ATTRACTIVE STUDENTS FOR THIS MORBID COMMENTARY ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\">NEEDLESS TO SAY THE CYNOSURE OF ALL EYES WERE THE LARGE PRICK AND THE HAIRY TWAT.</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YES -- THIS IS THE ROT IN KERALA FOR YOU..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MEN WERE GETTING COLLECTIVE HARD ONs AND GIRLS WERE CREAMING FROM THEIR TWATS BY WATCHING THIS MORBID GRUESOME SCENE..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY PARENTS NEVER BOUGHT A STALL TICKET SAYING IT IS NOT WORTH IT --&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SO I WENT WITH MY SCHOOL FRIEND.. Cash donations are used to fix the\npolitical class and senior members of the other three estates some of whom\nfunction like partners in crime.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The perks&nbsp; includes funding the contact's children at\noverseas universities or sponsored foreign trips en famille. We must ask\nex-Congress Gen Secretary Diggy Vijay how his son Jaivardhan got admission into\nColumbia University where he did his MBA in rural development..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lobbyist is\ngenerally good at covering his tracks.. Some contacts accept payment in the\nform of preferential company shares allotted to close relatives at Re 1 each or\nthrowaway rates. Sometimes, companies are floated and the kin of key contacts\nbecome directors, the sole purpose being to transferring payouts to these new\nlegal entities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Government offices are\nso infested with lobbyists, even the peon might be pressed into service \u2014 for a\nfee \u2014 to photocopy classified documents for corporate clients..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Information is power\nand helps big business make the right decisions. Like the peon, so the hack.\nClassified documents are selectively \"leaked\" to the friendly\njournalist. &nbsp;Lutyens journlists run up huge\nluxury life bills , they are cleared by the PIMP lobbyist..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3927128285941037347\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_3M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/06290877985079296807\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Rahul Hari</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_6.html?showComment=1530918784059#c3927128285941037347\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 7, 2018 at 4:43 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_3MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain is Kerala on verge of becoming the next Punjab. THERE MUST BE A PENALTY..INCLUDING NAME AND SHAME..</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_8MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_8BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_8B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_10B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3004459560836344249\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_10M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_6.html?showComment=1530934447280#c3004459560836344249\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 7, 2018 at 9:04 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_10MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL EXHORTS THE PRESIDENT OF INDIA AND GOVERNORS OF STATES ..&nbsp; KNOW YOUR SUBJECTIVE/ DISCRETIONARY POWERS VESTED IN YOUR CHAIR...&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<br />\nNO SUPREME COURT JUDGE OR CJI CAN TAKE IT AWAY, LIKE WHAT HAPPENED WITH KARNATAKA GOVERNOR AND LT GOV OF DELHI..<br />\n<br />\n##############<br />\nLt Gov of Delhi has vast SUBJECTIVE POWERS and DISCRETIONARY POWERS.. The assembly can make laws on other issues apart from land, law and order, etc but they need Lt Gov approval. ..<br />\n<br />\nLT GOVERNOR OF DELHI HAS VAST POWERS OF SUBJECTIVE DISCRETION.. HE HAS MORE MOWERS THAN GOVERNORS OF STATES.. THIS SHALL REMAIN SO..<br />\n<br />\nThe Delhi lieutenant governor does NOT have to act on the aid and advice of the council of ministers of the state government..<br />\n<br />\nThe officers posted in Delhi are from all-India cadres of the IAS, IPS and IRS and they listen to the directions of the LG alone.. SUBJECTIVE MUST HOLD THE \"VETO POWER\".. DESH BHAKTI AND DHARMA IS A SUBJECTIVE FEELING.. ABOVE THE OBJECTIVE CONSTITUTION LIES , THE SUBJECTIVE FEELINGS TO OUR WATAN AND DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE )\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTo sustain DHARMA you cannot apply number crunching or objective judgment--you have to apply SUBJECTIVE judgments\u2026<br />\n<br />\n###############<br />\n<br />\nJUDGES CANNOT OVER RULE THE KARNATAKA GOVERNOR ONCE HE HAS EXERCISED HIS DISCRETION AS PER THE CONSTITUTION\u2026 GOVERNOR HAS THE DISCRETION NOT TO ALLOW UNHOLY AND OPPORTUNISTIC POST POLL ALLIANCES TO HIJACK VOTERS FREEWILL AND CHOICE...<br />\n<br />\nThe Governor of a State enjoys discretionary powers and as such the office of the Governor depends upon the personality and ability of the person who occupies it. .. The governor is NOT a rubber stamp. ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE FATHER STAR KID DUO OF DEVE GOUDA AND HD KUMARASWAMY HIJACKED DEMOCRACY AND CRUSHED THE WILL OF THE KARNATAKA PEOPLE TO GRAB POWER..<br />\n<br />\nTHE KARNATA GOVERNOR WANTED THE JDS MLAs TO BE GIVEN ENOUGH TIME TO GO BACK TO THEIR CONSTITUENCIES AND ASK THE PEOPLE WHO VOTED THEM TO POWER -- WHAT MUST BE DONE TO PRESERVE DHARMA? -- WHAT IS THE RIGHT CONSIENCE BASED DECISION ?...<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THERE IS AN UNHOLY POST POLL ALLIANCE SO THAT A FATHER SON DUO GRABS POWER --THE PEOPLE MUST BE ALLOWED TO TELL THEIR MLA FOR WHOM THEY VOTED, WHAT THEY WANT\u2026<br />\n<br />\nBENAMI MEDIA TRIES TO OBFUSCATE .. THAT THE GOVERNOR GAVE 15 DAYS FOR HORSE TRADING .. THIS IS NOT DEMOCRACY... ..IF ANY COLLEGIUM JUDGE PANEL OVER RULES THE GOVERNOR THEY CAN BE DISMISSED\u2026.<br />\n<br />\n###############<br />\n<br />\nVETO POWER CAN NEVER BE GIVEN TO THE OBJECTIVE.. A TABLE SPOON CAUSING CIRRHOSIS SOF LIVER ?<br />\n<br />\nAN AUTHENTIC DASAMOOLARISHTAM DOES NOT PRODUCE EXCESSIVE ALCOHOL AFTER FERMENTATION ..THERE IS A CLARIFICATION PROCESS AFTER FERMENTATION..<br />\n<br />\nDashmoolarishta ingredients:<br />\n<br />\nBilva (Bael), \u2013 Aegle marmelos \u2013 root / stem bark<br />\nShyonaka (Oroxylum indicum) \u2013 root / stem bark<br />\nGambhari (Gmelina arborea) \u2013 root / stem bark<br />\nPatala (Stereospermum suaveolens) \u2013 root / stem bark<br />\nAgnimantha (Premna mucronata) \u2013 root / stem bark<br />\nShalaparni (Desmodium gangeticum) \u2013 root / whole plant<br />\nPrishnaparni (Uraria picta) \u2013 root / whole plant<br />\nBrihati (Solanum indicum) \u2013 root / whole plant<br />\nKantakari (Solanum xanthocarpum) \u2013 root / whole plant<br />\nGokshura (Tribulus) \u2013 Tribulus terrestris \u2013 root / whole plant<br />\n<br />\nCirrhosis is a complication of liver disease that involves loss of liver cells and irreversible scarring of the liver.<br />\n<br />\nExcessive hard alcohol and viral hepatitis B and C are common causes of cirrhosis, although there are many other causes.<br />\n<br />\nEach time your liver is injured, it tries to repair itself. In the process, scar tissue forms. As cirrhosis progresses, more and more scar tissue forms, making it difficult for the liver to function.<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />YOUNG CHILDREN GET CIRRHOSIS OF LIVER -- DUE TO FATTY LIVER..&nbsp; THERE IS NO ALCOHOL IN SOFT DRINKS LIKE COKE..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThe main characteristic of nonalcoholic fatty liver disease is too much fat stored in liver cells.&nbsp; &nbsp; Nonalcoholic steatohepatitis is similar to the damage caused by heavy alcohol use.&nbsp; &nbsp;Nonalcoholic steatohepatitis can progress to cirrhosis and liver failure..<br />\n<br />\nIn older people this condition is closely linked to metabolic syndrome, which is a cluster of abnormalities including increased abdominal fat, poor ability to use the hormone insulin, high blood pressure and high blood levels of triglycerides, a type of fat.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/03/high-fructose-corn-syrup-fatty-liver.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS LINK ABOVE HAS BEEN SENT TO PM MODI AND JP NADDA AT LEAST 20 TIMES.. WHO CARES ??</span></b><br />\n<br />\nONE FELLOW IS ENGAGED IN ENDLESS EGO MASSAGE OF HIS BOSS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE OTHER FELLOW IS VOTE KA BHOOKA.. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lobbying and corruption\nare symbiotic in nature as both are ways of obtaining help from the public\nsector in exchange for favors. Lobbying is not yet recognized in a statutory or\nnon-statutory form in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India, the only law\nthat has some relevance to lobbying is Section 7 of the Prevention of\nCorruption Act, 1988, which makes it illegal for a \u201cpublic servant taking\ngratification other than legal remuneration in respect of an official Act\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">HE\nWAS INITIALLY WORKING IN KARACHI PORT TRUST FOR LESS THAN A HUNDRED RUPEES\nSALARY.&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE ASK THE INCOME TAX DEPT TO EVALUATE THIS FAMILYs FINANCES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suresh_Nanda\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suresh_Nanda</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today, retired civil\nservants, newspapers and news channels, bureaucrats, politicians,\nindustrialists, editors and journalists are amongst those who are used by these\nlobbyists to influence the government decision making process.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A classic\nexample is the case of Satyam where business ethics held no value as balance\nsheets were manipulated by illegal means. The hard earned money of investors\nwas swindled by the board members with the least of morality or regard to the\nlegal system. The ties between politicians, bankers and business tycoons are an\nopen secret in the Satyam case.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Big corporate houses often thrive on print and\nelectronic media to influence government policies for their financial\ninterests. Even the Supreme Court of India has expressed shock over the\ninfluence of corporate power players on the government and on its policies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money\nassociated with development works &nbsp;comes\nfrom the tax payers\u2019 pocket which eventually lands up in corrupt hands and in\nthe process development takes a back seat. Given where India stands at the\nglobal corporate map, India cannot afford to lose its money nor its resources\nto either of the two, corporate lobbying or corruption.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"https://www.firstpost.com/business/tata-sons-among-27-indian-cos-who-hired-lobbying-firms-in-us-555000.html\">https://www.firstpost.com/business/tata-sons-among-27-indian-cos-who-hired-lobbying-firms-in-us-555000.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a company pays a\nlobbyist canvassed within a PR firm/media/trade body/other agencies etc., who\nknows to what extent that money is used for things such as:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Pay bribes\n(difficult for firms but when its a single individual its rather easy)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Fabricate\nsurveys/news articles<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Usher favours on\npoliticians/bureaucrats</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Change the honest desh\nbhakt minister, by using BENAMI media .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian politician\nhas NO need for corporate lobbyists like Nira Radia.&nbsp; Politicians in India run a billion dollar\nempire. They have invested millions to come to power. Their objective is to get\nROI on their investment first.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Secondly they have to sustain their business by\ncreating policies that will get them elected again. So, being themselves\nbusiness empire run by their family members, why would they need a separate\nlobby ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God-men easily handle\nsuch roles as they can travel on Religious visas without much restrictions and\none will hardly find income tax raid in their organizations (charity, ashrams,\nchurches, mosques etc.,).&nbsp; These god-men\ncan park hard cash in millions in their houses and distribute them in suitcases\nquickly.&nbsp; Hence, this model favors Indian\npoliticians.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A few year ago, the &nbsp;Supreme Court of India decided the \u201cCash for\nQuery Case\u201d which had elements of lobbying entwined. The facts in this case\nwere that a private&nbsp; television channel\nconducted a sting operation that revealed that some MPs accepted&nbsp; money as consideration for raising certain\nquestions in the House and for otherwise marrying certain causes for those\noffering the benefits.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The&nbsp; matter was\nreferred by the House to a Parliamentary Committee that found the&nbsp; acceptance of money had a direct bearing with\nthe work of the&nbsp; Parliament and the act\nhad eroded the credibility of the Parliament as an&nbsp; institution and as a pillar of democracy and\nrecommended the expulsion&nbsp; of all the 10\ncharged MPs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/treason-from-within-biggest-cut-on.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/treason-from-within-biggest-cut-on.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abhishek_Verma_(arms_dealer)\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abhishek_Verma_(arms_dealer)</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ottavio_Quattrocchi\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ottavio_Quattrocchi</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Win_Chadha\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Win_Chadha</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">BELOW: PEOPLE INVOLVED IN RADIAGATE&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radia_tapes_controversy\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radia_tapes_controversy</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suhel says his most\nimportant rule is: \u201cDon\u2019t make clients out of friends. But make friends out of\nclients.\u201d Yet Suhel is friends with \u201calmost everyone there is to know in the\ncountry\u201d, or so the book\u2019s jacket informs us. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">HOW IS THE DEEP STATE\nSTRIKING BACK?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Desh Drohi commie Journalists\nhave been financed to set up news websites to portray the government in the\npoorest light possible. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; In no other major democracy does a coalition of the\nelectorally defeated get away with such an anti-national agenda as it does in\nIndia. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nowhere on the planet\ndoes benami media TV channels allow rabid desh drohis like Kavita Krishnan or\nSuneet Verma or Johan Dayal to air their views..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And in no other major\ndemocracy does the government counter this agenda with such staggering\nineptitude.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The perception battle, once lost, is rarely\nwon. The Lutyens' cabal knows this.&nbsp; &nbsp;Hence the increasing intensity of its\nattacks\u2014 after all they have the BJPs I&amp;B minister in their pocket.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The prime minister must\nevict non-performers from his cabinet and other echelons of his government.\nModi must stop seeking ego massage .. &nbsp;&nbsp;Modi\nmust stop giving people HAJAAAAAR information about Rothschild\u2019s agents Gandhi\nand BR Ambedkar.. We are saturated\u2014cant take this shit anymore.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Winning the 2019 Lok\nSabha election will hinge on how quickly the prime minster recaptures the\nnational narrative from those who will spare no effort to distort it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_113TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_111B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_111BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_111b+seedwS6D\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_109T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_109TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_109B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c879871890920486078\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_109M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_111b+seedwS6D\" kind=\"d\"><cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THE INSPECTION TAKES BETWEEN TEN TO TWELVE HOURS..<br />\n<br />\nHE WILL GO THOUGH A CHECK LIST OF MORE THAN A THOUSAND ITEMS..IT WILL ALL BE OBJECTIVE -- BLACK OR WHITE...<br />\n<br />\nTHEN THERE IS A FINAL QUESTION --THE ANSWER IF CLASSIFIED-- SHARED ONLY BETWEEN THE VETTING INSPECTOR AND HIS COMPANY..<br />\n<br />\nLAST SUBJECTIVE QUESTION -- \" WILL YOU MAKE A VOYAGE ON THIS SHIP, WITH THE CURRENT CAPTAIN AND CREW WITHOUT RESERVATION ?\"..<br />\n<br />\nABOVE IS NOT AN OBJECTIVE QUESTION.. IT DEMANDS THAT THE VETTING INSPECTOR USE HIS GUT FEELING AND RIGHT SUBCONSCIOUS BRAIN LOBE..<br />\n<br />\nALL 1000 OBJECTIVE QUESTIONS MAY BE PASS .. BUT IF THIS FINAL SUBJECTIVE QUESTION IS FAIL --THEN THEY OIL MAJOR WILL NOT USE THE SHIP FOR HIS BUSINESS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE PRESIDENT OF INDIA, THE LT GOVERNOR OF DELHI AND GOVERNORS OF STATES HAVE BEEN GIVEN DISCRETIONARY SUBJECTIVE POWERS UNDER THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION...<br />\n<br />\nNO CJI / SUPREME COURT BENCH CAN TAKE IT AWAY. , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">INTEGRITY means -- UNITY AND INTEGRITY OF THE WATAN..&nbsp; &nbsp;Balls to the DEEP STATE judges who support the TUKDE TUKDE gang..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The 42nd Amendment changed the description of India from a \"sovereign democratic republic\" to a \"sovereign, socialist SECULAR democratic republic\", and also changed the words \"unity of the nation\" to \"unity and INTEGRITY of the nation\"...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The word SECULAR is being mis-interpreted by PEA BRAINED journalists like Faye DSouza..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">SECULAR means --ALL RELIGIONS WILL BE TREATED EQUAL..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS \"HIJACKED WORD\" <b><span style=\"color: red;\">SECULAR</span></b> AUTOMATICALLY BECOMES NULL AND VOID\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Forty-second Amendment of the Constitution of India, officially known as The Constitution (Forty-second Amendment) Act, 1976, was enacted during the Emergency by the government headed by Indira Gandhi which kicked into effect on 3 January 1977..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">42nd amendment is THE most controversial constitutional amendment in Indian history\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Again--- The 42nd Amendment also amended the Preamble and changed the description of India from \"sovereign democratic republic\" to a \u201csovereign socialist SECULAR republic\u201d which was never the intention of the founding fathers when they drafted and passed the Constitution...</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Have copied and pasted a letter to the editor (published in a Malaysian daily) below.<br />\n<br />\nRegards<br />\nRavi<br />\n<br />\n\"Respect extradition treaty with India<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe credibility of the Pakatan government is in the balance especially since Prime Minister Tun Dr Mahathir Mohamad decided that controversial preacher Zakir Naik can live in Malaysia.<br />\n<br />\n\"So long as he behaves himself\" seems to be the qualifying statement for a wanted man to continue staying in Malaysia.<br />\n<br />\nZakir Naik, who is being sought by the Indian police for allegedly inciting youth to engage in terror activities, does not deserve to be protected at the expense of Malaysia's international reputation as a moderate Islamic nation.<br />\n<br />\nZakir Naik came to Malaysia to seek refuge during former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Abdul Razak's administration, and since Pakatan took over Putrajaya, it is expected to at least do what is right in the eyes of the world.<br />\n<br />\nMalaysia and India have signed an extradition treaty; therefore, Malaysia cannot ignore the treaty and expect India to still respect us.<br />\n<br />\nRule of law is supposed to prevail in Malaysia after the last general election, but if we continue to protect a fugitive, we will again become a laughing stock to the world.<br />\n<br />\nStephen Ng<br />\nKuala Lumpur\"</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_144BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/06/lord-ganesha-and-milk-drinking-episode.html?showComment=1494742187335#c787459393546969542\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 14, 2017 at 11:39 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_52MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">May 14, 2017 at 11:36 AM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ZAKIR NAIK WAS ABLE TO CONVERT MANY HINDUS INTO ISLAM --AS HE MADE THE HINDU SELF LOATHING&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HE USED TO MALIGN LORD GANESHA&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ZAKIR NAIK IS SO STUPID THAT HE DOES NOT KNOW THAT SHIVA/ PARVATI AND GANESHA ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES-- NOT MORTALS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GHANA IS THE METHOD OF RECITING SRUTI ( VEDAS ) BACKWARDS \u2013 INDICATIVE OF MOBIUS PATH AND CURVED TRUNK&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GANAPATI ON THE MICRO SCALE CONTROLS THE MOOLADHARA BANDHAN -- ONLY OF THIS KNOT IS OPEN CAN KUNDALINI RISE</span><br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />GANESHAs MOTHER PARVATI ( SHAKTI ) RISES UP FROM MOOLADARA CHAKRA TO MEET HER HUSBAND SHIVA AT SAHASRARA CHAKRA ONLY IF HER SON OPENS THE DOORWAY</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Lord Ganesha is mentioned in the Rig Veda (2.23.1) written in 5000 BC, as the Lord of Mantras and seer among seers.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When I shifted to my new home , my wife got the Ganapathi Homam done. I remember staying overnight. The pujari came couple of hours before dawn and started his homam. Ganesha is also called Vighnesha, the lord who removes obstacles.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Ganesha is the son of Lord Shiva and his wife Parvati. As per lore Parvati removed anointed paste from here body during a bath, and gave it life. Then she showed off her handsome new baby to the other gods. Unfortunately, the god Shani (Saturn), who is said to have the evil eye, looked at him, causing the baby's head to be burned to ashes.The god Vishnu came to the rescue and replaced the missing head with that of an elephant.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">All Ganesha statues kept at HOME, must show a broken tusk on the left side of Ganesha and the truck towards that side.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The white invader lied --that ganesha used the broken tusk was used by him to write the epic, Mahabharata.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The lore is that Ganesha in anger threw the left tusk at the naughty moon.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This is an allegory for keeping the distance between earth and moon is 108 times the diameter of the moon..and the tilt of the earth on its axis at the MACRO scale</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHY DOES GANESHAs MOTHER SHAKTI NEED TO RISE TO MEET HER HUSBAND SHIVA ?<br /><br />IT IS ABOUT CREATION !<br /><br />ZAKIR HUSSIAN DOES NOT HAVE THE BRAINS NOR THE CHARACTER TO UNDERSTAND THIS</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">4000 years ago Adi Shankaracharya wrote \u2013</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">Shivah Shakthyaa Yuktho Yadi Bhavathi Shakthaha Prabhavithum</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">Na Chedevam Devo Na Khalu Kushalaha Sphandithumapi</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Translation Verse No 1 : Shiva becomes capable of creating the Universe, only when united with Shakthi , but otherwise , He is incapable of even a stir.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva and Shakti.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Purusha (SHIVA ) is the embodiment of pure consciousness, and Pragati ( SHAKTI ) as the embodiment of pure energy.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Both Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Through uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Pragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_52BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<br />\n<br />\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<br />\n<br />\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy . In the highest planes they are interchangeable, which is why we see a great incongruence between our spiritual experiences and the external reality.<br />\n<br />\nIn the higher metaphysical realms and subtle planes of our consciousness the physical laws of our universe lose their validity.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">CHECK OUT THE IDIOT NAMED ZAKIR NAIK-- SEE HOW HE DENIGRATES GOD GANESHA .</span></b><br />\n<br />\nBADAN KA MAIL -- ZAKIR NAIK REFERS TO MENSES BLOOD<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TLnehHUBSdI</span><br />\n<br />\nNO MUSLIM TALKS LIKE THIS --<br />\n<br />\nCHRISTIANS DO THIS--NOT MUSLIMS<br />\n<br />\nMUSLIMS SAY --CONVERT OR DIE -- OR PAY JAZIYA TAX<br />\n<br />\nBUT THERE IS NO DENIGRATION OF GODS<br />\n<br />\nTODAY MUSLIMS OPENLY GO TO SHIVA TEMPLES AND WORSHIP THE BLACK STONE ( SHIVA LINGAM ). This multiplied by the Vedic Golden ratio of 1.618 gives 7692 miles which is the distance from Giza to Nazca . Now 7692 miles multiplied by the golden ratio again gives 12446, which is the distance from Nazca to Ankor Wat.<br />\n<br />\nThe spherical triangle between Alaska at the apex, Giza and Nazca gives the Sri Yantra angle of 51 degrees 49 minutes 38.25 seconds , which is the same as the Egyptian pyramid, and also the Vedic Sri Yantra.<br />\n<br />\nThe sky-ground plans of Angkor and Giza have succeeded in capturing the highest point in Draco's trajectory and the lowest point in Orion's .<br />\n<br />\nThe white invader stole precession from India and patented in his name \u2013though precession is written in our 7000 year old Vedas. Precession was only discovered (sic ) by modern astronomers relatively recently,<br />\n<br />\nThuban was the North Pole star from 3942 to 1793 BC. ONLY CHRISTIANS AND ATHEIST COMMIES EAT PIGS..NO OTHER RELIGION ALLOWS IT.<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />WE WANT POSCO TO ADDRESS HOMOSEXUAL PED0PHILIA\u2026. WOMEN TOO ABUSE SMALL BOYS -- IT IS WELL KNOWN... 99.9 % HOMOSEXUALS ARE PED0PHILES...<br />\n<br />\nIF ANY HOM0SEXUAL DOES NOT AGREE-- THEY MUST SUBMIT TO A TRUTH NARCO SERUM TEST...LIVE ON TV\u2026. AND AT WHAT TENDER AGE THEY FIRST GOT MOLESTED..<br />\n<br />\nMIND YOU , WE WILL ARRANGE POLICE TO TRANSPORT RAPISTS OF MINORS STRAIGHT FROM TV STUDIO TO JAIL--WITHOUT BAIL.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_176BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 9, 2018 at 2:37 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_175MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSEND ABOVE COMMENT TO--<br />\n<br />\nBJP IT CELL TO FORWARD TO ALL PARTY SPOKESMEN WHO COME ON TV<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES ( LEAVE OUT MOMOTO AND KACHRAWAAL )<br />\nALL STATE/ CENTRAL MINISTER AND MINISTRIES<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nIGs OF ALL STATES<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nLt GOV OF DELHI<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nSUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nARNAB GOWAMI<br />\nNAVIKA KUMAR<br />\nPRASOON JOSHI<br />\nNCW MAIN<br />\nNCW STATES<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nNHRC<br />\n<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_176b+seedIoND\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_176b+seedIoND\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">I ASK MY READERS --</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">PROFILE THE ENTIRE PAST / PRESENT TOP LEADERSHIP OF RSS</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">NONE OF THEM HAVE CHILDREN -- WHY ?</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">MODI / VAJPAYEE HAVE PUSHED HOMOSEXUALITY&nbsp; --&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">THEY DONT HAVE CHILDREN AND HENCE A STAKE ON THIS PLANET</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\">BUT WE THE PEOPLE HAVE !</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslim Mohamed Morsi\nwas the fifth President of Egypt, from 30 June 2012 to 3 July 2013, when\nGeneral JEW Abdel Fattah el-Sisi removed Morsi from office in the 2013 Egyptian\ncoup d'\u00e9tat after the June 2013 Egyptian protests.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morsi was sworn in on\n30 June 2012, as Egypt's FIRST &nbsp;democratically elected president.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Egypt, less than a\nyear after former Egyptian president Mohammed Morsi ( an educated Muslim ) was\nelected into office by the people, Gen. Abdel Fattah el-Sisi, backed by Egypt's\nDEEP STATE military might, detained Morsi and toppled his government.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">El-Sisi\nis now Egypt's head of state.&nbsp; JEW\nEl-Sisi's ascent to power is the result of an Egyptian deep state's response to\nthe 2011 Arab Spring.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under JEW Mubarak, the\nMuslim Brotherhood was marginalized, with members sometimes rounded up, jailed\nand tortured.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But by June 2012, with\nMubarak gone, they were on the verge of governing the country. Islamist groups,\nincluding the Brotherhood, had swept parliamentary elections<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just before the\npresidential runoff, the Egyptians Supreme Constitutional Court ( controlled by\nthe DEEP STATE ) declared the parliamentary elections invalid. The military,\ncarrying out the court ruling, shut the parliament down. It then issued a\ndecree awarding itself sweeping powers, effectively diluting the office of the\npresidency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The next day, Morsi won\nthe election \u2014 and was later sworn into an office that had largely been\nstripped of its power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Morsi tried to\nreopen the parliament, a major state-run newspaper controlled by JEWS wrote a\nstory about how the move sent the stock market plummeting.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meanwhile, Morsi\nstruggled to govern, accused of incompetence..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Egypt\u2019s economy\nsuffered under Morsi\u2019s rule. The state-owned gas and power companies (\ncontrolled by JEWS ) faltered, leading to electricity blackouts and fuel\nshortages that caused widespread anger among Egyptians. Morsi\u2019s supporters say\nthis was a clear example of interference by the deep state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was 29 June 2013,\nthe day before much-hyped demonstrations that were expected to give the\nEgyptian military the cover they needed to sweep Morsi from power. But asked\nwhether he trusted the army, Morsi replied with one word: \u201cGedan.\u201d Absolutely.\n\u201cThey\u2019re busy now,\u201d he later added, \u201cwith the affairs of the army itself.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 30 June 2013,\nprotests erupted across Egypt, which saw protesters in the payroll of JEWISH\nNGOs calling for the president's resignation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In June 2012, on the\nday of his election, Morsi seemed to understand the need to maintain\nappearances.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a symbolic, if slightly awkward, gesture, he stood before\ncrowds in Tahrir Square, the crucible of the 2011 uprising, and unbuttoned his\njacket. The point was to show that he wasn\u2019t wearing a bulletproof vest \u2013 and\nthat as a representative of the people, he was not afraid of them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But evidently not busy\nenough \u2013 this was Morsi\u2019s last interview as president. Two days on, army chief\nAbdel Fatah el-Sisi gave him an ultimatum to leave office. And two days after\nthat, on 3 July, Sisi ordered his arrest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sisi became president\nin Morsi\u2019s place, overseeing a crackdown on most forms of opposition with tens\nof thousands of dissidents detained, and thousands killed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Morsi was ousted,\nand CRYPTO JEW EL SISI took over power the fuel shortages and the electricity\nblackouts ended &nbsp;overnight like magic .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Egyptians Muslims were stupid not to figure this out. The police suddenly\nreturned to the streets, providing security and directing traffic in Cairo\u2019s\nclogged streets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Posters emblazoned with\nEl Sisi\u2019s image cover Cairo, appeared overnight &nbsp;lauding him as the \u201ceagle of the Arabs\u201d and\n\u201cthe one we can trust.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sisi appointed new\ngovernors for Egypt\u2019s 25 provinces \u2014 19 are generals, and two are from the\npolice, one of whom had openly refused to support Morsi when he was first\nelected.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But should the\nconviction eventually stand, Morsi would become the world\u2019s first ex-president\nto be executed since Saddam Hussein in 2006. It is a shocking fate for a man\nwho became the first Egyptian president to reach office through free and FAIR elections.\nMorsi is still currently imprisoned<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When JEW Hosni Mubarak\nwas toppled in 2011, his regime remained largely intact, and was able to\nundermine Mubarak\u2019s elected successor from the moment of his election.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was inevitable that\nthere would be a clash between he supporters of a revolution that called for\nfreedom, social justice and human dignity, and a regime that ruled Egypt for\ndecades.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morsi had condemned the\nSeptember 11 attacks as \"horrific crime against innocent civilians\". He\naccused the United States of using the 9/11 attacks as a pretext for invading\nAfghanistan and Iraq, and claimed that the US had not provided\n\"evidence\" that the attackers were Muslims.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He &nbsp;stated that the aircraft collision alone did\nnot bring down the World Trade Center, suggesting something \"happened from\nthe inside.\" His comments drew sharp criticism from the DEEP STATE in the\nUnited States.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Muhammad Ali\ndynasty was the ruling dynasty of Egypt and Sudan from the 19th to the mid-20th\ncentury. It is named after its progenitor, JEW Muhammad Ali Pasha, ( installed\nby Jew Rothschild ) &nbsp;regarded as the\nfounder of modern Egypt.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_37TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
